In Life's Too Short: A Christmas Spirit, you once again take on the role of a celestial problem-solver called back to the vampire's mansion. This time it's the count and countess themselves making the call...A rash decision has been made and it's your job to save Christmas!

You'll need to explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles in order to ensure baby Vlad's first Christmas isn't ruined.

name: Light in the Dark
summary: Immerse yourself in unique gameplay and atmosphere of the game Light in the shadow. You are waiting for an adventure in the mysterious maze, where your main character is a glowing sphere. You will move around the dark corners of the maze lighting the way in search of an exit, to reach the end you have to maintain inner glow using energy which you will find in the path of adventures. Game Features: Main character is a glowing sphere. All interactive objects radiate an inner light. An Illumination creates a mysterious atmosphere.

name: Li'l Red
summary: Hop, skip, and jump with Lyra as she journeys back to her homeland in this retro adventure. With harp in hand, no foe is a match for Lyra and her animal friends.

name: Linia Super
summary:
Linia is back and does it in style with revamped visuals and more than 100 levels packed with original and unpredictable puzzles.

In "Linia super" - the second edition of the game downloaded by over 1 million users worldwide - you will once again go hunting for color sequences, drawing a line to create the correct connection between the different shapes on the screen.

But this time, to make it even more engaging, you will also have to keep an eye on your ink supply while you draw lines and collect the "Liniacoins" that will help you through the exciting chapters of the game.

It's easy to get carried away by this mesmerizing dance of colors that pulse, spin, hide and twirl, going to great lengths to avoid being caught by your line.

It will take skill, a keen eye and a sense of rhythm to get the sequence right. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Light Up the Room
summary: In this precision fast-paced action platform game you'll test your reflexes and discover the world around you to jump and dash to avoid obstacles on the way to reach your goal.

name: Life After Magic
summary:
"Life After Magic" is a Y2K, queer WLW visual novel focused around retired magical girls!

What's a magical girl to do when the teenage years are over, and there's no more bad guys for you to fight? How about navigating lost connections? Or juggling a totally awful retail gig? Worst of all - your magical powers are fading...

name: Live by the Sword: Tactics
summary:
A loadout based Tactical RPG currently in Early Access. Featuring a Single Player campaign, a roguelike Adventure Mode, local and online multiplayer and a board builder.

Build your team with 7 unique classes each featuring a different move set of abilities and attacks. Outmanoeuvre your opponent or die on the battlefield.

name: Lil Gator Game
summary:
The world is big when you’re a lil gator... Good thing it’s also full of friends!

There’s a buddy atop every hill in this open-world, movement-focused adventure and they all seem to need help! Bop cardboard baddies, brave serene hills and forests, and scale sheer rocks that only a kid would dare!

name: Little Squirrel Cabin
summary:
Little Squirrel Cabin is a 2D pixel-art survival horror game with psychological elements and dynamic storytelling.
Every new dawn can change your situation.
Nights are harsh, your sanity is fragile, and local traders have their own interests.

name: Lilith-M
summary: Lilith woke up and found herself trapped in the lab. Dark lights, depressing echoes, cold machines, secret switches... It all seems to tell her to escape from here as soon as possible.

name: Little Paws: Kitty Cat Simulator
summary: Tiny Paws, Big Adventures – Explore, Play, Relax!

name: Little Brats!
summary: A playground simulator

name: Lightist
summary: This is an interesting physics puzzle game. You can create objects arbitrarily to interact with light. Your gole is to make the light cast on all of the stars in the scene. So let's unleash our imagination and enjoy this game.

name: Light Fairytale Episode 2
summary: A turn-based JRPG series with a classic feel but modern visuals. Episode 2 resumes the adventure with Haru right after Episode 1's cliffhanger!

name: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth - Master Vacation Bundle
summary:
Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth - Master Vacation Bundle is an add-on adding content to New Game+.

It includes:
- New Game+ (Normal, Hard, Legend)
- The bonus Dungeon "Big Swell of Hawaii"
- New Achievements

name: Lithium: Inmate 39
summary: Lithium Inmate 39 is a platform and 3D puzzle game for horror genre. It tells the story of a psychiatric patient who must find the way back to his origins, discovering his past and getting explanations to understanding what is going on in his mind.

name: Lifelike
summary: Runaway appliances and a magical mystery!

name: Liminal Border Part II
summary: Unfairly saddled with crippling debt after the events of Part I, Itsuki Ninomae and the gang turn to fellow student and daughter of a crime lord Kotoko Teshigawara for help. An intertwined web of loyalties and desire awaits as Itsuki, Kotoko and the others fight for justice.

name: Liberated
summary: Players will experience a story about a world where government authorities use advanced technology to manipulate the population. Civil rights are a thing of the past, with the government engaging in complete surveillance of every citizen in the world. Social media activity, online payments, and GPS location tracking from mobile devices are just some of the ways every single person is being monitored. In this world, there are insurgents resisting this oppression, fighting for their freedom, while government agents try to maintain order and control. In Liberated, players will experience both sides of this conflict, with every choice they make changing the course of the story.

name: Life After Death
summary: Life After Death is a fictional survival game. Its up to you survive in this game, a challenge.

name: Little Witch
summary: This is the story of an adventurous little witch and her cat in the paper world. The puzzle mainly tests the player's observation of the stage and the application of elements. Use the cat to eat the elements and use them in the right place to open the channel or get new elements.

name: Liam_99
summary: Liam_99 tells the story of a little skeleton, amnesic but aware of being the central character in a video game, off on a journey of self-discovery through a vast afterworld. Embark with your favorite protagonist (soon enough) on a humorous yet poetic adventure!

name: Lightmatter
summary:
Lightmatter is an atmospheric first-person puzzle game where shadows kill you! 
 
"The floor is lava" but with shadows that kill you! 
 
Use lateral thinking to solve mind-bending puzzles with lights and shadows 
 
Compelling sci-fi narrative delivered by famous voice actor David Bateson 
 
Unique comicbook style with gloomy sci-fi atmosphere 
 
"If LIMBO and Portal had a weird baby ..." 
 
Inspired by games such as The Talos Principle, Portal, The Turing Test and Antichamber.

name: Life is Feudal: Forest Village
summary: Life is Feudal: Forest Village is RTS city builder game with survival aspects in a realistic harsh medieval world. Shape, build and expand your settlement, grow various food to prevent your villagers from avitaminosis and starvation. Possess them for additional micromanagement or simply to wander around. Become a leader of the newly arrived settlers and lead them to peace and prosperity.

name: Live for Speed
summary: Live for Speed (LFS) is a racing simulator developed by a three-person team comprising Scawen Roberts, Eric Bailey, and Victor van Vlaardingen. The main focus is to provide a realistic racing experience for the online multiplayer game and to allow single player races against AI cars.

name: LiEat: The Lie-Eating Dragon & the Azure Dreameater
summary: The second game in the LiEat trilogy.

name: Life Goes On: Done to Death
summary: A comical puzzle platformer where you must die to progress. The bodies you leave behind are your only tools to solve puzzles on your quest to find the Cup of Life.

name: Livelock
summary: Livelock is a cooperative top-down shooter where you and up to two others must work together to break the cycle of infinite war between machines. As one of "The Few" remaining Capital Intellects, you will need quick reactions and decision-making to overcome the chaos.

name: Life is Feudal: Your Own
summary: Hardcore medieval multiplayer sandbox with terraforming, free preset and modular building construction, rich crafting (smelting, forging, farming, animal breeding etc.), survival, no target physics based combat, original combat formation system and numerous other features. Taking place in the fictional medieval world, game imposes a realistic system of global politics, economy, and socialization.

name: Life is Feudal: Arden
summary: Life is Feudal: Arden is a new, free-to-play MMO set in a brutal medieval world. Challenge fellow feudal lords and ladies, and embark on a journey to conquer uncharted lands. Explore a meticulously hand-crafted map designed to cater to PvP enthusiasts, PvE adventurers, and even those who enjoy the thrill of PvPvE. Fight epic battles, forge alliances, master various professions, trade goods, craft unique items, and build thriving cities or impregnable fortresses. You are the sole driving force for your success!

name: Lizard Noisemaker
summary: Make a bunch of noises and sounds with Blizzard the Lizard and his button in Lizard Noisemaker. You can also set up a timed challenge that lasts 30 seconds, and press the button as many times as you can to get the best score.

name: Lightracer Spark
summary: Lightracer Spark is a Sci-Fi Narrative game. You are a reviser from a high civilization, descending to various extraterrestrial worlds. Guide all living beings to prosperity, or nip a spark in the bud. Accumulate strength through choices and strategies to grasp the rise and fall of all civilizations

name: Lil Tribals
summary: Build your village and recruit a community!

name: Lineoff
summary: Stay off line

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Mass Effect - Andromeda AI Armor Costume
Liar: Legend of the Sword
summary: Korean Action RPG for the Apple II, first title in the Liar's franchise.

name: Lighthouse of Better Days
summary: Lighthouse of Better Days is a parable of hope in a time of despair.

name: Lightning: D-Day
summary: This 1 on 1 card game recreates the drama of the day Allied soldiers went ashore in occupied France, 6 June 1944.

name: Littlelands
summary: The Littlelands region is brimming with strange characters and magical landscapes to discover if you know where to look, for a big-headed little youngster like you every moment exploring, growing berries, searching for buried treasures or walking through these lands can be an epic adventure.

name: Lines Universe
summary: 500 beautiful & relaxing Numberlink puzzles.

name: Littlest Pet Shop 3: Biggest Stars - Blue Team
summary: Get ready to go for the gold! It's time to hit the arena for the LITTLEST PET SHOP Biggest Stars competition--and this time your pets are in the spotlight! Ten fun and challenging mini-games are your pets' tickets to the big time. Practice makes perfect as you help your pets become the best gymnasts, models, ice skaters, dancers, flyers, fashion designers, and more. Then pack up their cute team uniforms and the dozens of super-fun accessories you've customized because it's time to hit the road! The Biggest Stars competition is the event of the year, when the pet-triplet judges look for teams that are a triple threat; cute, peppy and totally talented! Good thing that with your help, all your LITTLEST PET SHOP pet's Biggest Stars dreams really can come true!

name: LittleBigPlanet: Marvel Super Hero Edition
summary: A Marvel Super Hero Edition was later released in 2014 which features the original PlayStation Vita game with added on-cart DLC (Costumes + Marvel Arcade Pack).

name: Little elf
summary: This is a simple casual game that throws a game of chess.

name: Line Physics: Draw Lines to Solve Puzzles
List-Runner
summary: a play jam 4 game

name: Life Simulator of You, a Married Woman Seduced
summary: A role-playing game from WINMAX.

name: Lilia's Livelihood: Girl, Tentacle and the Wonder Island
summary: A role-playing game from mikotoshi-dou.

name: Light
summary: A simple shape platformer.

name: Lilipalace
summary: Women have been disappearing into a mysterious labyrinth... Play as the half-elf knight Seria and uncover the truth in this Dark Fantasy RPG.

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica Summer
summary: Nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring soft erotica drawings of sexy women with a summer theme.

name: Little Island
summary: Little Island offers you the experience of interacting with a variety of cute animals in a VR space. Dive into a world full of nature and adorable animal children. You will be healed by interacting with the lively animals. Help them in their time of need, play with them, and love them.

name: Lineage II: Grand Crusade
summary: Grand Crusade is an update to Lineage II.

name: Little Artist - Drawing and Coloring Book
Line-Kill Spirits
summary: Line-Kill Spirits is an arcade-fighting game .

name: Living Legends: Wrath of the Beast HD
Linzy has a Messy Room
summary: An early reading choose your adventure tale.

name: Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3
summary: Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3 is a prologue to Little Kingdoms, a medieval real-time strategy game with stylistic low poly graphics and relaxing music. Your goal is to conquer the neighboring kingdoms and grow your empire.

name: Lifeline 2
summary:
The Lifeline series continues to capture the imaginations of countless players worldwide with compelling real-time storytelling. 
Lifeline 2 raises the bar with a new suspenseful story from Dave Justus almost twice as long as the original, with many more choices and paths to explore. Lifeline 2 features a 28-minute original soundtrack and is fully optimized for Android Wear, delivering the best Lifeline experience on Android Wear yet. 
 
The second story in the Lifeline series connects you with Arika, a young woman on a deadly quest to avenge her parents and rescue her long-lost brother. Your choices will keep her alive and help her succeed as she faces mortal danger on her way to a final, fateful showdown against the forces that threaten all of humanity. 
 
Lifeline stories play out in real time. As Arika travels to complete her quest, notifications deliver new messages throughout your day. Keep up as they come in, or catch up later when you’re free. You can even respond to Arika directly from your Android Wear or your Android lock screen, without launching into the app on your phone. 
 
After completing any story branch, you can rewind to earlier parts of the story, or speed through parts you’ve already read. See what happens when you make a different choice: will you guide Arika virtuously, or cut corners to gain an edge? Seemingly simple actions can deeply affect the outcome. 
 
Arika’s story, and the fate of the world, depend on your judgment. You will face the consequences together, because Arika is relying on YOU.

name: Little Honeybee
summary: A combination of both Breakout and the previous shooting games in which players shoot at a predefined block of pixels (which can shoot one of it's pixels at them) without getting shot by one of the blocks from the image.

name: Links LS 2000
summary:
Links is the name of a series of golf simulation computer games, first developed by Access Software, and then later by Microsoft Game Studios after Microsoft acquired Access Software. The line of golf games was a flagship brand for Access, and the series spanned several years: from 1990 to 2003. Several versions of the game and expansion packs (containing new courses[1] and golfers[2] mainly) were created for the Mac and PC over the years. A version for the Xbox named Links 2004 was released in November 2003. In 1991, Links won Computer Gaming World's 1991 Action Game of the Year award.

In 2004, Microsoft sold the Salt Lake City studio to Take-Two Interactive, where it was renamed Indie Built. Indie Built was subsequently shut down in 2006. It is therefore unlikely that Take-Two will produce any additional versions of Links.

name: Lirica
summary: The world of Opera is fading away! To bring the spirit of music back to life and help restore Lirica to its former glory, join Renatta and new musical friends as they explore the world, solve music puzzles, and restore life to Lirica.

name: Little Burned Maiden
summary: After suffering severe burns as a child, Arlasaire was taken in by House d'Magnia and now acts as the young heir's personal assassin.

name: Little Trus Man
summary: A puzzle game where a little boy tries to find his missing dog.

name: Lie or Die
summary: A comedic interactive story about sociality

name: Little Master: Niji Iro no Maseki
Lights, Camera, Reaction!: IRL Edition
summary: Compete in both 2D and 3D mini-games against 3-8 players with this couch-style party game! Experience the fun of all your favorite timeless party games together! Your phone (or tablet) is your controller. Draw and act out words, battle in retro side-scrollers, cock block friends, and more!

name: Little Red Riding Hood: Wonder Animals
summary: What happened after his encounter with the wolf? She meets the new guardian of the forest, facing challenges and mysteries accompanied by her best friends.

name: Little Ideology
summary: Touhou fangame. Help Flippy and Tiny go on a gay adventure!

name: Lili
summary: Lili is an adventure game developed by BitMonster for the iOS.

name: LinCity-NG
summary: LinCity-NG is a city simulation game. It is a polished and improved version of the classic LinCity game, with a new user interface and graphics. In the game, you are required to build and maintain a city. You can win the game either by building a sustainable economy or by evacuating all citizens with spaceships.

name: Life in Adventure
summary:
'Life in Adventure' is a text-based game written by the creator of 'Life is a game'.
You became an adventurer in D&D style fantasy, encountered various events and you have to choose what to do.

The events and options you will face include a variety of conditions, such as your ability, items, assets, choices made in the past, work to produce additional results.
Can you achieve the goals you had when you started your adventure?
Or will end your life as an ordinary adventurer?

name: Lightwire
summary: In Lightwire, you play as a young weapons engineer trying to save your dying home planet. You must harvest enough energy and resources from various energy nodes throughout the galaxy in order to satisfy the growing demand back home. Use your math skills to strategically fire lasers in order to get the highest score.

name: Lightballs
summary: Lightballs is local multiplayer, silly footlball game for 2 players. There are 2 mods to play

name: Littleroot Researchers
summary:
Seven years after "Pokémon: Alpha Sapphire" events, Professor Birch recruited three new research assistants!
You will complete tasks, interact with nature, catch Pokémon, and make new friends!
However, during your adventure...you find something rare in Petalburg Woods...

name: Lin Zexu: No Smoking
summary: Lin Zexu: No Smoking is an Action Role-Playing game, developed by Fuzhou Waixing Computer Science & Technology, (a chinese gaming company known for making unlicensed Famicom games and other electronics), in 1996. The game was translated to English by pacnsacdave in 2017.

name: Linux Jank
summary: A collection of maps that are short, sweet, and to the point. This wad is called Linux Jank as a reference to my learning all the strange quirks of Eureka Editor.

name: Life Diviner
summary: Choose how your life unfolds.

name: Light, Wax, Shadow, Wick
summary: A ritualistic candle-based personality test.

name: Little Warlings
summary: A small medieval strategy game.

name: Liar Liar 2
summary: Continuing one year after the first game left off, Yukari and Miho are now high schoolers, who are now dating and spend their leisure time together holding hands, kissing, and murdering the occasional boy or two. On one day just like any other, a new transfer student arrives to Yukari's school. It's Koshi Tanaka! But wasn't he dead? Apparently not. The goal of the game is to figure out the mysterious circumstances of Tanaka's revival and most importantly, staying alive.

name: Lighting End VR
summary: Lighting End is a VR optical path puzzle game which put puzzles into a universe scene. You can solve puzzles as well enjoy the beautiful universe.

name: Little Police
summary: Solve crimes, find stray animals and catch bad guys to rise through the ranks and become the most legendary cop of all time!

name: Like a Boss
summary: Like a Boss is an Action RPG where you are the epic Raid Boss at the end of a dungeon, crushing players (the heroes) as they come to steal your treasures. It presents a different perspective to famous MMORPGs, where you (the Boss) needs to exploit the player's failures as much as you can. Make your dreams of slowly murdering the noobs that made your group wipe all night long come true, unlock more overpowered spells, misteriously earn better gear by killing players, murder traitorous NPCs that give quests for players to kill you, place deadly traps for noobs to step on and much much more.

name: Little Tournament Over Yonder
summary: Turn based strategy game

name: Little Spy
summary: Airdrop into an enemy stronghold, recover stolen intelligence and technology. Fight your way out.

name: Light Cycle
summary: Inspired by the light cycle sequence from the movie Tron.

name: Links E6: Course Pack 3
summary:
Links E6 is the best virtual golf experience ever created. Explore more world-class golf courses with this DLC Course Pack!

This Pack contains: Pine Canyon, Royal Troon, Sanctuary Golf Club, Glenwild Golf Club, and Fairmont Chateau Whistler Golf Club.

name: Liminal Universe
summary: An exploration game that delves into the depths of loneliness. Wander through empty rooms, search for signs of an abandoned world, and listen to the sounds around you. No dangerous chases, just silence and an empty world to explore.

name: Living Legends: Voice of the Sea - Collector's Edition
summary: The dark seas are calling...

name: Light in the Dark
summary: Light in the Dark is a physics puzzle game for mobile devices from Dreamgate Studios.

name: Lifeline: Beside You in Time
summary:
After a lengthy radio silence, Taylor returns at last! This brand new adventure finds the hapless astronaut on the other side of a black hole, relying on you alone to help make life-or-death decisions in a playable, branching story of survival in the depths of unknown space.

But this time, there’s a twist: Players can also choose to communicate with T2, Taylor’s time-warped, alien-infected “evil twin,” helping or hindering as they see fit. Throughout the story, seemingly simple decisions can have profound effects. Make choices using your Phone or Watch, and face the consequences alongside the desperate astronauts.

name: Listenbourg
summary: Play a sci-fi turn-based strategy game while an AI threat the humanity. A VR experience allowing to discover the famous Listenbourg.

name: Life Simulator 2
summary: Life Simulator is the most in-depth, content-filled life simulating game available. Tired of real-life? In Life Simulator you can be anything you want to be!

name: Little Strategy
summary: Little Strategy is an Xbox Live Indie game.

name: Limit Buffet
summary: Limit Buffet is a 39-map limit-removing community megawad made of maps and songs which each adhere to their own strict limitations. Perhaps you’ve seen wads based on such mapping limitations: using only 100 linedefs, 64 vertices, or 30 monsters for example. Limit Buffet samples a variety of these ideas, some traditional, some zany. We’ve even got a full soundtrack in this spirit!

name: Little Hellions
summary: 4 friends. 1 weirdo mechanic. Throw away your friends with your trusty Trick Hook in this passive aggressive fighter where you can’t fight!

name: Life is Paine
summary: Life is Paine is a humorous Point and Click Adventure where you play a bard which has lost his voice due to an unfortunate accident and tries to regain it.

name: Link Dragon
summary: Link Dragon (Long) (龍) is an unlicensed Blockade clone for the Sega Mega Drive by the Taiwanese companies Songtly and Jumbo Team released in 1993. The game is divided into several levels; after collecting a certain amount of pieces (fire?) a door opens (which you must go to without dying). Dying starts you at the beginning of the stage.

name: Lizard Maker
summary: create lizard avatars for your characters!

name: Little Robbery
summary: Little Robbery is a relaxing meditative 3D game, with a first-person view. You have to take on the role of an ordinary guy who decided to become a robber!

name: Live Armor
summary: Ruthless tank fights, explosions, sudden clashes with the enemy, which will require from you a lightning-fast reaction and quick, effective actions.

name: Lightforce
summary:
The Regulus system has been attacked by alien forces, and you are the only Terran fighter in place to clear the area and rescue the captured hostages.

The game is a vertically-scrolling shoot 'em up with 5 levels. The first of these involves clearing their defences to reach the alien sector, then you face the jungle, ice and desert planets, before reaching the final alien compound. The game's enemies have a variety of attack patterns and formations, as well as varied and colourful appearance.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Santa Hat And Beard Costume
Living the Deal
summary: Make deals, get rich, or die trying in this unique blend of business management and life-sim. Buy, upgrade and trade businesses for a profit while attempting to maintain relationships and your own wellbeing in the process.

name: Links: Championship Course - Pebble Beach
summary: An add on course compatible with Links VGA, Links 386 Pro, and Microsoft Golf. Play the course created by the author of Morse Code and made famous by Bing Crosby's "Clambake" in 1947.

name: Liminal Dreams
summary:
A game about exploring strange and bizarre worlds.

You appear in a room of an empty bunker with no memories at all. However, you find a diary with some strange notes.

You explore and find a weird TV, you touch it and...

Suddenly, you got teleported to bizarre worlds where you meet strange characters.

Will you help them? How are you gonna escape this place? And what is this place anyways?

So many questions...

You keep exploring seeking the truth of all this madness.

name: Lido: The Puzzle Hero
summary:
Lido is a hero of the addicting brain teaser – a block puzzle game that will challenge you and train your brain. Put your puzzle skills to the test – we dare you to reach the highest score! A relaxing and easy-to-learn match 3 puzzle game to keep you playing for hours on end! Drag & drop puzzle pieces on the board, aiming to combine sets of 3 or more of the same color. Merge three to clear the puzzle blocks, leaving space for new pieces. The more you clear at once, the higher your score will be.
How many colorful blocks can you connect?

name: Little Man Has a Day
summary: A personal, short and silly handwritten game about a little man feeling a little 'eh'.

name: Lilith Odyssey
summary: The Great Nacho Wars have ended. A corrupt galactic government saps life and resources from the many war-weary planets it controls. Your alien family risks everything across an open-world galactic odyssey to find a mysterious land of new beginnings. And they’re all aware of their simulated nature.

name: Little Children's Educational Swanky Puzzles Game
Little Cells
summary: Look through a microscope and discover a small world made of ever expanding cells of 3 colors. Launch a cell against one of the same color to make them both disappear. Launch it against a cell of a different color and a new cell of the third color will be created. But beware! Cells are aging and become sick and dark. They might spread out and contaminate the whole system. Create white cells to help you cure this disease before it’s too late. Try to stay alive the longer you can and beat your score or your friends’ high scores.

name: Line
summary: Dash through a line.

name: LittleBigPlanet 2: DC Comics Premium Level Pack
summary:
LittleBigPlanet needs a hero and there’s one hero that always answers the call…
And that hero is you! It’s time for your Sackboy or Sackgirl to put on their best superhero costume and head off for a whole new adventure!

name: Links 2004
summary: Links, the best-selling golf franchise for the personal computer, has been rebuilt—from the ground up—exclusively for the Xbox video game system. Links 2004 delivers one of the most realistic and competitive golf experiences for Xbox. Golf fans worldwide can compete online in friendly matches with old golfing buddies or compete in tournaments against the best golfers in the world via Xbox Live. Links 2004 also features top championship courses and top professionals, including cover athlete Sergio Garcia.

name: Little Heroine Playset
summary: Little Heroine Playset is a Touhou Project fangame.

name: Like Them
summary: A fast-paced 2D puzzle game where you play as a cheerful ghost, moving in straight lines until hitting a wall. Navigate through a haunted house, dodge traps, evil ghosts, and escape before becoming like them!

name: Line Puzzle: String Art
summary:
Drag & divide lines as you want!
Connect and weave lines to make wonderful shapes and patterns of STRING ART.

name: Lizard
summary: Japanese RPG

name: Lingua Magicka
summary:
Lingua Magicka exists on an alternate Earth where magic developed side-by-side with technology. The ability for Casters to use magic on this Earth is directly linked to language. 
 
Lingua Magicka offers a fun way to learn basic vocabulary in a number of languages.

name: Light Speed Bike: Motor Cycle Rider Game Pro
summary: Light Speed Bike: Motor Cycle Rider Game Pro is a 3D bike rider game with crazy power ups. Experience the ultimate endless game: fly, slide, and jump through the endless chase to grab your coins. Very few gamers could reach the 1 million point mark - are you one of them??? 3D graphics which will keep you hooked! Collect Gems on the way and reach 1 Million Points.

name: Little Airplane 3D for kids: learn colors, numbers
Link Tower
summary: This is a 3D multiplayer cartoon-style tower defense game. Players control characters to walk on an island, build towers to protect castles, work together or hinder each other. Players can edit and share levels, and support making and uploading their own cell, building, and monster mods.

name: Lilith
summary: Do you enjoy non-stop, high-intensity, combat while fighting hordes of enemies? Come play Lilith and find yourself engulfed in this experience!

name: Line Points: Challenge your coordination
summary: This is a game that very test coordination of hands, you need to use both hands to control two points on the screen, through angle forming from the line between two points to control the movement of the ball, eat stars as much as possible. There are 6 balls in the game for players to switch, respectively, basketball, football, tennis, billiards, golf, baseball. Each ball has fixed weight and flexible setup, and there will be a totally different sense for control.

name: Liblade
summary: Slash, slash, slash. Sometimes you have to dance, sometimes you have to be precise. "LIBLADE" is a side-scrolling action game where you slash and slash by playing the stick. Use the twin-stick slash action to slash down everything and defeat the strongest enemies that stand in your way.

name: Little Races
summary: Little Races is a racing game with a retro gameplay and an arcade style, simple but effective. You can play alone vs AI or play against friends in split screen or in turns.

name: Lightfield: Kartridge Edition
summary: Explore beyond the boundaries of a traditional racing experience and sink into the striking visuals and hypnotic electro soundtrack.

name: Little Fire Girl
summary: Relaxing puzzle games to keep you in a good mood

name: Life of Lon
summary: Life of Lon is a science fantasy adventure game starring you as Lon. Your journey will take you to the stars, beneath an alien ocean, and through time. A beautiful and curious creature named Yep will accompany you on your travels- aiding you in unlocking the mysteries of Paracosma.

name: Linked Space
summary: A couch co-op game about two connected worlds where objects in one affect the other

name: Light Cube
summary: Light Cube - At first glance, a simple platformer, but after a couple of levels it turns out that there are heavy rooms, and even total darkness, the task is not simple..

name: Little Dew Drop
summary: Little Dew Drop is a small, relaxing and slow-paced 2D platformer. Enjoy the original soundtrack while travelling through six increasingly challenging levels.

name: Little Panda's Candy Shop
summary:
In Little Panda’s Candy Shop, players join Little Panda in running a whimsical candy store. You’ll:

- Choose from 11 fruits and various nuts to create custom candy flavors.

- Use professional machines like juicers, grinders, and stoves.

- Mold, decorate, and package your candy with 10 molds, colorful sticks, and boxes.

- Sell your creations and observe customer reactions to improve your recipes.

The game encourages creativity, experimentation, and basic cooking skills in a kid-friendly environment.

name: Lightbender
summary: Lightbender is a bright, colorful, and fun puzzle game based on the physics of light. Use prisms, mirrors, lenses, and dark matter to change the color and direction of light to solve each grid.

name: Lisa: The Unbreakable RPG
summary: Lisa: The Unbreakable RPG follows Tim McCoppin in a tale of blood and sweatsocks. Journey across the archipelagic Abandoned Olathe on a quest to remember why you came here--and who it was for

name: Little Heroes
summary: A real-time strategy game where you build your own army to consolidate your territory.

name: Limbs Inc
summary: Physics simulation mayhem inspired by QWOP and Happy Wheels. Craft, program and control robots, complex machines and vehicles. Build devious obstacle courses to drive online players insane!

name: Light Cry
summary: It was the worst day of his life. The car hit Damon. Damon, in a coma, was on the thin line between life and death. To wake up from his coma, Damon had to win the battle with himself.

name: Liath: WorldSpiral
summary: Liath: WorldSpiral is a Russian-made point-and-click, third-person graphical adventure which involves talking to people, solving puzzles and general exploring. In this game, you play a modern-day magician named Criss looking for his friend, Tiche, who disappeared hundreds of years ago in a world known as Azeretus. In the ageless battle of "Good versus Evil", the story revolves around magic spells, curses, and spirits.

name: Liquidum: Mirrors
summary: A level pack with 8 levels for Liquidum, a water-themed logic puzzle game.

name: L'intrépide: Le Futur de L'imparfait
summary:
L'intrépide, le futur de l'imparfait is a simple action/plateformer retro game with french humor.
It cames out of a successfull crowdfunding.

name: Lists and Lists
summary: Interactive Fiction created by Andrew Plotkin being a fusion between a game and a programming tutorial.

name: Liminal Doom
summary: Liminal Doom its a set of Boom maps based of liminal space images. While some areas are inspired by images, they do not resamble them completly.

name: Lightform
summary: Take on the role of the spark of the mind - in the literal sense! Make your way through the shattered consciousness of the Storyteller who tries to write a new tale.

name: Linkin Hero
summary:
Likin Hero is the first ever cartoon hero linking game!
Extraordinary graphic design & sound effect, 100 game levels and stimulating sound effects make you just can't stop playing it!
What are you still waiting for?! Download the game & join us in Likin Hero!

name: Little Square Things
summary:
Congratulations, warehouse keeper! You've been promoted!

Little Square Things is a COMPLETELY FREE (if you couldn't tell) Sokoban-like puzzle game. The objective is simple: Move boxes around to cover up some panels.

But this isn't your father's warehouse. In Little Square Things, you are the boxes. All of them. All of the Square Things respond to your every move, and so it's up to you keep them coordinated, in sync, and in line. Guide them through a series of challenging (and hazardous!) environments to get those panels covered!

PUZZLES GALORE

You want puzzles? You've got puzzles!

* Think your way through 111 unique puzzles! Plus, you can revisit them all for completely new challenges in each!
* From walls to water, from bullets to buzzsaws -- other elements either stand in your way. That, or they'll help you out. You'll have to figure that out!
* Navigate the geometry, with game boards that wrap around and null spaces that literally don't exist!
* Stop to take your moves turn-by-turn, or crank up the speed if you're in a hurry!

As a master shepherd of sheep and cats alike, you are the Square Things' beacon of hope in these complicated times.

RETRO AESTHETICS

Were you a 90s kid? Some other kind of kid? Are you a kid right now? Doesn't matter, because this game is for you!

Here's what you'll see, hear, and feel:

* New! More Enhanced Graphics Adapter (EGA) and SoundBlaster support-ish!
* Gamepad.. err.. joystick support!
* Modern quality-of-life improvements!

With its futuristic 17-color graphics and enhanced Musical Instrument Digital Interface (MIDI), Little Square Things is going to blow you away.

So boot up your i386, tinker with your CONFIG.SYS, and crack your knuckles in preparation for that DOS prompt, because it's time to play a game! Also, it's 1991!

name: Live In Color
summary: Use your wand to reveal your world in virtual reality, make it come to life & make it your own … Come see a beautiful fantasy world and play like a kid again!

name: Little Aid
summary: Little Wing is a game consisting of one-on-one paper airplane competitions. This game was developed on Net Yaroze.

name: Linkage
summary: Somehow you are in the locked dark room. Escape from here by finding items and using your brain. This time you are locked in the dark concrete room. Explore the room, find and use items, solve riddles and escape from here!

name: Linia
summary: A puzzle centered around colors.

name: Living Legends Remastered: Ice Rose - Collector's Edition
summary: Return to Rosemount to stop the Ice Queen this updated classic!

name: Light Rangers: Mending the Maniac Madness
Life of a Mobster
summary: Join the mob and rule the city! Will you become a celebrity mobster, or rule from the shadows?

name: Little White Man vs. X
summary: Attention: Attention, attention, attention!!! Sometimes the game automatically locks enemies, press the tab key to unlock it. (At the beginning, pressing tab is to lock the enemy) Other operations are in the legal terms

name: Lily's Handmaid
summary: Sarah gets an unexpected job offer to work as a maid for the Duskheart Family. What's more, her soon-to-be mistress Lily is openly intent on conquering Sarah's heart...

name: Liberators' Chronicles
summary: Liberators' Chronicles is an exciting turn-based strategy game that will take you to the South American independence campaigns. Liberate an entire continent from the yoke of the Spanish crown as you command brave revolutionary leaders and their armies.

name: Links LS 2000: 10 Course Pack
summary:
Enjoy this 10-course collection with your Links LS2000! 180 holes of golf paradise are recreated for your pleasure. All the features are included, including crowds, grandstands, leaderboards, and more.

- Bountiful Golf Club
- Castle Pines Golf Club
- Entrada at Snow Canyon
- Firestone Country Club
- Kapalua Plantation
- Kapalua Village
- Latrobe Country Club
- Pinehurst NO. 2
- Sea Island (The Cloister)
- Three Canyons Fantasy Course

name: Light-It Up: Neon Adventure
summary: Embark on a neon adventure through more than 130 new levels!

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun
summary: Little Kong loves his "new" fur. Help him out in keeping it for as long as possible. Keep the fun going in this endless runner game.

name: Living Books: Arthur's Teacher Trouble
summary: Arthur's Teacher Trouble is based on the 1986 Marc Brown book of the same title, and is the second Living Books PC CD-Rom Game and the first of the five Arthur Living Books games (counting D.W. the Picky Eater).

name: Lilith's Syndrome
summary: In Lilith's Syndrome, we take on the daily life of Lilith, who has a goal to achieve—one made difficult by obstacles that prevent her from fulfilling what she desires, all while making sure no one begins to suspect anything. Her goal is to win the heart of her beloved Yuji...

name: Lines XL
summary:
Lines XL - beautiful Numberlink-based puzzle game involving finding paths to connect colored tiles in a grid.

500 brain-teasing Numberlink puzzles
Beautiful abstract visuals
More than 10 color themes
Ambient relaxing soundtracks

name: Liberation Circuit
summary: Rogue A.I. Simulator

name: Link Track
summary:
"Link Track" is a very interesting puzzle game.
This game provides two type of puzzle modes: Color Link mode and Number Track mode. Each mode corresponds to a unique puzzle mechanism.

name: Little Chinese Final Edition
summary: Street fighter fangame with Chun-Li.

name: Lively Chair Simulator
summary: This game has slightly strange controls. By controlling each leg of the chair individually, you can make the chair walk, run, and even jump. It also supports online multiplayer games with 6 types of chairs to choose from and 3 modes.

name: Liquidum: Femme Fatale
summary: A level pack with 10 new levels for Liquidum, a water-themed logic puzzle game.

name: Like Camping
summary: a world within the tentiverse

name: Lightbox
summary: A casual puzzle game about manipulating and playing with light.

name: Little Terror
summary: Little Terror is an interactive exploration Horror simulator. Interrogate every detail of a seemingly normal house to discover the story of the people who live there.

name: Lishogi
summary: Lishogi is a free online shogi game server focused on realtime gameplay and ease of use.

name: Lily of Swampville
summary: Help little Lily to protect her home Swampville from evil pirates. Learn how to shoot a bow, sharpen your archery skills, collect coins, get helpful powerups and clear the swamp from evil to let peace, quiet and joy reign here again.

name: Line Time
summary: 《Line Time》is a puzzle game based on “controlling the timeline”.

name: Lion Quest
summary: Take Jethro the Lion on a magical journey, traversing space and time to prevent the imminent collapse of the universe. Oh and your friend Ronald the Bear is missing, maybe you can find him whilst you’re out exploring? Discover a huge world and enjoy an adventure that blends together retro platforming fun with a mix of 2D + 3D mechanics and a modern design aesthetic.

name: Living Legends Remastered: Wrath of the Beast - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you take on Goldilocks' mantel and protect the kingdom?

name: Living Legends: The Crystal Tear
summary: Can you save the kingdom from a crystal curse?

name: Link the Dot
summary: Link the Dot is an indie strategy game with a lot of levels. In each level you will have to join the points strategically if you want to pass it and try the next one.

name: Line the Balls
summary: Connect all colors and fill the board. But watch out, lines will break if they cross or overlap! In some levels, there're tubes that 2 balls can come inside.

name: Liar & raiL FanDisk: Hotch Potch
summary: A visual novel from Liar-soft and raiL-soft.

name: Lightstream Racer
summary:
Futuristic anti gravity racing! Bring the fun to the real world using Augmented Reality!
Enjoy all modes, tracks and cars available.

name: Lion and the King
summary: A movie, a jigsaw puzzle, and a digital colouring book, all one a single PlayStation disc.

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica 3
summary: Nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring soft erotica line drawings (women in panties) hand drawn by LineArtBabe, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Lightout 2
summary: Lightout 2 is a psychological horror game with a scary atmosphere, the game takes place in an Abandoned hospital.

name: Life is 2-D
summary: Life is Two-Dimensional: A Gameboy "What if?" is a fan-made 2D gameboy version of the original Life is Strange.

name: Linear Calamity
summary: Destroy enemies on a roguelike-ish setting, using multiple weapons and powerful abilities to break the own concept of time! Regain back your memories as you advance, knowing unique characters and uncovering the dark truth on what has really happened... BURN THE WITCH!

name: Light Bearers
summary: Light Bearers is a multiplayer asymmetrical hide and seek game that pits a sinister shadow against cute light bears!

name: Little Master 2: Raikou no Kishi
summary: The second game in the Little Master series of RPGs.

name: Linkin Park Revenge
summary: A Tap Tap Revenge game featuring Linkin Park songs.

name: Livli: A Sámi Story
summary: Follow Livli; a headstrong, smart Sámi girl whose village has been burnt down in late 1800's Sweden. As her people are persecuted or killed, she flees from the chaos. Embarking on a perilous journey in order to find the Bear - known as "Father Forest" he is a holy spirit and guardian deity, protecting the land and the Sámi people.

name: Little Invasion Tales
summary: Little Invasion Tales is a town management strategy game from The Tiniest Shark.

name: Little Big Eater
summary: Eat, combo, and score points in this small game with a big heart! Can you get onto the leaderboards?

name: Little Game
summary: Not-so-easy puzzle platformer

name: Little War Online
summary: Little War Online is an upcoming crossplatform 2D MMORPG. It will be available on Android, iOS, PC, OSX, Linux & Browsers first. It is also planned to hit PlayStation 4 and Xbox One at a latter date.

name: Little Traders
summary: Jump into the crazy 1920's stock market and help Mrs Mueller and her friends invest their inheritances, salaries and pocket money wisely.

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 2
summary: A new girl is in town, Yuki appears! Join Kairi and Ranko as they do everything they can to make this mysterious gamer girl join the group. A new romance is born? A love triangle maybe? More yuri action than ever before? YES! These girls got you covered.

name: Lightspeed
summary: Lightspeed is a puzzle game, where you have a laser and an absorber. The basic idea is to rotate the laser so, that the laser beam hits the absorber.

name: Little Venture
summary:
little venture is a short platformer where you play as both a little dark rabbit-like creature named Rabitt, and a pink creature name Lóv (pronounced "love")

Rabitt is small and agile and can hold bombs, Lóv can't jump very high, but can walk through spikes, squeeze her way into walls (Lóv have no bones) and befriend fly enemies

name: Little Town Shooter VR
summary: This game is a VR shooting game. You need to get money by killing opponents and unlock more weapons. Finally find a way to defeat the final boss.

name: Light Them Up
summary: Light Them Up is an ambient PC puzzle game about constellations.

name: Life Combinations
summary: Life Combinations is advanced sandbox style life simulator with level of difficulty set to the point, that cooking typical cereals with milk is quite a challenge!

name: Limitless Hunger
summary: Limitless Hunger is a high-adrenaline retro FPS single-player experience.

name: Lilei and Han Meimei
summary: A campus simulation game full of tons of surprising interactive gameplay elements along the way.

name: Little Plane
summary: Clone of Paper Plane from WarioWare, Inc.

name: Little Lives
summary: Little Lives is a life-sim game. Balance your time between your career, education and relationships as you explore the town of Littleton.

name: LineMaze
summary: LineMaze is one of the most creative puzzle game for your brain. This brain-stimulating puzzle game, very simple, and enjoyable for all ages.

name: Little Bill Thinks Big
summary: An edutainment game aimed at younger children based on the TV cartoon Little Bill.

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica
summary: A nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring soft erotica line drawings.

name: Little Monki
summary: Little Monki is a cute and relaxing sokoban-like game, help the little cute monkey to collect all the bananas to satisfy his hungry.

name: Lillie is the Keeper
summary:
You’ve always wanted a lighthouse of your very own.
Get up, find some open space, and step into a first-of-its-kind embodied AR experience.
The year is 1905. An uncanny catastrophe maroons Lillie Flora Pine in distant Switch Rock Light Station.
Where you go, Lillie goes - across the room, up the spiral stairs, or into the drink. Explore an atmospheric world between rolling seas and endless skies. Your iPhone or iPad is your controller. Examine objects. Operate machinery. Read logbooks. And try to ignore “Mrs. Noonday.”
Because Lillie is not an ordinary hero. Only 15, she suffers from intrusive thoughts. Now, they’re her only companion.
Because Lillie is the keeper.

name: Lila's Tale
summary: Immerse yourself in a fantastic and artistic experience, inside a dungeon crawler, crafted for Virtual Reality. Explore the mysteries lying beneath the dungeon, solve chain reaction puzzles and keep Lila safe to find her lost little brother.

name: Liminal
summary: Liminal is a mind-bending puzzle game where your perspective changes every time you walk through a door.

name: Light Maze
summary: A simple casual game where you light up floor tiles in a level in order to go to the next level.

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun - Ultimate Edition
summary: Kong got himself dirty while enjoying a mango. His mom tries to force him to bathe but he's got other plans... That is to run away as far as possible. This Bundle includes the Orange DLC.

name: LightBear
summary: Play the indie, roguelike, fat bear game. Journey from the center of the maze to your freedom! Every death will only send you back. Can you escape the clutches of the Golden Apiary?

name: Line Dots
summary: Line Dots it's minimalist and challenging puzzle where the colored dots must be connected by a line without crossing them.

name: LibreCars
summary: Librecars is a multiplayer online game. You play in teams two on two. Your team need to steal an enemy flag three times.

name: Little Drift
summary: Little drift is a racing game. The goal of the game is to score the most points. There are 4 levels available. In the presence of 9 cars with tuning.

name: Limkin
summary: Match as many blocks as you can!

name: Lightning Legend: Daigo no Daibouken
summary: The setting takes place in the Japan-inspired Kingdom of Japone, where, around 450 years before the story starts, the Demon King Dragless rampaged through the lands until a young hero defeated and sealed him away. After centuries of slumber, Dragless is now showing signs of awakening, and it's now up to the 14-years old Daigo Raioh, descendant of the young hero, to defeat the monster once and for all. Meanwhile, other talented fighters will set out, some for reasons related to Dragless (like Terrific Forelock, the bodyguard and childhood friend of Princess Mirona, who's out to save her after she has been kidnapped by the Demon King), others not at all (like Misa Atago, who goes on a trip to ease the pain of her break-up with her boyfriend). In the end, all of them will learn about Dragless and realize how serious the situation is.

name: Linehot Putin: All Stars
summary: Extremely political game in 5 acts, highlighting the problems of global scope through the prism of Russian reality.

name: Light of Mine
summary:
Light of Mine will leave your head spinning in terror. Experience 360 degrees of VR terror as you use your candle to explore an ancient temple with danger lurking in the darkness.

Light of Mine is made by nonPareil Studios. We are a studio that provides better futures for adults on the autism spectrum. #PoweredbyAutism

name: Lighton: Duo
summary: A challenging puzzle game. The only goal, is to turn on the lights.

name: Liminality
summary: Enter the Backrooms in virtual reality. Explore the endless liminal spaces, record with your camcorder, and hope that you’re alone.

name: Little Life: Island Tales
summary: Imagine leaving behind endless meetings and the constant ping of "99+ notifications," and embarking on a brand new life in a picturesque seaside town. This is the promise of Little Life: Island Tales – an opportunity to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and return to a simpler way of living.

name: Little Rock, MI
summary: You're Troy, a rundown Park Ranger in the infamous Ishskwaday State Park, in Little Rock, Michigan. You spend your Sunday nights running drinking kids off their cabins and talking to your best friend Juno over a walkie talkie. Tonight is just like any other night, except there's something on the loose. Will you find it?

name: LightCube
summary: First-person puzzle game in the tradition of science fiction and set in the year 2202 in a mysterious monolith.

name: Light Touch: Pixel Block Escape
summary: Light Touch brings fluid gaming to the next level.

name: Light of Darkness
summary: A 3D platformer by 1Thunder.

name: Lisa: The Pointless
summary: LISA: The Pointless is in equal parts a story about a garbage man trying to run away from the world and the story of that very world he is trying to escape.

name: Little Racer
summary: Little Racer is a dynamic racing game and a great adventure harking back to your childhood. Enjoy various tracks, avoid obstacles and speed for the win. Take the wheel, choose a kart and start the wild ride!

name: Liwertown: Rebirth
summary: It's the middle of the night and a zombie pandemic just broke in this dark 2D platformer world. Explore the town, Fight zombies, Find the last survivors, and Discover who is behind the mysterious factory explosion that caused it all, all while following the story from 2 different points of view.

name: Live
summary: No one ever said that life is easy. Fight your way through it in a short story-driven mix of game genres that accompany your journey from childhood to senility. What challenges will you stand up against? Will you earn what should be yours? Will you find out what it means to Live?

name: Lizardmen
summary: A sidescrolling platformer for PC.

name: Little Army Manager
summary: Build and customize your army to battle against waves of enemies. Strategize and use spells to outsmart your foes. Upgrade your units and power to ensure victory. Simple to play, yet full of depth and challenge.

name: Living Books: Dr. Seuss's ABC
summary: The magic of Dr. Seuss's popular books comes to life in this fun-filled introduction to the ABCs of reading. Click on a noun and see its picture. Click on a verb to see an action. It's easy for kids to replay a favorite part, skip ahead and learn more than 600 different words while they play. Introduce your children to Dr. Seuss's wondrous world today.

name: Limiter
summary: Save the galaxy from neon aliens!

name: Lightman
summary: Help Lightman through the levels, avoid traps by collecting the maximum amount of coins.

name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Vinyl Edition
summary: Life is Strange: Before the Storm is a new three-part, standalone adventure set three years before the first game in the BAFTA award-winning franchise. You play as sixteen-year-old Chloe Price who forms an unlikely friendship with Rachel Amber, a beautiful and popular girl destined for success. When Rachel learns a secret about her family that threatens to destroy her world, it is her newfound friendship with Chloe that gives her the strength to carry on. No longer alone the girls must confront each other's demons and together, find a way to overcome them.

name: Life Crush Story
summary: Life Crush Story is a life simulation game based on match 3 block games. You can grow and dream through simple challenges and mini games in Life Crush Story. You will work hard to make your dreams come true. From a baby to a student to the unemployed, the various situations we encounter over time make the game more interesting. Several works with portraits of young and sad people await you. Of course, getting a good job is just as difficult as it is in the real world. Destiny cards represent various aspects of happiness and sadness, and make the game more lively and unpredictable. You only live once! Your youth is gone, but in Life Crush Story you can live as many times as you want! Who knows, maybe you'll have a revelation about life after so many repetitions?

name: Light Trail Rush
summary: Light Trail Rush is an arcade-style hybrid of vehicular brawler and free-flow 3D space flight.

name: Liquid
summary: Liquid is a surreal adventure game. When Emma, the actress girlfriend of scientist Albert, dies strangely, police detective Todd investigates the unsolved case, and bizarrely Emma's body appears out of nowhere within many time and space.

name: Like a Hot Knife Through Butter
summary: Game by pancelor, made for the Astra Idiom Jam

name: Little Walker
summary: Journey your way high and low, far and wide, just for the heck of it. Meet weirdos along the way. Explode things. Explode them good. It's a super quirky semi-retro platform-adventure.

name: LinearChicken
summary: Feed chickens and animals without being able to change direction while moving...

name: Liminal Spaces Jam
summary: A community map Jam inspired by images and architecture of eerie, surreal, and often bizarre spaces

name: Light from Above
summary: Light from Above is a canceled Christian MMORPG made by Scott Cawthon in 2006.

name: Little Dog
summary: Little Dog - the original 2D platformer with attractive graphics, suitable for people of absolutely all ages. In this game you have to pass the levels for a small, but quite brave dog. Your main task is to collect the bones for the dogs. After you collect all the bones in the level, you will have the dog house, passing through you will be at the next level. Going through the levels, be careful because they are hiding many dangers, such as sharp stones, the evil plants, and bats.

name: Lightlike
summary: A clickless, textless ascension adventure~

name: Links: Championship Course - Pinehurst Country Club
summary: Links: Championship Course: Pinehurst Resort & Country Club is an golf course add-on for Links: The Challenge of Golf. The add-on features Pinehurst #2 course of Pinehurst Country Club, located in Pinehurst, North Carolina, USA.

name: Lifelong
summary: Lifelong is a first-person adventure game about the bureaucratic empire and the meaninglessness of certain jobs. You play as Marcel Dämlich, an employee of Scopesoft, a complex and labyrinthine company.

name: Lilith Hall
summary: 080 is the pride of Lilith Hall. She does exactly as she's told, she get's perfect grades, and she's never lost a single battle. All her life she was taught the only thing that matters is her future Ringmaster; but when an outsider is brought in, she gets a taste of what the outside world looks like. She must choose between a temptation she's never known, or the life she's always wanted.

name: Life's Playground
summary: Life's Playground is the board game with a unique blend of familiar mechanics from Monopoly, Life, PayDay, combined together with a flavor all its own!

name: Little Cherub
summary:
This Little Cherub is a real brat and this time he’s gone too far... 
His boss decided it’s time to prove he’s worthy of paradise and sent him down to hell! 
Help him elevate himself back to paradise

name: Li'l Pac-Man
summary: Li'l Pac-Man is a handheld LCD game released by Playskool in 2000. It is a very basic game intended for toddlers and preschoolers, which plays like a simplified version of Kaboom! for Atari 2600. The handheld was only test marketed in select K-Mart stores, and is very hard to find today.

name: Little Moneybags
summary: Little Moneybags is a business simulator for money lovers. It's super simple to play yet hard to master. Now, you can experience an adventure journey from moneyless to a super billionaire. Just start your business, maintain it for a while and let the cash flow to your pocket.

name: Lihue
summary: Lihue is a narrative adventure that takes place in the dream of a 26-year-old trans girl. Through her memories you will know her deepest desires and fears. Explore the landscapes of her mind to discover the reasons that led her to undertake this journey into the dream world.

name: Little Herbal Baker
summary: Little Herbal Baker is a cozy and laid-back game where you play as Lilia, a novice baker who has freshly arrived in a town called ‘MILKYWOOD’ in the fantastical world. Taking over a bakery formerly managed by a master baker, you are now embarking on your journey to become a master baker.

name: Life is Pointless
summary: Earn points in an attempt to find meaning in your normally pointless existence.

name: Lift It
summary:
Lift It is a fresh and dynamic game where you have to train your character in order to gain stats.
Every Gym exercise helps gaining a specific stat.
Increasing your stats will help you to beat your enemies when travelling from the main island (Gym Island) to the other islands.
Beat the 8 gym owners in order to get money, that could be used to buy integrators or weapons.
You can also fight against other players in a 1 vs 1 sword fight!

name: Life is Not the End
summary: Help the hero get out of limbo. Get to level 25 and learn its history. Jump on the platforms. Beware of shurikens and shoot the activators. Search the level for the entrance to the next level, but be careful! Platforms are destructible - do not make unnecessary movements!

name: Liight
summary: Liight is a puzzle solving game where the pieces are colored lights and the goal is to make cool music! Anyone can play!

name: Life Quest 2: Metropoville
summary: Life Quest 2: Metropoville is a game developed by Big Fish Games. It has simulation, time management and strategy elements.

name: Light Unseen
summary: An underground adventure with magic and fantasy-like monsters with a story where actions affect the outcome

name: Little Octopus
summary: Take control of your very own reversible octopus plushie! How high can you bounce?

name: Lift: The Last Days of The Westwind
summary: An interactive VR narrative adventure in which you operate a fully interactive elevator, meet fascinating characters, and make decisions that change their lives, and the fate of the hotel forever.

name: Light Pollution
summary: One big map with lots of enemies, but most of them are low health ones. Is very difficult on UV however, so maybe you will try HMP first. ﻿

name: Life on Mars?
summary: A game written by Hugo Labrande for the 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Lights Out: TPP Shooter
summary: Planked! Survive & Thrive is a multiplayer adventure, crafting, and building game. Work together or alone to gather resources, craft items, and fight your way around the island, but beware, not all pirates are friends!

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica Valentines
summary: A nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring Valentines themed soft erotica line drawings hand drawn by LineArtBabe, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Limite Limite
summary: Limite Limite is a game whose goal is to create the funniest card associations.

name: Like A Dino!
summary: Simple, fun and clean! Like a Dino!

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica 4
summary: Nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring soft erotica line drawings (lesbian girls) hand drawn by LineArtBabe, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Lilly's Rescue
summary: Lilly's Rescue is a 3D platform liner game, Solve the puzzles by moving the platforms, improve your skills throughout the game and find your kitten and bring him home.

name: Lifeguard
summary: Players control a lifeguard as she avoids myriad obstacles.

name: Live a Hero
summary: A turn-based command battle RPG game presented by the LGBT game app brand "Lifewonders"!

name: Little Dasher!
summary: Little Dasher! is a mini-game that offers an average of 30-45 minutes of enjoyable and challenging platform game experience with fantastic music. Please note that the time depends on your reflexes and abilities.

name: Little Cities: Bigger!
summary: Little Cities: Bigger! reimagines classic city building from the ground-up for VR - with a cozy colourful twist!

name: Lil Jump 2
summary:
Stack em up, till it all comes crashing down! Lil Jump 2 is a game all about stacking blocks as high as possible! How high can you stack before it all comes crashing down?
Jump as your favorite character with simple 1-tap jump controls. Jumping on a block = 1 stack.

name: Lifeless Horizon
summary: In this intense and thrilling zombie survival game, players must use their wits and quick reflexes to stay alive in a world overrun by the undead. With limited resources and endless hordes of zombies, players must scavenge for supplies, build their defenses, and work together with other survivors to stay alive. But beware, as danger lurks around every corner and any misstep can mean certain death. Will you be able to survive the zombie apocalypse?

name: Little Islanders
summary: Your people need you, and you've been summoned to protect and guide them in their time of need. You must help them settle the island that they now find themselves inhabiting. Help them build their town, protect them, and ensure that they thrive.

name: LittleBigPlanet 2 Toy Story Level Kit DLC
summary:
Toy Story Level Kit is a DLC for LittleBigPlanet 2 which is based on Toy Story. It was later removed from the store for unknown reasons. On 27th August 2014, this pack returned along with the Incredibles Level Kit, which was put back on a week later.

PRICING & AVAILABILITY
Release Date:
3 Aug 2011
Release dates may vary, depending on your territory.

Product Compatibility: LittleBigPlanet 2
DLC Categories: Backgrounds, Costumes, Decorations, Levels, Materials, Music, Objects, Sound effects, Stickers

CONTENTS
7 Brand New Toy Story Levels
5 Materials, 6 Objects, 10 Decorations, 149 Stickers.
2 New Music Tracks and 1 New Interactive Music Track
1 New Level Background

name: Little Farm
summary: Have a down-home good time at Little Farm, where you'll use your puzzle-solving and matching skills to help The Normans adjust to farm life and grow truck-loads of vegetables!

name: Little Medusa
summary:
The game is only available through the company's website in a physical cartridge for the listed platforms.

"Become a diety with a very bad hair day in this action puzzler. The Titans have escaped their eternal prisons and transformed Artemiza, a young goddess, into a gorgon. Now she must petrify enemies, create paths, and dodge traps in her battle to save Mount Olympus.

name: Live Factory
summary:
Action-adventure platformer. Great graphics. Explore the underground factory!

Explore an underground factory hidden from eyes, filled with dangers, secrets and spatial puzzles. Use your wits and reaction to reveal all the secrets!

Excellent 3D graphics and music will immerse you in the atmosphere at their best. Responsive controls will help you to run away from trouble and make accurate jumps to the intended goal.

Features:
• Interesting gameplay
• Unusual visual style and beautiful 3D graphics
• New game mechanics and situations during your passing through
• Game made with a soul

name: Living Books: D.W. the Picky Eater
summary: D.W. the Picky Eater is an interactive storybook and an educational game for children aged three to seven. It is based on the 1995 children's book by Marc Brown. Players follow D.W., Arthur Read the aardvark's sister, who dislikes a lot of food because it looks disgusting to her. Items she does not like include pickles, tomatoes, pineapple, spinach, salad, parsnips etc. The story is told through narration and text on the screen and meanwhile many hotspots in the environment can be clicked for a short animation. There are also several mini-games such as decorating D.W.'s playhouse along with a game, soaking gophers with the water hose, setting the table and so on.

name: Little Nemo
summary: Little Nemo is a tiny 2D Open World game inspired by good Retro titles. Talk, Run, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Magic World full of Mistery and Color. Little Nemo is a modern Maze Runner Adventure. Can you find the Keys before your Time runs out?

name: Little Master: Raikuban no Densetsu
summary: Little Master is the first game in the Little Master series of RPGs. It was only released in Japan, although it went through a localization process to be released in North America but was cancelled.

name: Light & Dark Bundle
summary:
Blue Isle Studios is proud to present The Light and Dark Bundle - A collection of Blue Isle's indie hits: Valley and Slender: The Arrival.

Our Light and Dark Bundle brings you one of the scariest titles on the Xbox One and some eye bleach to help you sleep at night.
Fight for survival and embark on a terrifying journey in Slender: The Arrival, then run jump and hookshot through the beautiful rocky mountains of Valley.

This pack includes:

Slender: The Arrival for Xbox One
Valley for Xbox One

name: Little-Known Galaxy
summary: Join Space Alliance as a new captain-in-training and work with your crew to solve the mysteries of an ancient relic found on the Grey Planet. Little-Known Galaxy is a cozy single-player RPG space adventure full of friendly characters, exploration, crafting, and farming.

name: Lio
summary: Unravel the story of a boy who wakes up in a mysterious world without any memories.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Garden Puzzle
summary: Choose 1 of 8 pictures and put them together from 6, 12 or 24 pieces. Through great fun, take care of your children's small motor development, teach them patience and perseverance.

name: Light House Puzzle
summary: "Light House Puzzle" is a strategy game with a simple mechanics but with moderate difficulty that will give you great fun during many levels.

name: Line Rider
summary: Line Rider is an internet game. Versions are available for Microsoft Silverlight and for Flash. It was originally created by Boštjan Čadež (also known as "fsk"), a Slovenian student. Originally appearing on DeviantArt on September 23, 2006, Line Rider quickly became an internet phenomenon.

name: Little Pink Best Buds
summary: Little Pink Best Buds is a thriller exploration adventure made in the Amnesia Fortnight 2014 of Double Fine.

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica 5
summary: Nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring erotic line drawings, hand drawn by LineArtBabe, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica Christmas
summary: A nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring Christmas themed soft erotica line drawings hand drawn by LineArtBabe, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Little Smart Planet
summary: Studying is fun. Educational games to review Mathematics, English and Language for children from 6 to 12 years old.

name: Liar, Lioness
summary: Who serves a servant? [A fairy visual novel about power]

name: Lifo
summary: A dynamic puzzle game!

name: Lightdancer
summary: Embark on a mystical journey through the enchanted forest as a Lightdancer, an elite archer bound by oath to restore the balance of light and shadow. Wield your Soliflare arrow, a unique weapon infused with the power of both sun and moon, capable of setting ablaze both matter and malevolent spirits.

name: Limbs
summary: Limbs is a one to two player dexterity game where you take control over the limbs of a string puppet. Immerse yourself in a handcrafted world where moving each limb individually makes for challenging but rewarding and hilarious gameplay.

name: Living World Racing
summary:
Living World Racing is a boat racing game with a cast of eight animals racing in the Living World universe, serving as an advergame.

It features three game modes (single race, time trial and challenge) and three difficulty levels (beginner, experienced and advanced) to choose from. As with many of the developer's games most of the content is locked from the start : for example only the four first characters can be chosen when you first start a game : Mr Mouse, Mr Hamster, Mr Rat and Mr Guinea Pig. Other characters, boats, tracks and race classes become available after collecting a number of stars.

The other power-ups are extra lives, power boosts and nutritious items, such as red donuts, green puffs or yellow triangles. Do not forget to "drive" over speed stripes to boost your boat, but also collect weapons. These are carrot missiles and pumpkin bombs. But if you use an invincibility shield, no one can use these weapons against you.

From the option menu, you can set up sound and music, but also controls and use 8 save slots. As a side feature of the game, the last menu choice gives pet information to kids : chinchillas, mice, Guinea pigs, ferrets, dwarf rabbits, rats, hamsters and rabbits.

name: Little Arena
summary: Little Arena is an action-RPG with the opportunity to create your own character build. Think tactically, choose your talents wisely, to complete the game you will have to die more than once while finding a better strategy for the battle.

name: Line Bubble 2
summary: Enjoy exciting gameplay together with Line's Brown and Cony, as you toss bubbles around to solve puzzles!

name: Little Packaging Crew
summary: Little Packaging Crew is a casual strategy controller-supported game. Join fellow packaging workers to deliver the max number of packages before the end of each work day. Protect your crew workstations against thieves and giants. Provide food and drinks to keep your crew productive and happy.

name: LipTrip: My Boss is My Heat Suppressant
summary: A boss x employee Omegaverse yuri romance where the physical comes before the emotional.

name: Littlest Pet Shop: Spring
summary: Littlest Pet Shop Spring bounces you right into the middle of all the fun in the Littlest Pet Shop world. Can care for and play with your pets, enjoying mini-games, accessories, and playsets through four captivating worlds, including the enchanting Spring realm,

name: Lightning
summary: Fast-paced competitive FPS with character abilities. combining realistic settings with superpowers. geared toward esport.

name: Liberal Crime Squad
summary: A humorous RPG/Strategy game where players use crime to further their liberal agenda and fight conservatives.

name: Limit of Defense
summary:
Limit Of Defense combines the arcade game on the type "Tower Defense" military strategy.
A simple and addictive time killer.

name: Little Red Riding Hood A
summary: The classic children's story, as an interactive point and click game with gorgeous artwork. It is a simple game, but has two different endings.

name: Like Clockwork
summary: I made a JRPG. I fucking hate JRPGs.

name: Lightyear Frontier: Supporter Pack: Pioneer Bundle
Little Ninja
summary: You are a young 8 year old boy named Liam, you recently got a ninja mask for a birthday present! You must protect the house from evil doers! You must be sneaky, and make sure to not get caught!

name: Links 2003
summary: The newest version for the Links golf series featuring new swing types like the real time swing, ultimate realistic graphics, career play playing with real golf players or created ones, a strong multiplayer community increases the online play experience and a practice facility for the new players.

name: Little Demon
summary: Take care of a little demon, always evolving, make it good or evil.

name: Living Books: Ruff's Bone
summary:
Ruff's Bone is the sixth Living Books game (or fifth if you were to go by the PC release dates) released in 1994. Written by Eli Noyes and co-produced by Colossal Pictures, it is exclusively Living Books' second original story not being an adaption from any pre-existing titles (first if not counting Mark Schlitching's adaption of The Tortoise and the Hare).

The story is about a dog named Ruff, who fetches his bone that was thrown by his master.

name: Lily's Epic Quest for Lost Gems
Li'l Taffer
summary: A procedurally generated stealth adventure! Developed in slightly more than 7 days for the 2022 7dfps and PROCJAM game jams.

name: Life on Earth: Reimagined
summary: Life on Earth: Reimagined is a run-and-gun action/platform game released in 2023 by Kai Magazine Software. It combines fast-paced side-scrolling combat with influences from Contra, Shinobi 3, and Rolling Thunder. The game features three difficulty settings, plus Arcade and Heroic modes, and includes a cyberpunk setting with music by Savaged Regime.

name: Lizard Quest
summary:
Help out a tiny community of lizards and friends by doing small favors for them

Gather musicians to start a band, clean a dusty home, find a healthy outlet for an angry scorpion, and many more!

name: Little Patissier: Cake no Oshiro
summary: Little Patissier: Cake no Oshiro is an Action game, developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Little Wizard Sally
summary: Little Wizard Sally is a Retro Magical RPG game.

name: Light Paradox
summary: Light Paradox is an J-RPG/Survival 2D pixelart game. The story behind the creation of the universe, the information control and the individual character storyline mix all together into this complex world.

name: Lil' Arena
summary: We Break the Mold of online PvP games. Customize your Avatars, Draft your Abilities and Engage in 6-minute-short, free-for-all Matches in the Afterlife!

name: Little Bear
summary: Venture into a fantasy world in search of honey for your family.

name: Lich Defense 2
summary:
A solid TowerDefense game with a hook!
Be the Lich king and manage your deadly towers and cast devastating magic in this incredibly addictive real-time strategy tower type defense game!
Enjoy large-scale spectacular battles!

name: Little Stars
summary: A relaxing puzzle game set in the ambience of the night sky.

name: Little Things Remastered
summary:
Little Things Remastered is a hidden object game with a unique style and beautiful soundtrack. Search colourful patchworks for thousands of little things, solving jigsaw puzzles along the way.

Featuring remastered artwork and soundtracks from Little Things (2009) and Little Things Forever (2012). Packaged together so fans can continue to play forever, for free.

name: Little Helper of the House Kitchen
summary:
'Little Helper of the House' game series are taking place in the rooms and in the living places of our big house. 2 heroes of our cute family are wearing their little helper aprons and learning how to do the houseworks by helping their parents with fun.
In this episode of our series of “little helper of the house”, we have academically and socially designed the game aiming a solid improvement and provide support in the learning curve of our pre-elementary level children by experiencing everyday duties and bonding with their parents in achieving them.

name: Little Scavenger
