summary: Fight, explore, die in a kingdom of corrupted robot. Grow stronger by finding armor, using trinkets and rescuing npcs to increase your fighting chance. Find out the secrets of the world , the reasons for the spread of the corruption and why you are immune.

name: Live Adventure
summary: Throw yourself into an exciting adventure! Live Adventure is a 2nd person game where you follow the journey of two young explorers, Lence and Reel in search of their parents. Solve the mysteries of a lost civilization while exploring a lush forest littered with mysterious ruins.

name: Lilly Knight and the Three Cities of Lust
summary: Follow Lilly as she frees the world of Elustra using her powerful sexual skills and insatiable lusty appetite. Explore beautiful environments and complete spectacular sexual challenges in an Epic Erotic Fantasy-Adventure like none you have experienced before.

name: Life in the Analog Age: Rainy Day
summary: Can you survive one afternoon of Life In The Analog Age?

name: Lilly's
summary:
A 2D game set in a fantasy town inspired by the 1700s France or Italy.

You play as Lilly, a young girl who is the owner of a butcher shop that sells very special types of meat. Every night Lilly goes out with the big butcher's knife to restock the shop, by murdering the citizens of the town.

Lilly has been left by herself and been through some gruesome events, she is trying to reach out to her mother. Writing letters to her, asking for help and support but also about what she is doing at night.

There are good and bad people in the town, like anywhere else. You need to keep a balance otherwise there will be consequences. You also need to be careful to not get arrested by the police, because what Lilly is doing is actually a crime.

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol.1: Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
summary: It’s the ultimate fanservice experience! A 2-in-1 yuri lewd adventure featuring Kairi and Ranko from LIP! Lewd Idol Project on a relaxing trip to the hot springs, and a hot visit to the beach! Join the fun and enjoy your day off while having a lot of girl-on-girl action! Are you gonna miss it?

name: Life is Paradise
summary: "Life is Paradise" is an RPG life management simulation game with a high degree of freedom, where you can build your own village, breed livestock, venture into mines, and make friends with all kinds of people! As the protagonist, you can do whatever you want here!

name: Linked
summary: Relaxing, minimalistic 2d-puzzle game.

name: Living Books: Aesop's The Tortoise and the Hare
summary: An educational game which reads the story of "The Tortoise and the Hare" to young players while including point-and-click elements.

name: Live Hard, Die Hard
summary: I can't live like this! But, I won't die like this either! Do you want a mix of hard battles and cutting-edge medical treatment?! Then Live Hard, Die Hard is the strategy game for you! Use violence and science to stop the invasion and get those pesky aliens off of our planet!

name: Liza: The Ungrateful
summary: LIZA: The Ungrateful is a story about a woman who neglects the safety of her baby during pregnancy and seeks to find the one who caused the flash.

name: Little Party
summary: Little Party is a video game where the player controls a mother stuck at their daughter's birthday party.

name: Little League Baseball: Championship Series
summary:
Little League Baseball! It's the game every kid in America loves to play... And now you can experience the fun and excitement of Little League Baseball at any time of the year, rain or shine, day or night - right in your own living room!
Create your own winning team of players with batting, fielding, pitching, and running characteristics you can tailor to your own specifications. Then challenge a friend or the computer to a worldwide Championship Series tournament.
You are in full control of your players: Jump or dive for a tricky catch... Choose a full swing or a bunt for your batter... Shift fielders at will... Send in a pinch hitter or runner... Select a fast ball, slow ball, or curve ball for your pitcher... Steal a base if you dare... Or you might even try a squeeze play!
Little League Baseball has been an American institution for 50 years - and you can be a part of it. If you're a Little League fan or a Little League player - or if you ever wanted to be - here's your chance to go for the glory!

name: Liquid Light
summary: A relaxing 1bit puzzle game set in a world where all the light is liquid. There are all sorts of creatures in the darkness, waiting for the light to bring them form, but no need to worry, they are quite tame.

name: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth - Special Outfit: Hello Work Employee (Ichiban)
summary: An add-on for Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth containing an outfit for Ichiban worn during battle.

name: Little Martian
summary: Little Martian is a game of exploration, resource-gathering, base-building, and survival. You have crash-landed on an uninhabited planet and your spaceship is very badly damaged. You'll need to find the resources to repair and rebuild all of the destroyed parts.

name: Lisa: Definitive Edition
summary: Explore Olathe and its dark and twisted secrets with Lisa: The Definitive Edition, including the original story-driven RPG game Lisa: The Painful and its sequel Lisa: The Joyful

name: Lightning Duru
summary: Lightning Duru is a classic 2D shooting game. Players will control two airships from “X War Office” to eliminate the enemies encountered in different missions.

name: Liar Liar 2
summary: A remake of the original Liar Liar 2 with new sprites, backgrounds, story and CGs from guest artists.

name: Lion Pig: Frozen Run
summary:
Lion Pig: Frozen Run is a free-to-play endless runner / platform adventure set in a beautiful pixel world. It's time to put on your running shoes because Lion Pig is ready to race through the Frozen Valley! Run and jump as fast as possible while avoiding traps such as giant snowballs and crystal shards. Be careful not to fall down a snow pit while gazing upon the frost-covered trees and mountains as the sun and moon pass over the horizon. The game has a beautiful retro style and some charming winter music you will surely fall in love with.
This is is the ultimate test for your racing skills. Upgrade your score multiplier and keep running to earn the highest score on the Leaderboards!

name: Lily Bard Mysteries: The Body in Shakespeare Park
Living in the Ending World
summary: "Living in the Ending World" is a simple text-based adventure game. Make do with meager rations, establish a base of operation, travel through a crumbling world, build tools to protect yourself, preserve your sanity and somehow survive. It's that kind of game.

name: Link and Spell
summary:
Link and Spell is a mashup of the classic snake and boggle games.
Form words by eating the red letters that spawn on the playfield.
Change the snake’s direction by swiping.
Avoid hitting the white tiles and stay within the playfield bounds.
Double tap anywhere to commit your word.
Valid words earn you points, extra time and clear the playfield from white tiles.

name: Liftopia: One more!
summary: The big adventure of a square creature!It is a somewhat nostalgic action game drawn with dots.

name: Little Ninja Brothers
summary: Little Ninja Brothers, known in Japan as Super Chinese 2, is a 1989 video game developed and published by Culture Brain for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1989 in Japan, 1990 in the United States, and 1991 in Europe. It is the second game in the Super Chinese series. The plot follows two young ninjas, Jack and Ryu, attempting to find out the mysterious reason for the invasion of Chinaland by Blu Boltar. It was the second game in the series, preceded by Kung-Fu Heroes, and followed up by a sequel Super Ninja Boy, released on the Super NES. There were also two Ninja Boy spin-off games released for the Game Boy in both regions. A manga adaption of the game was serialized in early issues of video game magazine GamePro.

name: Life's Too Short GB: A Christmas Spirit
summary: An enhanced version of the Playdate classic, now for Game Boys! Explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles.

name: Life of Rome
summary:
Life of Rome is a third and first-person MMORPG set in the world of 320AD Rome. Choose to be Roman allegiance or Rebels; designed to emphasise roleplay and community using family systems and player-driven politics. 

Fortes Fortuna Iuvat - Fortune Favours the Bold

name: Light For Plants
summary: Light for Plants is a physics-based puzzle game in which you must direct and manipulate a light beam to reach the plants and save them from the endless darkness.

name: Line of War
summary: Line of War - is a classic 3D shooter with surviving elements where the story of one military man during the Vietnam War is told.

name: Light of Thel: Glory of Cepheus
Little Devourers
summary: Little Devourers is a casual and relaxing game in which you control a black hole that does a great cleaning.

name: Lightrise
summary: Lightrise is a skill-based, player vs. player combat game which at the core is focused on fun, fluent and fast-paced combat. Lightrise gives players a combat experience not quite like anything else available out there.

name: Liminal Exploration
summary: Traverse a handful of cursed & elegiac worlds.

name: Lil Baby Poop's Nightmares
summary: A cute, family-friendly, fast-paced and challenging action platform game in a vintage rubberhose cartoon style, accompanied by old-school jazz music. Find your way through every level, avoid traps and fight off creatures to eventually wake up from each of 13 nightmares.

name: Livid Meadow
summary: Livid Meadow is a short, story driven action platformer.

name: Lifting Journey
summary: Lifting Journey is a point-and-click adventure that takes you to an island above the sky. Join the little girl, Yuki from the land of balloons as she explores unique lands to save her missing dog, Coco. Solve various puzzles and unfold this journey of discovery.

name: Line of Defense
summary: An upcoming F2P MMOFPS from Derek Smart.

name: Little Duck's Big Adventure: A Bitsy RPG
summary: Be a duck! Grind for levels! Save the world?

name: Line Rider JavaScript
summary: Line Rider JavaScript is a remake of the well-known flash game Line Rider in JavaScript by David Lu. It has features such as playback scrubbing, music synchronization tools, and onion skinning. It has features planned to be implemented soon such as cloud-based autosaving and live collaboration.

name: Little Witch
summary:
Ablex' first game follows the titular Little Witch on her quest to become a full-blown witch. In a platformer/adventure hybrid she has to explore woods and caves, learn new spells and solve the problems of numerous people and magical creatures on her way. The game's mechanics and progression are similar to some of the Wonder Boy episodes, with slightly more emphasis on "RPG elements". It is also text heavy for this kind of game, and pages over pages on a special story book screen are no rarity.

The game world is divided into seperate areas, but some of the dungeons are huge and map-drawing is almost obligatory. Most of the witch's spells are used to fight the many imaginative enemies, but "talk" is a spell too, which results in frequent inconvenient switching in the menu. Without some serious grinding, most enemies are capable to kill the witch fast, resulting in many frustrating game over screens, but at least it is possible to save the game at any time. Yet the function should be handled with care, because it is also possible to save in unwinnable situations.

Little Witch has enough inspiration and fun ideas to be a very entertaining little game (it even uses pictures as doors to jump through between areas, two years before Super Mario 64), however done by a bunch of university students, the technical execution leaves much to be desired. There's hardly ever been choppier scrolling in a retail game and everything flickers like crazy, making enemies much harder than they need to be and not seldom rendering the game almost unplayable. The potential for a great game was there, and the graphics look really nice (if amateurish), but it would have needed a bit more programming expertise to truly shine.

name: Life In Planet
summary: Build, arrive, and move into new regions and planets in the depths of space. Whether you will establish a colony and trade or train soldiers and fight, everything is in your hands.

name: Life of Harry
summary: A maze-action game developed by John Hopper and published by Cascade Games for ZX Spectrum.

name: Life of Ocean
summary: In life of ocean, you will start from a desert island.you must do what you can to survive.when you don't need to worry about food or clothing, there are countless treasures waiting for you under the ocean.take the Treasure Map you found, camposs and shovel, become the richest adventurer!

name: Lineage W
summary: Lineage W is the fifth major installment of the Lineage series that uses all elements from the Lineage game and shares it with some elements from the Lineage II title. Taking place 130 years after Lineage 1, the game features full 3D graphics and a quarter-view camera.

name: Light Repair Team #4
summary: Light Repair Team #4 is a light-reflection puzzle game where you play as a light-pipe repair person. Figure out how to properly bounce, combine and split light so that you can return power to nearby buildings.

name: LittleBigPlanet 2: Muppets Premium Level Kit
summary: The audience whispers excitedly as the lights dim in Muppet Theatre. Indeed, tonight’s Muppet Show features quite the special guest. It is none other than Little Big Planet’s very own Sackboy! But beware; the mysterious Phantom has plans to get in the way. With the help of new inventions – Attract-O-Gel and Attract-O-Tweak – it’ll be up to you to help the Muppet cast put on the show of a lifetime. On with the show!

name: Little Mall Tycoon
summary: Let's make your dream mall! Hire great employees and train them. Sell everything that customers want. Upgrade your mall and prepare to deal with unexpected events. Be the best mall in the world.

name: Little World
summary: Explore myths in 'Little World,' a strategic blend of auto-chess and tower defense. Assemble heroes from legend to outwit opponents in a magical realm. Each battle tests strategy, every win showcases your tactical genius.

name: Listen
summary: There is no interface, it's all sound. The biggest feature of "Listen" is that there is no screen display throughout the process, and everything is entered by the keyboard and mouse movement.

name: List
summary: “List” is a single player first-person horror game that takes your character back to grandma’s house. As a requirement of your inheritance you must survive five nights in her home. She’s left you with a set of instructions to aid in your survival.

name: Lightracer Spark: Stars Will
summary: The second free DLC of Lightracer: Spark. You will travel to the frontline of cosmic warfare, witnessing the decline and rebirth of a stellar civilization, and making crucial decisions that determine the fate of all beings in the universe.

name: Like a Fashionista
summary: A virtual fashion and decorating game where you can take care of your own Fashionista and help her evolve. It's up to you to find her the man of her dreams, dress her and feed her to make her the most popular Fashionista!

name: Lionfish Reef Patrol
summary: A realistic lionfish hunting game that saves reef fish from the invasive lionfish. The life like motion, sound and visuals gives you the feeling of being underwater and hunting the lionfish. Scuba your way around 3 dive sites and explore what its like to save the reefs! Go on Lionfish Reef Patrol...

name: Little Wizard
summary: A one-on-one fighting game for the GP32.

name: Little Miss Lonely
summary: Little Miss Lonely is a game about childhood, fear and the relationships. You play as nine year old Robin in this short, narrative driven side-scrolling game.

name: Little Adventure
summary: Little Adventure is a 2D platformer adventure game with beautiful graphics. You have to play as an assistant to the blacksmith named Ben and, together with the blacksmith, go to the castle to the king to give the legendary sword! Immerse yourself in a fantasy world full of danger and adventure!

name: Liam's Journey
summary: Find young Liam's way home while exploring a mysterious cave full of danger in this pixel art action platformer. Pull your way out using your grappling hook, meet unique characters and overcome hundreds of hand crafted challenges to decide Liam's fate

name: Lily's Well
summary: It is a rainy night in the Spring of 2005. Lily is left home alone after her Papa put her to bed. She is awoken by a cry for help outside her window. It is coming from the well. Help Lily gather rope to go down the well and save the poor soul trapped down there.

name: LimBall
summary:
Limball Game By ASW Studio for Windows Store !

What could be in a mystery book?

The little boy starts reading the LimBall book he found in the library.

As he reads the adventures of LimBall, this incarnation protagonist is drawn into the book.

Can you help LimBall reach his goal in this unusual and fun adventure?

Unlock all levels! Share with your friends

name: Lichtreich: Willa
summary: Lichtreich: Willa is a 2D horror game with strong story focus. As a detective which dealt the most with infamous "Viper", Alex is the best choice to check his mansion. You have to find out if there any people alive? There is no time to waste, you have to check it!

name: Li Tan
summary: You wake up in a room full of mysteries, accompanied by a beautiful girl you have met before. In the following time, you will go on a heartbeat journey to the supernatural world with her.

name: Little Rocketman
summary: The aim of the game is to guide Little Rocketman to the end of each world. Control his rockets to jump from platform to platform, get to the last platform of each world to continue to the next. Play Little Rocketman game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Lionheart
summary: Lionheart is a platform game for the Amiga developed and self-published by German video game developer Thalion Software in 1993. Using a fantasy motif, the game takes place in the land of the Cat People, a race of feline humanoids, who are threatened by the evil Norka. The player assumes control of Valdyn, an outlaw swordsman who is also known as "Lionheart". Players have to fight their way through 14 levels filled with monsters and environmental hazards. Most of the gameplay is melee combat and precision platforming.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia + Cyber Protocol
summary: Explore the natural world while learning through play, then compete with your friends in a cyberpunk logic game! A great game for little ones, Little Mouse's Encyclopedia comes bundled with Cyber Protocol!

name: Little Adventurer III
summary: This is a first-person casual game that focuses on going home after helping the little girl, and a few mini-games.

name: Life in the Dorms
summary: A comedy adventure game about love, friendship, and ramen noodles.

name: Lil' Hustler
summary: Game of pool

name: Little Big Monsters
summary: Little Big Monsters is an open-world RPG with rogue-like elements following one of your world's last few powerful hero's, sent on a quest to rid the planet of monsters and their gruesome overlords that have overtaken your world from hellish dimensions.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Pond Puzzle
summary: Choose 1 of 8 pictures and put them together from 6, 12 or 24 pieces. Through great fun, take care of your children's small motor development, teach them patience and perseverance.

name: Lisa the Vegaful
summary: Lisa the Vegaful is a fangame of Lisa the Painful/Joyful set in eastern Olathe before the events of Joyful. Jerry Cracker, a gang member working for the beautiful warlord Vega Van Damn.

name: Line Play
summary: Be the best you! Make your own unique avatar and meet friends from around the world!

name: Lightpath
summary: This map is somewhat inspired by two sets with a sun in their names. A highly detailed and difficult map with over 65,000 linedefs.

name: Life on the Floating Island
summary: A role-playing game from Team Niimii.

name: Light Heroes
summary: A side scrolling shoot-em-up with a feudal Japanese, mythological/sci-fi aesthetic.

name: Living Legends: Frozen Beauty
summary: Your younger sister Elizabeth has been chosen as a successor to the throne by the Queen, however all is not what it seems and you must make your way to the castle before it is too late.

name: Lion King Simulator
summary: In this hunting simulator, you will play the role of a predator who is looking for food for himself and his family.

name: Licca-chan ni Naritai!
summary: An educational game starring Japan's premiere fashion doll, only for Sega Pico.

name: Little Chomp
summary: Little Chomp puts a physics spin on classic platforming. It was selected for Boston Indie Showcase at PAX East 2013.

name: Lilitales
summary: Branded as a traitor for losing the princess, the young knight Luna sets out on a lonely journey to rescue the princess and clear her name.

name: Little Soul
summary: A bullet hell game where the lower your health, the more damage you do.

name: Lion King 3
summary:
Lion King 3 is a platform game released for the Sega Mega Drive based, not the Disney film of the same name, but the original film itself, as a follow-up to The Lion King II. It was developed by an unknown company likely connected to Gamtec and published by X Boy.

A second release does not credit X Boy but it is unknown if it was published by another company or by X Boy without their logo.

name: Liquid Metal: Alien Attack
summary: Liquid Metal is a third-person action adventure about a robot utopia that's invaded by humans.

name: Lisa Total Investigation!
summary: Lisa Total Investigation is an adult game about corruption. Play as the future husband of Lisa, who was forced into an investigation by a mysterious Scotland Yard officer. How far will you push your fiancée to successfully complete this investigation? Beware of your most perverse desire!

name: Life of a Mercenary
summary: Lead a mercenary company seeking fame and fortune. Be honorable and help defend the kingdom or take contracts to those who pay the most. Rise to the top of the mercenary chain in this medieval story based around the events of The Great Tournament.

name: Little Puff in Dragonland
summary: LIttle Puff is lost and it's your job to guide him safety home to Dragonland.

name: LightWalk
summary: A 2D Puzzle Platformer about navigating mazes of lasers. The objective of each level is to get to the goal block, and a variety of laser types and gadgets make each challenge unique. Includes a level editor!

name: Little Eternal Chronicle
summary: Manipulate time! Let's do mischief! Helpless 10 year olds are given only one weapon: a clock. This world will soon be destroyed...

name: Living Legends: Ice Rose - Collector's Edition
summary: Novelist Edward Grand has found evidence of a terrible tragedy in the city of Rosemount and sets off to investigate in Living Legends: Ice Rose! Help Edward gather information for his new book and explore the Castle of Ice Queen in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game. Scour the frozen landscapes and thaw out important locations as you solve an intriguing mystery in Living Legends: Ice Rose!

name: Liberation Mutagenix
summary: Guide your comrades to freedom in this gravity-bending sci-fi puzzle game. Modify their genetic code, direct their movements, and provide them with the tools they need to escape.

name: Life Goals
summary:
This is a game about life. And because life is already complex enough, and games are getting harder to make, let's make it simpler and project everything onto one dimension.
In 1D, choices seem simpler, but it does not make life much easier.
Grow up. Overcome all obstacles. Reach your Life Goals.

name: Little League World Series Double Play
summary: Batter up! Play Little League Baseball in this Double Play pack featuring two full games in one! Compete with authentic equipment and in real stadiums in World Series Mode, as you play your way to the annual Little League World Series at Williamsport, Pennsylvania. Choose from 36 teams, including 8 from the U.S., 8 international teams or customize your own from 20 others. Customize your character with numerous batting, pitching and fielding styles while collecting 100's of useful unlockables. Plus, play with up to a total of 4 players in skill challenges, like Homerun Tourney, Batting Frenzy, Pitching Darts and more! Little League World Series Double Play is major league fun for the entire family!

name: Living Labyrinth
summary: An explorer has found themselves trapped in a shifting labyrinth.

name: Lit Up
summary: Position objects and lit up everywhere to complete this puzzle game.

name: Live Penalty
summary: Live Penalty is an elimination game that lets you score goals against a real human goalkeeper. Over multiple rounds you can influence a real football launcher and beat other gamers to the final round. Only in the very last round do you have full control over the machine and get to interact with your real opponent.

name: Light of Coco
summary: Play as Coco - a feline star creature. Use Coco's gentle meows to nurture the environment and ask your butterfly companions to assist you. Beware of the creatures lurking in the shadows.

name: Lights e Shades: Safìna
summary: A 2D turn-based fantasy RPG. Equipped; Grow; Aggregates; Form friendships; Uncover secrets; Fight; You decide. An original storyline, day / night cycle, freedom of action and what you do will influence the story.

name: Little Alchemy
summary: A game where players mix together elements with the goal of finding all possible combinations.

name: Living the Nightmare
summary: Living the Nightmare is a fast-paced, turn-based, Horror Roguelike about a Slasher who just met his end. Be the Faceless, a Killer slain by a would-be victim and cast into a dark, purgatorial realm. There may be a way out... but there's a lot of monsters to turn inside out first.

name: Lichenia
summary: A city building game for the Anthropocene. Reclaim the ruins of a fallen city and create a sustainable human habitat. There are no goals and no endings in Lichenia. Learn about its cryptic ecology. Grow a city like a garden.

name: Liar Liar
summary: The goal of the game is to aid Yukari, the heroine of this game to murder her boyfriend and get rid of anyone in your way! The game play should probably take roughly less than 15 minutes. There are three ways you can die, and there is only one true end.

name: Little Sound Dj
summary:
Little Sound Dj is a Game Boy music sequencer used by video game musicians, Grammy winners, and chiptune virtuosos over the world. It is regularly praised for being intuitive, fast and fun.
Features include:

4-channel, 4-bit Game Boy sound
Dual sample playback
Waveform synthesizer
Speech
Sync options (analog, Game Boy, MIDI, VST)

name: Liminal Space
summary: Welcome to Liminal Space. We have been expecting you. Choose your map and try to escape. It's up to you if you want monsters chasing you or if you want a peaceful experience with no threats. With an unsettling soundtrack and fun graphic options, you'll have a good time for a cheap price.

name: Lil Ghost Garden
summary: Take care of the garden. The window plays even if you do something else - just keep it in a corner. Features plant mutations, emoticon-based communication and chillness.

name: Little Gods
summary: As one little god in a galaxy of many, you must lead your followers from their doomed planet to a new home, at each stage of your journey: an opportunity to build belief and improve your follower's vessel, to meet with other gods and their followers, and to discover why the Fates destine your end.

name: Little Legend
summary: Little Legend is a 2D side-scrolling Adventure Game taking place in a dreamlike Open World. Craft your own Magic abilities and and follow the heartwarming story of Pimpim.

name: Life in the Machine
summary: A detective game, which involves investigating a crime scene.

name: Lightus
summary: "Lightus" is an open-world role-playing and simulation game. You will play as a traveler without a "past," embarking on an adventure in the unfamiliar land of "Seofar," exploring lost ruins around the world, searching for lost memories, and creating a new world with other travelers.

name: Light Shinobi
summary: Free your world from the darkness of the evil one

name: Little Lords of Twilight
summary:
Little Lords of Twilight is a player-versus-player, turn-based strategy game where players lead their hero and minions to victory.  
  
Each time the Sun hides behind one of the moons of Zikverländ and when it emerges to shine anew, you will be transformed and lent formidable powers.

name: Little Red Riding Hood B
summary: The classic children's story, as a top-down rpg-style game. It is a simple game, but has two different endings. Use the arrow keys to play.

name: Light Eater
summary: Light shows things that cannot be seen. It creates a comfort of the unknown. But not everything is shown in the light. Don’t be afraid of the dark. Be afraid of what’s in the dark. In this game you use the visible light spectrum to avoid unseen dangers and determine possible futures.

name: Little Chick
summary: Control the chicken's left and right balance through the mouse, and walk steadily through the long rope to the opposite mountain top.

name: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy - Expansion DLC
summary:
From the developer, Inusuku, comes a fun-filled expansion DLC for the hit game Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy!

This expansion DLC adds a ton of new content, and some quality of life features.
Features:
- Many Additions to the Main Story and Side Events
- New Quality of Life Features Including an Album
- New Art
- And More!

name: Linesgo
summary: Based on hardcore logic, break out of the box and solve "impossible" problems! By tapping to guide the red square forward, the blue will follow you in the opposite direction - there is only one condition for victory: make the three squares connected by a straight line contain red, yellow, and blue.

name: Limbocore
summary: Discover the limbo. Play cards with angels.

name: Lift Attendant
summary: Lift Attendant is a minimalist puzzle game where you control elevators to transport passengers to their destinations. Your objective is to transport passengers as efficiently as possible. Earn money based on your efficiency and use money to upgrade your elevators to further improve efficiency!

name: Live with Mary
summary: You play as Danny, who is assigned by his sister to run her home, and he has to live with a beautiful girl named Mary. You have 7 days to impress her to get the ending you want.

name: Live the Guitar
summary: A revolutionary VR game combining 3D 4K 360 real videos with guitar gameplay using controllers. If you ever wished to play in a rock band in front of a cheering crowd without a need to practice on an instrument every day then Live the Guitar is the game for you.

name: Lil' Blue Buddy
summary: Journey to the remote Isle of Polu, where you will meet the curious and adorable little creatures known as Buddies! Visit the Hatchery to choose your Buddy, and bring it to one of the Isle's lovely beaches to fill its belly with delicious fruit! The more fruit your Buddy eats, the more points you will earn.

name: Line of Defense Tactics
summary: A real-time strategy combat game based on the world of the Line Of Defense. Command a team of four Galactic Command marines in highly classified missions in space and on planets.

name: Little Chefs: Co-op
summary: Call up your friends and dive into the world of culinary madness where you get to be Little Chefs! Cook dishes, customize and improve your kitchen with the building system, upgrade your character, complete missions and remember: nothing without teamwork, speed and a pinch of madness!

name: Little Favors
summary: A little game about a cat on a quest for milk.

name: Little Eden
summary: In this mix of farming simulator and spaceship shooter, you control Little Eden, a flying farm-ship. Destroy planetoids, collect seeds to plant, craft ammunition and fight for survival against the terrible Pirate Coalition.

name: Little Viking
summary:
One of the best block breaking game for everyone! Addictive, endless gameplay with gorgeous graphics and sound!
Rules in a little viking's world are simple - prevent columns of blocks from falling from the edge by tapping and destroying two or more blocks of the same color. Time is running out and waves of the columns are increasing with each level! Don't wait, just try it out!

name: Living with Jaguars VR
summary: Living With Jaguars is an interactive virtual reality film documenting wild jaguars in Brazil. Users explore the complex and interconnected perspectives of four key stakeholders: jaguars, ranchers, conservation researchers, and ecotourism operators.

name: Light House
summary: Isometric puzzle, based on light physics, for the most persistent and clever gamers! There is forgotten fireless lighthouse in the sea. Using mirrors, portals and other tools, deliver energy and set light to the lighthouse again!

name: Light Infantry
summary: Play with Glitch

name: Lionel the Dragon
summary: A dark and Moody 2.5d, story-driven action puzzle game based on a child with a worrying view of the world.

name: Living Legends: Wrath of the Beast
Little Jack's Adventures
summary:
Join the adventures of Little Jack.
You will need to solve many interconnected puzzles that involve finding keys, pushing crates in order to reach the exit door.
The game will have 4 difficulty levels so that each person regardless of its skill level can enjoy this game.

name: Linkage
summary: Find your story.

name: Lifestyle Manager
summary: Lifestyle Manager for the XaviXPort

name: LifeLeech
summary: In LifeLeech player takes control of one of the presented characters and travels the vast game world. Heroes have to visit many interesting places and meet various characters. But at the very beginning of the path you will realize that your hordes of enemies are blocked by hordes of enemies at other obstacles. Get ready for a heroic mission to save the world … or conquer it!

name: Liverpool Club Football
summary:
Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: LightWave
summary: Lightwave is a platformer project gone full indie. Inspired by classic platformers and modern indie titles alike, this 2D pixel platformer features highspeed, fluid movement.

name: Liberty Wings
summary: Liberty Wings is a WWII air combat game.

name: Liverpool Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Life Saver
summary: Earth is on the verge of World War 3. All life as we know it will be gone tomorrow. Take control of "Super Star Dan" to build a super SSD that can store every DNA on earth before the world goes up in flames. "Life Saver" is a twin stick shooter that you don't want to miss out on!

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Sword Upgrade Materials Kit
summary:
The Sword Upgrade Materials Kit contains consumable items used as materials to upgrade Sakamoto Ryoma's swords.

It contains:
- Pearl x1
- Fluorite x1
- Marksman's Fan x1
- Precious Steel x15
- Silver Scrap x20
- Gold Nugget x20
- Gold Chunk x20
- Kiwami Hammer x1
- Kiwami Seal x2

name: Little Obedient Robot
summary: Take control of a little obedient robot that you program with cards you find. Learn new cards to outmaneuver your enemies. This is our experimental strategy/2D side-scrolling hybrid.

name: Little Kitten: My Favorite Cat
summary: Little Kitten is every child's dream pet - a cheeky, funny and adorable little friend. Take a ride on the airplane, shoot some hoops, play hide & seek and bed trampoline or get creative with paw painting - you can always have a great time with your kitten pal! name: Little Fighter 2
summary:
Little Fighter 2 is a popular Hong Kong freeware PC fighting game for Windows and is the sequel to the game Little Fighter (LF1). Little Fighter 2 was created by Marti Wong and Starsky Wong in 1999, and released in a long series of updates.
The game supports up to 4 human players on one computer and a total of 8 characters using online play or computer-controlled opponents. Characters are controlled using the keyboard or a gamepad. All keys can be set via a configuration menu.
The game has a commercially released sequel, Little Fighter Online. In 2009, in celebration of Little Fighter 2's tenth anniversary, version 2.0 was released. The update fixed minor bugs and added a gameplay recording feature, a new stage called 'Survival', a browser toolbar that is not mentioned in the installation process and obstructive ads being displayed while the game is being loaded. Version 2.0a was released in late 2009, with only a bug fix.

Umakai Shintaro, a Russian diplomat originally from Japan, defects and goes to Sapporo to teach at a girls academy. However, that girls academy is not typical - it is on board the Amanohara, and the five girls Shintaro teaches are known as the Lime Unit - girls with the ability to summon powerful beings to fight for them.
