Ollie accidentally shatters a jar of souls while Death is on holiday. Now he has to travel the world to retrieve them, or else suffer the wrath of Death. Or worse… get fired!

name: Little Guy Adventure
summary: Little Guy Adventure is a pixel platformer where you play as Little Guy, a Shadow Girl who loves to do parkour. That's all I got.

name: Live and Learn
summary: Live, work and play in an animal-ruled alternate history where humans are just another species. Create your own character with intuitive full-body control and immerse yourself in a physics-driven sandbox where your real life the only tutorial needed.

name: Light of Gallery
summary: Light Of Gallery is brand New Maze Running Game! Escape From the Secret Art Hall!

name: Little Busters! Perfect Edition: TV Anime Commemorative Edition
summary: The Perfect Edition of Little Busters contains new and improved bits of content, previously included in its consumer ports, as well as a 125-page fanbook full of artwork, interviews, behind-the-scenes info, and more! You also get a disk of system voices, wallpapers, and desktop gadgets for your PC, a CD compilation of the Little Busters web radio program, and promotional cards for the Weiss Schwartz, ChaosTCG, and Megami Engage trading card games.

name: Live Shiver
summary: In this game, YOU are the game, and a popular streamer plays it! Step into the shoes of an evil force in this real-time strategy simulation game. Craft tension, conjure scares, and haunt the streamer to create a symphony of horror. Your goal: Amplify the stream to increase the number of live viewers

name: Lingo 2
summary: Lingo 2 blends word puzzles and impossible geometry, with brand new puzzle mechanics and a large, colorful world to discover. Welcome back!

name: Liber 2: Lost in time
summary: Alex woke up on a desert island and he has to find out where and in what century the book of ancient civilization brought him this time. Desperately not broken, the main character is looking for a way to return home, but acquires much more and finds his destiny.

name: Little League Baseball 2002
summary: Little League Baseball 2002 is a Sports game, developed by Handheld Games and published by NewKidCo, which was released in 2002.

name: Lita's Dream
summary: Popular high school girl Lita finds herself trapped in a strange dreamlike world. She needs to escape from a dangerous, eerie castle with the help of her mysterious ally, Ian.

name: Life At Space
summary: You are in the far, perpendicular Universe from other world. This place has been closed from eyes, but you managed to get here and follow the way clarification.

name: Lives so Sweet
summary: Everyone has their insecurities. Sometimes, you need someone else's help to overcome them--or at least learn to accept them. Explore the stories of three women who, one way or another, find themselves booking an appointment at a certain massage parlour. What change will this experience bring to their lives...?

name: Life and Minimalism
summary:
What can we eliminate from our life to make it better?

A game made for Ludum Dare 26 on the theme of "Minimalism".

name: Little Climber
summary: Meet Little Climber, a 2D person in a 3D world. Little Climber needs your help traversing his 3D world. Help Little Climber by positioning falling blocks on a three dimensional plane to allow Little Climber to climb higher and higher as the world around him falls apart. The higher Little Climber climbs the higher your score and the happier Little Climber will be.

name: Live Mystery: The Worst Behind the Scenes in History
Linearity
summary: Linearity is a companion puzzle game: create lines, as many and as complex as you can. Just turn the blocks to make them connect until you have a line without any breaks.

name: Lil Pump Piano Tiles
summary:
This is a super fun Lil Pump Gucci Gang Piano Tiles and highly addictive game suited for everyone best game 2018
No special skills needed for Piano Tiles Piano Play, all this game asks of you is an attentive mind and fast fingers!

name: Lisa: The Timeless
summary: Lisa: The Timeless is a fan game based on the world established by Austin Jorgensen’s title, Lisa: The Painful, as a story set outside of the main plot of the original Lisa trilogy.

name: Little Gardens
summary: Explore a world of tiny gardens, shady parks and secret glades. Solve puzzles and build gardens as you explore your way through 30+ levels!

name: Links E6
summary: Links E6 is an entirely new digital golf experience. This first person simulation puts you in the game creating the ultimate sensation of being on the course. With world-class courses and online competition, Links E6 is connecting golfers, gamers and fans to the future of golf.

name: Little Red Rocket Ship
summary: Little Red Rocket Ship is a bullet hell game with shoot-'em-up and platforming sections, featuring challenging but short levels and multiple weapon and ship options.

name: Lije
summary: 2D J-Rpg with less battles and more exploration

name: Little Red Riding Hood's Wolf
summary: Rosetta is just a shy little girl that goes to visit her grandmother, Mary. However, Mary was murdered. While looking in the house for clues, she meets a boy named Camille, who wants to pay respects to the deceased Mary. Together, they must find the real perpetrator.

name: Little Noah: Scion of Paradise - Special Edition
summary: This set includes the Little Noah: Scion of Paradise main game and the DLC 1+2 pass.

name: Linx Battle Arena
summary: Linx Battle Arena takes the online survival game in a new direction with this fast paced, action based Third Person Shooter. Starting with 1 gun and half health you will always be aware of how vulnerable you are. Play private games v friends or join public open games to dominate the arenas.

name: Linench
summary:
You are trying to pass the levels by thinking or improvising in this cast. 
Is it where you hang out? Follow your steps back and try different ways to reach the end.

name: Limita Luminii
summary: Joc narativ în realitate virtuală. Marcat în copilărie de trauma Primului Război Mondial, un pictor român trăiește în 1939 panica începerii unei noi tragedii, clacând treptat și evadând în spațiul abstract al propriei arte.

name: Lilt
summary: Lilt is a game set in mysterious locations and complexes. You play an advanced prototype with technology that allows for unique movement. Players must utilize the mechanics to explore and traverse the often precarious environment.

name: LifeDev
summary: 1st Person 3D Exploration Point&Click Intimate Journey. Based on real-life events. Experience trauma, gather clues, join the dots, find allies, unravel the truth, create your way out, face the demons, become stronger, challenge your "reality". Have you had enough already?

name: Line Drop: Spirit Catcher
summary: Line Drop: Spirit Catcher is a simple mobile puzzle game starring the jiāngshī from Darkstalkers.

name: Light of Hope: The Redeemer
summary: In light of hope, you are tasked with exploring awe inspiring locations, solving ancient puzzles left behind by those who came before. Choose your style, equipped abilities, outfits, weapons and more, as you solve a mystery that only you can reveal.

name: Little Weasel
summary: It is night and the Little Weasel has taken it upon themselves to check on all the pets in the city. With the help of the moon, players explore a free roaming city with cool mechanics to climb all over buildings and check on pets.

name: Liona's Adventure
summary: Once in a peaceful village , there lived a brave little warrior named Liona,One fateful night, the village was attacked by a horde of monstrous creatures. Liona's parents died in battle. Liona, witnessing the loss of her parents, felt a fire ignite within her heart—a burning desire for vengeance.

name: Lichbound
summary: As the controlling influence of the Lich spreads across the Spirit Realm, a lone spirit's fury is ignited. Confront the shadowy Beasts and absorb their power as you fight your way through the Lich's domain to put an end to his tyranny.

name: Little Wheel
summary:
Little Wheel is a short but sweet point-and-click game that lets you play as the last surviving robot in a world where only robots exist. After a worldwide blackout causing all the robots in the world to stop, everyone slept for 10,000 years. You're suddenly revived because of a lucky little accident, and it's now your job to bring power back to the world.

Will you be able to bring back all of your fellow robots, or will you lose your way in this apocalyptic world? Find out in Little Wheel!

name: Light Years Apart
summary: A rollicking adventure with pirates, spies, and snarky computers. Trade, sneak, and talk your way past a planetary blockade before it’s too late!

name: Line / Dash
summary: LineDash is an arcade-oriented game that doubles as a procedural player-controlled multimedia sculpture. The basic gameplay is extremely simple, and only requires two buttons: The left click of your mouse will drop lines from the sky, while the right click will make those lines dash forward. As the pace of the opposition gets faster and the line start splitting and crossing LineDash becomes a hypnotic and ever-changing visual experience. And you can also get high scores and stuff if you really lean that way!

name: Little Witch Luana
summary: Two wizards plan to perform a ritual to revive witch Laura, who died thousands of years ago but must sacrifice a witch in the ritual, so one day Luana and Solarys decide to sledge away from the castle and the witches kidnap Luana's sister to sacrifice her and make Luana unconscious in the woods, her dragon friend wakes her up and the two

name: Light and Shadows: Pocket Islands
summary: Light and Shadows: Pocket Islands is a spin-off made for fun, inspired by the retro game of peak 8 where the levels are only simple and challenging while progressing​.

name: Light Fairytale: Episode 3
summary: A turn-based JRPG series featuring a modern presentation with a classic core. Episode 3 carries over with Haru as he gathers a party of new and old friends on a journey to the lost 'Sky'.

name: Lime Iro Ryuukitan X ~Koi, Oshiete Kudasai.~
summary:
It was Meiji 38 (1905), the Russo-Japanese War that had begun since the previous year was getting hard. In this severe circumstance, they reorganized the Raimu Squad. The members of the Raimu Squad were the girls. They were just like other ordinary girls who went to schools and yearned for love, except that they had “Raimu”.

Inukai Tsuyoshiro was a young man who was newly chosen to be the leader of the squad. He was ambitious to fight for Japan.
When the young man met the five girls, the new chapter of “Raimu” began.

name: Live Mathletics
summary: Mathletics has brought their world renowned maths game to iTunes! Choose from 5 levels of difficulty ranging from simple addition to 10 to a combination of patterns, multiplication, division and subtraction.

name: Lime Ergot
summary: The last two officers of a tropical colonial outpost wait for evacuation.

name: Life Lessons
summary: A fetus in a simulation is taught a series of lessons about life by a primitive, overly literal artificial intelligence. There's 30 different "lessons" to get through, but you probably won't survive.

name: Linea, the Game
summary: The goal of the game is to survive for more than 60 seconds on each level, dodging platforms and objects, listening to bitpop soundtracks. Four levels, online-records, achievements and trading cards are waiting for you.

name: Living Books: Arthur's Reading Race
summary: Arthur's Reading Race is the number fifteenth Living Books and the third Arthur Living Books game PC CD-Rom Game from 1997 based on the 1996 book written by Marc Brown and the CD-Rom was released in February 17, 1997.

name: Life Game
summary: Open World, first person life simulation

name: Life with Mary
summary: In LIFE WITH MARY, you take control of our MC who’s lived a pretty stale life, albeit successful with his career. But your mundane existence is changed when your longtime friend unexpectedly drops his daughter off to live with you, so she can attend a music school in the city.

name: Lili: Child of Geos
summary:
Lili is a quirky adventure RPG hybrid with stunning visuals, silky-smooth graphics, a cinematic story-line, and a fresh new way to deal with enemies.

On the mysterious island of Geos, Lili will meet a number of hilarious locals, explore beautiful environments, solve some puzzles, and even challenge an oppressive regime or two along her way.

If you've enjoyed Zelda, Broken Age, or Psychonauts come on an adventure with Lili! And if you have never played any of those games, come with us on a journey which will make your sides ache with laughter, where you will get to know and love Lili, and maybe even shed a tear or two.

name: Light Borrower
summary: Join Rachel as she faces the Cleansing, a coming-of-age ritual that will determine whether she joins the last survivors of the end of the world or is banished above ground.

name: Living Books: The Berenstain Bears Get in a Fight
summary: The Berenstain Bears Get in a Fight is the first Berenstain Bears interactive Living Books PC game from 1995. It is based on the 1982 book written by Stan & Jan Berenstain and its adaptation of the 1985 TV series on CBS.

name: Linked Worlds
summary: Eleven years ago the Dark Beast was sealed by the four heroes. Now, with the heroes nowhere to be seen, it's up to Albus to defeat the Dark Beast before it regains its full powers.

name: Living Legends: Fallen Sky
summary: When your botanist brother finds the legendary beans, he asks you to join him to celebrate! But your hopes for a joyous reunion are quickly dashed when you find him missing and a giant attacks! With stolen magical items wracking havoc on the town, can you stop the Sky Kingdom's wrath and save your brother in time? Find out in this spell-binding hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Links Expansion Pack
summary: An add on pack for Links 2001. Included are four new Links courses (Thanksgiving Point, The Canyons Course at Bighorn, Pelican Hill 2001 version, and Banff Springs 2001 version), over 350 objects for use in the course designer, two tour players (Mike Weir and Keith Clearwater), and a Links LS course converter (this is needed to convert courses from previous versions of Links LS to Links 2001 format. There is a total of 36 courses this utility supports.)

name: Lighthouse
summary: Lighthouse (a.k.a. FARO.WAD) is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and the ZDoom source port. It was designed by Angry Saint, uses the music track "Blood Jungle" by Jonathan El-Bizri, and was also submitted to the Vine Mapping Contest 2016.

name: Lightfield Hyper Edition
summary: Lightfield Hyper Edition is a creative exploration racer, in which you discover futuristic racing tracks and leave the boundaries behind in parkour-inspired precision racing.

name: Lilium Reach
summary: Lilium Reach is an action adventure where you travel to a distant, forgotten region of space. Explore and collect customizable gear to aid you as you face oddities, mysteries, and danger that your life in the core systems never prepared you for.

name: Liberty Step
summary:
Become an adventurer and explore the vast land of the Godrealm.

Select and train party members from eight different professions, collect and craft powerful equipment, and discover dangerous and uncharted lands.

name: LightBear: Grizzelda Returns
summary: LightBear is a randomly generated action RPG whackathon with heavy Rogue-like elements. Players will lose their vision the further from the starting point they get. Don't be deceived by its appearance, this game will challenge you to no end. Watch out for 100's of randomized monsters.

name: Linkin Park 8-Bit Rebellion
summary: An iOS game featuring the band members of Linkin Park.

name: Lightmare Castle
summary: A story driven medieval fantasy adventure. You awake without any idea of who you are, where you are or what has happened to you. Explore this dark, cold world as you try to find your answers. Craft, solve puzzles and complete quests to unlock the secrets of Lightmare Castle.

name: LittleBigPlanet HUB
summary: LittleBigPlanet HUB was going to be a free-to-play PlayStation Store-exclusive title for the PlayStation 3, announced in August 2013. It was originally going to be released at the end of 2013 but was delayed. As no new information has been released about it, it is rumored to be canceled.

name: LiteracyPlanet: Word Mania
summary:
Are you a champion word builder? Find out now!

Create as many words as possible from 15 letters in only three minutes. Drag letters into the word panel, click the "Mark" button and score points.

name: Liberty Prime
summary: Welcome to an apocalyptic fantasy world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, glory is valued above gold and freedom is hard earned. In the age of Great Drotus Empire, a lone mercenary accepts a contract to liberate 13 nations of The Empire in order to regain his lost "Glory".

name: Lianthus
summary: A small adventure game with sunflowers, magic, and skeletons. After the darkness is unleashed, journey through the light and dark worlds, rediscover your powers, and seal the dark away.

name: Link
summary: Link is a strategy game with roguelike elements. Take control over group of soldiers trying to survive on the hostile, arctic planet. Can you survive until someone will come for rescue?

name: LiteBringer
summary:
LiteBringer embraces the revolutionary potential of the blockchain like few games before. As a truly decentralized application, the whole game takes place in the Litecoin blockchain, with no servers involved, giving the players unprecedented control over the game.

Level up a fighter, rogue or sorcerer in an imaginative fantasy world, and promote them to an advanced class that's even more powerful. Choose the best equipment for each task and send your heroes on increasingly difficult quests. Let them defeat mighty bosses for you and gather epic loot.

Every move you make in the game is a transaction in the Litecoin blockchain that creates value. Every weapon, item and even your characters can be traded safely and without limits, thanks to the power of cryptocurrency. Make smarter decisions than the other players and earn money while enjoying the game.

LiteBringer is developed by the makers of Tibia, a groundbreaking multiplayer role-playing game that's online since 1997. Expect complex gameplay, innovative features and a lot of knowledge on how to keep a game exciting for decades.

name: Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator: Store Simulator
summary: Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator is a store management game that takes place in the charming streets of France where you run your own Liquor shop! Start small as a cashier, scanning items and giving the correct change to your customers, then work your way up to managing a full-fledged business.

name: Life Hutch VR
summary: You have one goal: SURVIVE! Jump into this innovative immersive story. Fly a starfighter on a desperate mission to save mankind, search for safety on an alien planet, and battle a robot gone mad. All in stunning virtual reality.

name: Light-It Up: Complete Edition
summary: Swing, jump, flip and slide your stickman body from one neon color shape to another to make them glow and light-it up.

name: Lily of the Hollow: Resurrection
summary: What is going to be acted before you is——Blossom in the shackles, but deep down in your bone, suspension and romantic.

name: Light Rider
summary: Outrun and out think your opponents in this color shifting top-down racer. Shift your car into different parts of the color spectrum to avoid obstacles and discover shortcuts.

name: Lips: Party Classics
summary: The 3rd in the Lips Franchise, this time focusing on well known party hits from the past 40 years including I Will Survive, YMCA and Its Not Unusual.

name: Links: Championship Edition
summary: This version contains Links 2001 and the expansion pack.

name: Little Shopping
summary: Play and learn how to count - simple game for toddlers and preschoolers! This is a simple counting game for children. Learning to count has never been so easy and fun!

name: Light Fairytale
summary: A 3D turn-based Japanese-style RPG inspired by the retro classics.

name: Light Pursuer
summary: The map will be displayed only when there is light, otherwise it will be dark and the player can only go to the place with light. The player can push the lighthouse to illuminate other parts of the map, so as to explore different parts of the map.

name: Lifelike: Chapter One
summary: Explore an ever-changing world of fascinating flocking creatures.

name: Lie of Caelum: Episode 2 - Spirit
summary: Experience the continent of Karsand, as well as continue Caelum's story with additional main characters. Discover more mysteries surrounding Flow Energy, and fight through those who dare abuse its power!

name: Like Roots in the Soil
summary: A short story about two guys walking towards a common destiny.

name: Little Magic
summary: Puzzle game released for the Super Famicom in 1993.

name: Lillusion
summary: An action role-playing game with a non-linear plot choice. Soul-like running and slashing combat system, Naruto-inspired seal system.

name: Liberation Day
summary: Liberation Day is an isometric turn-based strategy game published by Interactive Magic in 1998 for PC. It is the sequel to Fallen Haven. It is set in early 27th century following war between humans and aliens

name: Little Learning Machines
summary: Explore the incredible power of reinforcement learning to inspire, train and customize adorably intelligent machines in this cozy life sim. Craft and inspire each Little Machine’s unique personality, then train them to do amazing things!

name: Light Switch Simulator
summary: Light Switch Simulator is a casual, massively multiplayer simulation game where players engage in the ancient battle between light and dark. Players can choose from three factions, unlock light switches, and compete or collaborate online in an MMORPG environment. The game emphasizes simple mechanics of turning lights on and off, with options for single-player or multiplayer modes. Special features include private rooms, cross-platform multiplayer, and Steam achievements.

name: Lis: Achados & Perdidos dos Confins do Universo
summary: How sharp are your organization skills? It’s time to discover!

name: Littlewitch Romanesque: Editio Regia
summary: As Domino, you must mentor Aria and Kaya in their training to become witches, mastering the magical arts. Take them to the classroom to grow the skills required to master powerful spells. Send them on quests to test their progress and show them the dangers that exist in the world. And mentor them in the value of friendship, a mage's strongest asset.

name: Life on Mars Remake
summary:
Remake of the 8 bits MSX2 game of the same name, with a 16 bits look.
Genre: Metroidvania (2D Metroid/Castlevania style) with RPG elements.
Explore, investigate, find improvements for your suit, find weapons, upgrade your weapons in workshops, fight incredible mutants...

name: Line Puzzle de Inazuma Eleven
summary: Line Puzzle de Inazuma Eleven is a soccer-themed match puzzle game.

name: Little Cities: Hand Tracking Update
summary: The most loved city creator just got cozier with hand tracking. Let go of your controllers and discover a whole new way to play, crafting your little city with simple gestures that puts cozy creation, literally, at your fingertips.

name: Little Cities: Attractions Update
summary: Excite your citizens with Attractions – an all-new collection of dozens of delightful items to transform your city, putting everything from billboards to beach huts at your fingertips. Innovative placements will up your Style Rating, adding a fresh layer of depth for our most creative builders.

name: Little Red Ball
summary: Roll your way to the exit whilst avoiding obstacles!

name: Living Legends Remastered: Ice Rose
summary: Return to Rosemount to stop the Ice Queen in this updated classic!

name: Lies & Cigars
summary: A work of interactive fiction that takes place in Astoria, Queens, after a cataclysmic disaster. You piece together an oral history of the event, based on accounts by several revelers who were there that night, none of whom quite recall it right, or trust one another's accounts.

name: Lighthouse Keeper
summary: This dark act takes place in a single day of the Lighthouse Keeper. Listen to the keeper carefully and help him to interrupt his twenty-year shift at the Lighthouse.

name: Line Rider 2: Unbound
summary: Line Rider 2: Unbound lets players create their own track using a pencil tool. Players can create ramps, loops, hills, and checkpoints, and then send a sledder down the track.

name: Linum
summary: Linum is a puzzle type game in which your goal is to Land Nodes on the Landing Points.

name: Lich Clicker
summary: Collect souls. Choose your path. Find true love or doom the world. The choice is yours in this simple clicker game with a branching storyline. Can you find all five fully voiced endings?

name: Liao Zhai Sou Shen Ji Guo Feng Qia Pai
Life Sim Bundle
summary: Become a Michelin-starred restaurateur, an enthusiastic gardener and a rail company manager!

name: Light Weaver
summary: First person puzzle game in a city lost to the waves.

name: Light
summary: Not known what year it is, and in which galaxy everything happens. But one thing is known-you must to clear the space of dirty pirates, and their technique. For this, you will have to open the nearest space systems, improve your ship, and of course to shoot a pirate ships.

name: Light Up the Holidays
summary: Decorate a variety of houses and other buildings in Christmas lights of any size and colour and then sync them to music. Spice up your environments with holiday props to create a stunning winter scene that can also be used as a live desktop wallpaper.

name: Like an Angel
summary: "Like an Angel" is a boy love game for adults, it has simulation and interactive fiction elements. It has more than 7 endings and plenty of CG for the player to explore.

name: Little Brother's Turn
summary: Relive the good old days of being forced to watch your sibling play YOUR games with this uber-frustrating, procedurally generated platformer.

name: Littlewitch Parfait: Kuroneko Mahouten Monogatari
summary:
Parfait Sucreal is a young witch, who is yet in training and full of clumsiness in raising a potion shop called Black Cat Market run by her mother and Parfait's black cat, Sakemas, who can amazingly talk. A year ago from the time this game was set, her mother had died from an illness - her father was a famous wizard who died from saving the kingdom when Parfait was young.

At the beginning, Parfait introduces herself and tells the player that she is almost at the risk of losing her beloved shop (the only remains of her mother), for Parfait has to pay the debt of 1,000,000G (gold) by 12 months to keep the shop running. As a normal shop, there seems no hope for raising the Black Cat Market's fame.

The player's motive is to collect this debt by 12 months in various ways such as putting cauldron-made potions to the shop counters for customers, accepting potion orders at the end of the day and sell her potions on the street. As Parfait gains more experience via studying in the library or creating potions, her levels will rise (with a maximum of six stars) which enables her to succeed more on potions that are high-leveled. Many places may trigger the encounter with other important characters whose futures the player must decide by motivating Parfait.

name: Lizard Wizard
summary: Your mission is to free prisoners on the planet Zyfus.

name: Little Fighter Online
summary: An free-to-play MMORPG based in the canon of the Little Fighter series, the game pays homage to Little Fighter 2. The game, however, is based on unstable servers, thus did not thrive long beyond its 2005 release.

name: LittleBigPlanet PS Vita: Marvel Arcade Pack
summary: Marvel Arcade Pack is a Downloadable Content pack for LittleBigPlanet PS Vita. It is the second DLC pack based on Marvel comics, the first being the Marvel Level Kit.

name: lilPizzaBois
summary: Just a lil game about some lil pixely pizza bois doing lil pizza boi things. Vroom vroom!

name: Librarium
summary: In Librarium, you can learn subjects from Medical Terminology to the History of Ancient China. We use study techniques like the Memory Palace and mnemonics to help our users improve their memory and study techniques. There are also community decks being added every week!

name: Little Frog Game
summary:
Jump around through 3 varied stages to collect flies and beetles, while avoiding enemies and hazards along the way!

And don't forget to stay hydrated - froggy will slowly lose hydration and can refresh in small pools of freshwater throughout. But watch out for pits and dark saltwater - saltwater is no good for frogs!

Use the froggy tongue to grab hard to reach collectibles, or activate tongue flingers that will send froggy flying onwards and upwards! Collecting all 5 beetles before finishing each stage will let froggy go to a special bonus stage. There, froggy will find a big delicious dragonfly waiting at the end!

name: Lil' Airport
summary: Lil' Airport is a an idle airport management game. Build and manage your own airport directly on your desktop. Expand your airport from a small airstrip to a bustling travel hub. Schedule flights, delight passengers with amenities, face emergencies - or just watch the planes go by.

name: Lily's Memories
summary: Lily is an 8-year-old girl who wakes up in her bed at night, hearing voices and strange sounds. The voices tell her that she is in danger and needs to find something important that she lost (her memories of what happened in that house). Lily discovers that apart from the voices, she sees terrifying creatures that try to capture her.

name: Life in the Fast Lane
summary: A DOS implementation of Conway's Game of Life.

name: Lightslayer
summary:
Lightslayer is an action role-playing game played in first person perspective. As a dark elven sorceress, you travel through a vast world, fighting monsters and completing quests in the search for your missing mentor. 
 
Lightslayer was my first commercial game, originally released in the year 2000, almost 20 years ago. This is version 3, which I have upgraded for newer computers. Changes include: 
 
  OpenGL-accelerated rendering. 
  Run at the native full screen resolution, or in a resizeable window. 
  Full mouse support, in the menus and the actual game. 
  A few minor user interface and game balance improvements. 
  The original Wrath of Darkness game included as a bonus. 
 
However, the actual content of the game is untouched, in all of its primitive programmer-art glory. Overall, I think this game has held up incredibly well to the test of time, which is another way of saying that the ugly and clunky aspects of the game were already ugly and clunky when the game was first released.

name: Link Devicer 2074
summary: Mecha strategy game, developed by G.A.M Corporation

name: Little Reds Forest Fun
summary: Little Red is on her way to grandmas house, but to get there she will need your help. Help her through 480 different brain teasing puzzles to find her way through the forests.

name: Little Cities: Little Citizens Update
summary:
The update brings your creations to life with your very own tiny population. Watch the itty-bitty bustle in your city streets and discover all the ways they love to work, rest, and play.

City creation in virtual reality has never been so cozy.

name: Limerence
summary:
a short story of a captive and a captor chatting over dinner. not so much horror but more a tense, uneasy atmosphere and an imbalance of power. named after the yves tumor song of the same name, part of the art without blood universe, but you aren't required to play the [currently] demo to understand this game. based on an unpublished set of poems.

made for the O2A2 jam. this jam has restrictions that require 1 cg (or sprite and background), 1 sound effect, 1 bgm, and 1k words.

this game is about 5-10 minutes in length.

name: Live Maze
summary: Live Maze is a Twitch fueled game where viewers type !play to be entered into a procedurally generated maze! Players will see their characters battle each other through the means of weapons and power-ups. A lovely intermezzo for Twitch streamers who wish to engage with their audience in new ways!

name: Life in the Twilight
summary: Life in the Twilight - this is a world of hopelessness in which the guardians are looking for you to stop your escape.

name: Link Bomb Party
summary: Come and join this refreshing blasting party~

name: Little Red Riding Hood
summary: 小红帽一个人，前往住在森林里的外婆家。 去的路上，在花田里做了小小的花束。 一路上，小红帽没有遇到大灰狼。然后就到了外婆家。 没有遇到大灰狼。 难道是我路上耽搁得不好吗？——小红帽她不明白。

name: Limbus Company: Season 2 - Reminiscence
summary:
Season 2: Reminiscence, is the second Season of Limbus Company.

It consists of the game's fourth Story Chapter (Canto IV: The Unchanging), the second Mirror Dungeon and Line 2 of Refraction Railway, as well as the release of 8 Identities based on story content and 6 E.G.O exclusive to the Season's Pass.

It also consists of the game's second Detour Tale, The Magic Hell Bus. This event adds an additional 2 Identities and 2 E.G.O to the season.

name: Link's Crossbow Training
summary:
Link returns from The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess to pick up the Wii Zapper and take aim at a host of targets in this shooting-gallery-style game.

Anyone can pick up the Wii Zapper and become a master marksman in the quick-play shooting galleries of Link's Crossbow Training. Dozens of fast-paced stages offer a wide variety of game play, from shooting stationary targets to defending a supply wagon from onrushing hordes of enemies. Multiplayer modes let players and their friends share a Wii Zapper to shoot for the high score.

Link's Crossbow Training comes bundled with the Wii Zapper. After a few rounds of Link's Crossbow Training, players will be more than ready to pick up any of the future Wii Zapper titles, like Medal of Honor Heroes 2, Ghost Squad and Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles.

Link's Crossbow Training contains three basic game styles: target shooting, defender and ranger. There are 27 stages in total, and these categories represent only generally how each individual stage operates. Each stage's goal is to earn the highest score possible within the time limit. All rounds can be played with multiple players: Players pass the Wii Zapper around and then play one at a time and compete for the high score.

Target Shooting: In target-shooting rounds, players shoot bull's-eyes as they pop up on the screen. In early stages, targets are stationary. As the game difficulty increases in later levels, the targets move. Hitting the center of the bull's-eye nets more points, and hitting targets in succession without missing earns combo multipliers. Link can aim anywhere on the screen.

Defender: In defender rounds, players remain stationary but can look and aim in all directions – sometimes even in a full 360 degrees – by aiming off screen. Hordes of enemies assault Link, and he must fight them off. These battles have a great deal of variety, from fighting off skeletons in a desert to defending a wagon from boar-riding Bokoblins.

Ranger: In ranger rounds, players can move throughout the level using the control stick and aim anywhere they want by aiming the Wii Zapper wherever they want to look. In these missions, Link storms enemy encampments, fights his way through a forest and seeks out his foes while exploring the environments.

The Wii Zapper requires the Wii Remote and Nunchuk, housing both in a comfortable and intuitive frame. The control stick on the Nunchuk controls player movement (on stages that allow player movement), while simply aiming the Wii Zapper moves the targeting reticule on the screen. Pulling the trigger fires Link's crossbow. By aiming off screen, players can turn Link to face in a new direction (again, on stages that allow this).
developers: Nintendo EAD Software Development Group No.3

name: Liu Jie Mi Ti
summary: 失意青年刘在机缘巧合下得到了一份离奇的工作，在命运齿轮的推动下，结识了几名性格各异的少女。忽然有一天祸从天降，他卷入了一起绑架案，并被迫参与一场事关生死的游戏。在求生的同时，他不得不重新审视过去生活寻求蛛丝马迹，那看似平静的生活实则早已暗流涌动……

name: Lightbot: Programming Puzzles
summary:
Featured by Apple in over 100 countries
*Best New Apps and Games*
*Best for Learning to Code*
*Best in Hot Educational Games*

Get kids hooked on coding within minutes! 

Lightbot is a programming puzzle game- a game whose game mechanics require using programming logic to solve levels. 

Simply guiding a robot to light up tiles and solve levels using commands, Lightbot cultivates a real understanding of procedures, loops, and conditionals.

Educators around the world are choosing to use Lightbot first when introducing their students to programming, coding and Computer Science. 

Lightbot features 50 levels and 20 challenge stars to collect and is a must-have for puzzle enthusiasts.

This version of Lightbot can be played in English, French, Russian, Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Norwegian, Slovenian, Romanian, Indonesian, German, Polish, Danish, Croatian, Dutch, Slovak, Czech, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Thai, Hindi, Swedish, Finnish and Hungarian! Just hit the associated flag icon on the main screen to select a language.

Lightbot features multiple save slots and separate progress tracking for multiple players. Multiple players can advance at their own pace in their own save slot, and also compete on number of levels finished, number of stars collected and number of overall commands used to complete the game.

There are NO in-app purchases in Lightbot.

name: Living Books: Just Grandma and Me
summary: Just Grandma and Me was the very first Living Books PC CD-Rom game from 1992 based on the 1983 book of the same name written by Mercer Mayer. It is an interactive storybook about a boy and his Grandma at the beach.

name: Little Earth
summary: An educational VR experience about the solar-system. Meet little animals and learn about the seasons.

name: Living Books: Harry and the Haunted House
summary: When Harry D. Rabbit hits the ball right over Stinky's head, it lands in the spooky old house while next to the park. Harry and his friends cautiously explore the house searching for the ball and have dozens of hair-raising experiences. As Harry and his friends search the scary mansion, they discover something about themselves, as well as about the "haunted" house.

name: Lisistrata
summary: Immersed in an ancient Greece setting, you will recruit, train and lead a team of Athens’ young girls through battles, challenges, critical choices and beyond. Organize an effective rebellion against every man of Athens! It will be your responsibility to stop a war that has been endured for decades.

name: Like Clay
summary:
Like Clay is a story driven adventure game with horror elements.
Find out what happened to a friend of yours by reading messages and listening to audio files.
Search for hidden doors and items, solve light puzzles and survive deadly foes
and lethal traps.

name: Limberjack
summary: Known to chainsaw-wielding loggers around the world as ‘limbing’, the art of stripping felled trees of their branches is exciting, but very dangerous. Welcome to Limberjack! Grab your Husqvarna chainsaw, and pursue your dream of becoming the undisputed greatest limber alive.

name: Life of Boris: Super Slav
summary: Crazy adventures of YouTube legend Boris await! Jump into the hilarious world of YouTube personality Boris the Slav King in the official game of Life of Boris! In Super Slav you will learn about the life of the Slav phenomenon Boris and his adventures. Meet his unique family such as cousin Anatoli and babushka, or his neighbour Vadim, and find out what it means to be Cheeki Breeki!

name: Little Porp
summary: A Little Village or þorp Builder, which takes place on a 32x32 tile map. Use the resources available to keep your villagers warm, fed, and hydrated for as long as you can. When the little ice ages come, you must manage your resources wisely to prevent a very cold sad death of your villagers.

name: Liar Moon Shangri-La
summary: A sad tale of lies and understanding. Even if it's your lie, I'm willing to accept it. As a romance visual novel game, this work uses the labels 'lie', 'moon' and 'tale of woe' throughout the main story. The love story between the heroine and the charming but sinful heroes is depicted.

name: Living Legends: Bound by Wishes - Collector's Edition
summary: Every dream can come true, for the right price. Your husband Jack has gone there, but when he doesn’t return, you follow in his footsteps. The town is threatened by enchanted roses that choke the life out of anyone they ensnare. Can you save your husband from his deadly contract?

name: Little Rockets
summary: Explore 4 planets with Little Rockets. Collect resources avoiding enemies or guide the rockets to the second base.

name: Light Magic 2
summary: Light Magic 2 is an RPG made in RPG Maker 2003.

name: Little League World Series Baseball 2008
summary:
Officially licensed Little League baseball action hits the Wii and DS!

The first officially licensed Little League video game to hit next-generation consoles. Players will bat, pitch and field their way from local sandlot slugger to Little League World Series Champion. Featuring eight U.S. and eight international teams, extraordinarily deep character customization, World Series Mode, and a variety of skill based challenges, Little League World Series offers an exciting, authentic baseball experience. Motion-sensing controls on the Wii make it accessible for Little League players and parents alike, while the DS version gives players the freedom to get on the diamond anywhere.

name: Line Leader
summary: Take the role of Line Leader, as you and your fellow students try to escape school. Avoid hazards and gather as many students as possible to escape each room. Adventure through different areas of the school, defeating bosses and solving puzzles as you find your way out.

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun - Special Edition
summary: This Bundle includes the Purple Fur DLC.

name: Life // Blood
summary: Decide the fate of an ageless cosmic war as humanity clings to its existence trapped in a metal dome.

name: Lil' Herder
summary: Lead puppies, chicks and other tiny animals home while avoiding dangerous wolves, sharks, ghosts and more. Place arrows along the path, using logic and reasoning to choose the safest route, while steering enemies into special traps.

name: Little Alchemist: Remastered
summary: Little Alchemist: Remastered is a free to play collectible card game, combining spell crafting and strategic combat.

name: Lips: I Love the 80's
summary: 4th installment in the Lips series with tracks from Duran Duran, Pat Benatar, Huey Lewis and the News and Devo.

name: Little Robot Stories
summary: Little robots have stories. Follow a little robot as it explores the city, makes friends, and has fun... and pizza. Little robots like pizza.

name: Lichkeeper
summary: Build traps and fling magic to protect the crystal heart that holds your immortal soul from an onslaught of wizards who are hell bent on destroying you!

name: Little Big Rabbits
summary: Go rescue the princess before its too late. You have 6 worlds to explore with different environments, many mechanics to master and tons of dinos to smash! The game can be played both in First and Third Person (Adjust using ScrollWheel or Controller DPad Left + Right).

name: Like a Dragon: Ishin! - Ryoma Growth Support
summary:
The Ryoma Growth Support Kit contains consumable items that will increase Sakamoto Ryoma's Experience Points, as well as a battle revival item.

It contains:
- Red Daifuku X3
- Yellow Daifuku x3
- Blue Daifuku x3
- Green Daifuku x3
- Training Daifuku x3
- Sacrifice Stone x1

name: Little Inner Monsters
summary: Do you know your Little Inner Monsters? These are the different feelings we deal with on a daily basis. Play with them in this card game and bring your own little monster grove to life. Play against the computer or a friend.

name: Living Books: Sheila Rae, the Brave
summary: Based on the book by Kevin Henkes, Sheila Rae, the Brave is the eleventh Living Book and released on February 27, 1996. It was the last title in the series to use the old 512 x 384 resolution. The story is about how Sheila Rae isn't afraid of anything, unlike her sister Louise, who is frightened of anything her sister does. This is, once again, one of the rarest titles due to being out of print for a long time, and is very hard to come across.

name: Little Space Rangers
summary: A procedurally generated sci-fi platformer created in Pico-8

name: Life is Scary
summary: Dark horror game that you need to survive

name: Lifespeed
summary: Lifespeed is the ultimate race for survival. Battle your galactic opponents while flying at high speed through exciting tunnels. Your planet needs you!

name: Lip! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 1
summary: Welcome to the world of Lewd Idols! But… What exactly is a Lewd Idol? Join Kairi, the shy aspiring star, and Ranko, her depraved self-proclaimed producer on this lewd journey! Explore Akihabara, form an idol group, and overcome the odds while having lots of girl-on-girl action! Are you ready for it?

name: Lifeforms: Binary Fission
summary: Clone yourself to take over the environment in this bacterial evolution roguelite. Choose mutations and abilities each time you multiply and unlock new morphologies and environments. Compete against other evolving species in survival mode and experiment with unlocked abilities in sandbox mode.

name: Live Bingo
summary: Live Bingo is a stream interactive game of bingo designed for streamers to play with all their viewers.

name: Littlest Pet Shop 3: Biggest Stars - Purple Team
summary: Get ready to go for the gold! It's time to hit the arena for the LITTLEST PET SHOP Biggest Stars competition—and this time your pets are in the spotlight! Ten fun and challenging mini games are your pets' tickets to the big time. Practice makes perfect as you help your pets become the best gymnasts, models, ice skaters, dancers, flyers, fashion designers, and more. Then pack up their cute team uniforms and the dozens of super-fun accessories you've customized because it's time to hit the road! The Biggest Stars competition is the event of year, when the pet-triplet judges look for teams that are a triple threat; cute, peppy and totally talented! Good thing that with your help, all your LITTLEST PET SHOP pet's Biggest Stars dreams really can come true!

name: Little Bear Chef
summary: Little Bear Chef is a cozy 3D cooking platformer where you play as a tiny bear chef in a regular sized kitchen. It's all about coming up with creative and funny solutions to cook the recipe at hand.

name: Linda Crenshaw: The Dream Apartment
summary: Help Linda as she tries to find her missing teeth in her zany apartment building.

name: Little Broken Robots
summary: "Little Broken Robots" is a robo-repair simulator where you give new life to faulty robots! Though the repairs do not take long to finish, the memories with your new robot friends will last forever.

name: Little By Little By Little
summary: Little By Little By Little is a slice of life video game following a day in the life of an ordinary college student whose hyperfixation on local graffiti keeps them distracted from their rapidly declining mental health. The game touches upon depression and anxiety, drinking culture, self esteem, and complicated relationships - and how those struggles intersect with everyday life. It also explores the healing power of friendships and the importance of being vulnerable.

name: Little Wing
summary: Embark on a dangerous journey through the wilderness, searching for the Little Wing, atop the Mountain - in this challenging and charming platformer. Brave levels with many dangers, with tight and precise jumping, stamina management and attacks. Can you find the Little Wing?

name: Limen
summary: Limen is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Stuck inside a simulated reality inflated with nightmares, you must work with your team to find a way out. Build, defend, and survive.

name: Little Kingdom
summary: You are the leader of a small kingdom aiming to conquer this serene world simply by strengthening your economy (NO war or killing!) Expand your influence, gather new resources and construct stronger buildings to strengthen your position. With a healthy dose of strategy coupled with bribing or absorbing your enemy’s strength; you can claim the kingdom in your name!

name: Lizard Lady vs. the Cats: Platinum Edition
Lil Big Invasion
summary: An exploration based puzzle adventure set in a quirky 2D world. Those silly green guys got lost in dark and tricky dungeons! Find them, keep them together and lure them with your light to the exit in order to suck them back home! Try to challenge the clock for a high leaderboard score.

name: Line's Guarder
summary: AI robots launched an attack on humans, and the brave girls took up weapons to defend the defense line, for the humans! — A small fast-paced stand-alone FPS game, with a battle mode and a zombie mode, each game takes 10 minutes, and a variety of character costumes are available.

name: Light and Embers
summary: Relax. Listen to the crackle of the fire and the chirping of the birds. Add a log or two if the fire starts to burn out. Enjoy a calm and stress-free campfire.

name: Little Master Cricket
summary: Little Master Cricket is Bennett Foddy's attempt to make a cricket game that focuses on compelling gameplay rather than realism or verisimilitude. The real pleasure of cricket is to swing a bat and hit a ball, something that’s missing from every commercial game and most free ones as well.

name: Light Bringer
summary: Light Bringer is a 2D side scrolling fantasy strategy game with development elements. Explore, gather, build and then when night falls, survive! All in the style of beautiful hand-painted graphics. Will you bring the light?

name: Lianhai Casino
summary: A ray of light shines on the sea, inviting you to the Lianhai Casino. Gold, silver, treasures, all with a desire to devour their guests, even today. The four men who challenge them - are they heroes? Or a lamb driven mad? Get your tickets ready for the grandest adventure!

name: Little Shop - World Traveler
summary: Little Shop: World Traveler is the sixth game in the Little Shop hidden object series of games.

name: Little Soldier
summary: Little Soldier is a multiplayer online, bullet shooting game. With your friend, use fist or pick up the dropped weapon to defeat the opponent to win.

name: Lightning War
summary: With hard work of two member team, the first series of the Lighting war finally go online. Hoping everyone enjoy this battle game. Always wondering who's driving the jets, will be a beauty?

name: Little Garden
summary: Growth plants on your island and make a delicious meal with these plants. If you have enough gold, you can expand your island! Unlock dozens of cards at each farm level and improve your income. You can make things easier by automating your farm with amazing tools.

name: Little Rhapsody of Game
summary: In a mysterious modern park, together with up to 8 friends and players, incarnate into characters with overhead history, carry out a hard core and hot-blooded battle carnival, defeat opponents through sufficient reaction and technology, and become the king of the park.

name: Lightforce Ninja
summary:
Platformer with ragdoll physics.
10 stages in 5 different themed regions.
Challenging puzzles.

name: Linn the Protector and the Seven Daughters of Ran
summary:
Linn, hand maiden of Lady Frigg, must protect Eric - the son of the Jarl of North Anglia-, from being drowned by the seven daughters of Ran.

And then she must face Ran herself.

name: Lincity
summary: Lincity is a free and open-source software construction and management simulation game, which puts the player in control of managing a city's socio-economy, similar in concept to SimCity. The player can develop a city by buying appropriate buildings, services and infrastructure. Its name is both a Linux reference and a play on the title of the original city-building game, SimCity, and it was released under the GNU General Public License v2.

name: Library
summary:
Library is a cute game about hanging out and throwing stuff at your new friends!
Explore a cute library in first-person and enjoy the friends and rooms you come across.

name: Little Diggel
summary: Little Diggel – is a platformer with role-playing system elements, in which you need to solve various puzzles placed on different levels.

name: Lights Orb
summary: Run through a simulated city and use your power orb to get to the end as fast as possible in this fast passed runner in first person.

name: Living Books: The New Kid on the Block
summary: The New Kid on the Block is the fourth Living Books game based on the 1984 storybook written by Jack Prelutsky, and was released in 1993. Instead of just one story, it was a collection of 17 poems. It is hosted by Jack Prelutsky as he voiced the cartoon counterpart of himself.

name: Lil Tanks
summary: Lil Tanks is an action-packed, side-scrolling shooter that puts you in control of a prototype tank -- defending humanity from the alien scourge known as The Cuur. As Earth's last hope, you must upgrade your tank with unique power-ups and blast the aliens back to where they came from! Level up by destroying The Cuur and earn powerful permanent upgrades. Unlock multiple tanks by completing objectives and finishing the campaign. The survival of the human race rests in your hands!

name: Limbo 64
summary: This is a Commodore 64 demake of LIMBO.

name: Little Critters 2
summary: Embark on an epic journey in "Little Critters 2," where survival and adventure intertwine in a captivating world filled with vibrant landscapes and unpredictable challenges. As the latest installment in the beloved Little Critters series, this game takes you on a thrilling adventure like never before.

name: Lil Spoops
summary: Lil Spoops is a 2-4 player top-down supernatural rogue-lite shooter where you play as possessed toys that battle each other to entertain the Entity, which grants players unique powers and abilities at the end of each round.

name: Lifespawn
summary: Lifespawn Is a 2D Platformer With a Twist: You Place Your Own Checkpoints. Good Luck.

name: LilyDeux - Black Lily Warning
summary: Lily is girls with the ability. They fight again. This game is a simulation RPG that you can play with no stress. It is a system that has a deep strategic approach.

name: Little Shell's Adventure
summary: Little Shell's Adventure is a difficult, beach-themed, Action-Adventure game with a retro art style, open-world elements, and an engaging combat system.

name: Life's Too Short!
summary: Life's Too Short! A 1-minute life simulator: Birth, Life, Death, in 60 seconds! Roll, toddle, bounce, climb and clamber through a colourful, hand-made world. Be anyone, do anything, but remember: time flies when you're having fun...

name: Light Fantasy
summary:
Light Fantasy is a role-playing game, developed by Advance Communication Company and published by Tonkin House, which was released in Japan in 1992.

The combat consists of random encounters against groups of enemies in grid-based strategic battles in which player characters need to be moved into place before they can attack effectively. These battles occur on the overworld map, rather than a separate battle screen.

name: Little Journeys
summary:
Little Journeys is a casual, action/ arcade game with a 3D low-poly graphics and physics engine behind. With a simple two-finger touch control, the player flies a blimp with the task of transporting passengers here and there. There are dozens of fairly short missions grouped into levels. Each mission map is designed from scratch. There are a number of customizations, trophies, and challenges included. The game is free to play.

LLittle Journeys, in short, is a fantastic blend of two aspects. One, the zen feeling and serenity of flying freedom. Two, the great challenge of piloting an unusual aircraft.

name: Little Fighter
summary:
The first game of the series. A freeware non story brawler where you can choose from a wide array of characters
In this game, players can choose to play as one of 11 characters. Each character has exactly 3 special moves. Players participate in a battle in three different modes. The game allows for a one on one match, team matches or elimination tournament matches. There can be up to 8 fighters simultaneously on screen. There can be up to 4 human players on the same game. Playing with a joystick is also an available option, making the game more versatile.

name: Lintrix
summary: A puzzle game from Caliburnus Limited.

name: Littlest Pet Shop: Winter
summary: Littlest Pet Shop: Winter is a virtual pet game where players collect and customize 20 different pets across four themed environments. Players earn Kibble Coins through 16 mini-games to unlock new pets, accessories, and playsets. The game features different pet categories including Fanciest, Cuddliest, Sportiest, and Chilliest, with over 100 accessories available for customization.

name: Liar Jeannie in Crucifix Kingdom
summary:
Liar Jeannie in Crucifix Kingdom is an RPG by Uta (Sky Scraper Project) made in RPG Maker VX.

Jeannie finds herself in a jail cell, chosen as a sacrifice in a kingdom of the undead.
Before long, she encounters her brother Marta, and they make plans to escape this place.
But in the Crucifix Kingdom of Morte Moses, escape is far from easy...

name: Living Books: Arthur's Computer Adventure
summary:
Once again Arthur, D.W., and friends lead us on a hilarious adventure that kids won't want to miss. An Interactive Adventure, 5 learning activities and 13 surprises and puzzles help kids develop critical reading, math, and logic skills while they play along with Arthur.

Arthur wants to play "Deep Dark Sea" on the computer every chance he gets; when his mother leaves for work and asks him not to touch the computer, the temptation is too much. Arthur and Buster play long enough to fight over the mouse and make the screen go blank! Will Arthur be able to fix the computer before his mom gets home? Play and find out!

Treasure Hunt: Get the treasure if you can read all the words! Kids develop reading and logic skills in this face-paced and exciting activity. Play against a friend or the computer!

D.W.'s Store: Shop for D.W.'s toys. Cook up wacky recipes in D.W.'s cafe. Children learn counting and math while they make purchases and work in the cafe.

Deep Dark Sea: Explore world geography and ocean life while searching for hidden treasure. This sidescrolling arcade style activity has three levels of difficulty for hours of fun!

Toy Captain: Drop water balloons on a target and help rescue the firefighter. This activity is great for improving hand/eye coordination.

Frankenfish: Learn ocean facts and geography while creating your own wacky creatures! Print in color or black and white to create your own coloring book!

name: Links: Championship Course - Bay Hill Club & Lodge
summary: Links: Championship Course: Bay Hill Club & Lodge is an golf course add-on for Links: The Challenge of Golf. The add-on features the Bay Hill Club located in Orlando, Florida.

name: Living Room
summary: "Living Room" is a mixed reality eco-sim for the Meta Quest 3, in which you can nurture a charming, interactive ecosystem. Enjoy the simple pleasures of tending to plants, caring for adorably derpy animals, and watching your environment flourish. This cozy experience is perfect for relaxing, and unwinding, while also offering a somewhat chaotic and delightful escape into nature's beauty right inside your living room.

name: Lisa: The Painful - Fractured Bonds
summary: Lisa: The Painful - Fractured Bonds is a mod for LISA: The Painful that revolves around Brad's childhood friends Rick, Sticky, and Cheeks. The mod includes lots of new enemies to fight and new story cutscenes.

name: Little Robo Climber
summary: Little Robo Climber is a 2D action arcade platformer. You'll ascend the procedurally generated ship avoiding traps and enemies. No checkpoints or bosses. Just climb to the top... Oh and look out for the fire.

name: Lifeway
summary: Lifeway is a 2D punishing platformer game in which the protagonist moves in eccentric ways. Have a taste of bittersweet joy by rolling your body through obstacles representing troubles and defeats in one's life, till the end of the journey.

name: Lilith + Eve
summary: Garden of Eden-inspired story about Adam who chases after angels, Eve who can't find her place in Elysium, and a lesser demon of the lilitu species — Lilith.

name: Litha and the Sunhouse
summary: Litha and the Sunhouse is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler with a flashy, fast-paced combat system. You will explore the complex lair of the mighty Sun Usurper while defeating monsters, collecting treasures, avoiding traps, discovering secrets, and helping unlucky fellows you meet along the way!

name: Lily Fantasia
summary: Welcome, to the fantastical and rhythmic world of Lily Fantasia! Join the mysterious vampire, Lily, in a race against time to save your sickened mother. Overcome fierce enemies, wield the magical piano, and become the Rhythm Master you were always destined to!

name: Little Romance
summary: Little Romance is a game that allows players to create their own manga. Each comic panel can be designed in the software and then printed on the Loopy's built-in sticker printer. It was developed and published by Casio, and released in Japan in 1996.

name: Little Witchelsa: Pumpkin Peril
summary: Enter the world of witches and solve all kinds of puzzles in this fun blend of match 3 and hidden object game!

name: Linda Hyde: Vampire Mansion
summary: The third installment of the Vampire Legends hidden object series.

name: Life with Horses 3D
summary: Run the world’s greatest stud farm in 3D!

name: Live Empire 2
summary: This is a simulation game.

name: Literalism
summary: Literalism is a 26-level Boom mapset that came to life as a community project hosted by MFG38. Running between July 22nd and August 22nd, 2021, the project employed a gimmick somewhat inspired by how speedmapping sessions often place a thematic restriction. Participating mappers were given a randomly generated map title to make maps inspired by. Maps were compiled into this mapset in order of submission, so the difficulty curve may be all over the place.

name: Life Simulator
summary: Life Simulator is a simulation game with relaxed atmosphere. Players will play as a college graduate getting into the big city, you will fight for your life for four years, you can be a winner with cars, houses and soul mate, or maybe a salty fish with nothing, and you can also find love...

name: Light the World
summary: Light the World is a simulation puzzle game. The year is 2125 and the world is on the brink of destruction as a result of rampant unchecked pollution. Clouds of pollution blanket the sky and prevent most sunlight from reaching the earth's surface.

name: Light Fighter
summary: Light Fighter is an arcade survival game and scoring.

name: Lifeling
summary: Lifeling is the story of Noah, a boy from a barren post apocalyptic world.

name: Limb Hunter
summary: Shoot. Loot. Attach. Repeat. At your leisure you can save the dying world or become the ruler for the final decades of corruption. But who cares about the future, when you can attach that big gun to your spine. Become a Legend of DC-128b. At least for a while.

name: Lighting Climbing
summary: Simple Easy Fast Exercise | VR Rock Climbing Games

name: Little Shaker: Summer Adventures
summary:
A young boy named Cliff spends his dull vacation at home in Ritztown, a village on the outskirts of Clank City. One day, though, the family receives a mail-order package that would change his life. Using this new magical shaker and recipe book to synthesize items with various powers, Cliff concocts a medicine that turns the lonely village elder's pet pig into the speaking bipedal Piggy! This gives Cliff the courage to continue helping his neighbors and exploring the wider world. It was the most exciting vacation he'd ever have.

Little Shaker is a 2001 Windows action-RPG where you play as Cliff, adventuring around Ritztown, Clank City, and various locales as his summer goes from boring to bombastic. You collect ingredients and key items to create new ones using the titular tool, then use them to solve puzzles and complete quests. The game has you exploring a world of Americana, from grassy overworlds to many "dungeons" like the Ritztown cemetery. Talking to NPCs not only advances your connections with them, but will increase your total health as you earn friendship points.

name: Light of the Locked World
summary: Light of the Locked World is a fantasy RPG with local co-op and PVP, inspired by oldschool MMOs like Ultima Online and RuneScape.

name: Life or Reach
summary: A fighting game where you can control your reach! ? During the match, in exchange for your own health You can extend the reach of your weapon! Adjust your reach and grab a new sense of victory!

name: Little Jumper!
summary: Be on high alert as the blocks come flying at you. Tap to jump and climb as high as you can!

name: LivingForest
summary: From a first or third person perspective, living this forest.

name: Lisa: The Purposeful
summary: This Lisa fan game tells the story of Richard Weeks from the original game and what happened to him after Brad and Sticky left him.

name: Liong: the Lost Amulets
summary: Long ago five magical amulets were treasured by Oriental wise men. These amulets held the five natural elements in balance. Restore harmony to nature by finding the lost amulets. Liong: The Lost Amulets is a combination of hidden object games and tile-matching puzzles and also has a variety of mini games. Along your journey you`ll visit hundreds of unique locations and collect power-up pearls. Reveal the magic spells and restore the sparkling gems of the magical amulets.

name: Little Buster Q

name: Lineweight

Each of its five chapters showcases a story with a specific emotional focus, illuminated with the studio's signature stylings of color, light, and music. Every moment, word, and image is controlled by your swipe, marrying storytelling and graphic design in a unique union we can't wait to share with you.

name: Life of a Capitalist

name: Little Postman

name: Little Bo Reap

name: Lionel Trains: On Track

In the game, you are the head of an unspecified railroad, and your objective is to connect different cities together through rail, using the funds you start off with, and later earn. There are several separate modes of gameplay, with varying objectives.

name: Life And Death Are Predetermined by Heaven

name: Light Cubed

You temporarly loose control when a light cube is hit by an enemy; the walls are used to protect the light cubes for the red enemies.

name: Lighted Knights
summary: Engage in a pure RPG experience in this new world permeating with magic and fantastic creatures. Battle through haunted forests, crawl through deadly dungeons and explore caves for hidden treasures in order to reveal the secrets of the Lighted Knights.

name: Living Dolls Rebirth Alpha

name: Little Alchemist

name: Little Big Horn

While this topic is a bit smaller scale than the normal battles covered by the engine, it will still give you a good idea of how the overall game engine works so you can transition to one of our full games.

Alone he must explore the island's various locations and even the deepest depths of his dreams to uncover the island's secrets and mysteries, and come to terms with what may be the end of his life.

name: Lighten Up

name: Lianliankan
summary: Look at the small games repeatedly, and connect the same pictures to eliminate them.

name: Little Cities: Sandbox Update

name: Lightway Lines

Lightway Lines - a modern, specialist airline - is trialing new technology to make space tourism possible for everyone. But in this atmospheric sci-fi ARPG adventure, Rain could end up paying the price for making history.

name: Liyf
summary: Master the art of light and shadow in this unique 2D platformer, controlling both the hero and their shadow to conquer puzzles and foes. A visually stunning, mind-bending adventure awaits!

name: LineVox

Tap on the blocks to rotate them, creating a path for the power to flow through the bulbs and lighting them up!

name: Life of Thife

name: Little Harvest
summary: Plant, water, and harvest your crops. Expand your land and buy new crops and items!

name: Librerama

A story reminiscent of Little Red Riding Hood although something has gone horribly wrong...

summary: Enter a great big world of LITTLEST PET SHOP adventures with this TV plug-in game that you plug in to and play on your TV! Adopt and save up to 15 pets at the The Little Lovin' Pet Playhouse! Mix and match ingredients to make them tasty treats! Is your pet feeling icky? Stop by the Get Better Center for a little TLC! Take your pets to the WHIRL AROUND PLAYGROUND to romp and play games with other pets. And when it's time to primp your on-screen pals, take them to the Purr-fection Salon for a bath, a haircut and even take pictures for your album! It's the purr-fect place to make all of your pet-lovin' dreams come true! Includes game controller, exclusive owl pet and instructions.

name: LightQuest

Among the ruins of civilization, a light creature arises.

The world is in chaos - and you're the only only one able to stop it.

name: Lighthouse
summary: Light is your only weapon in this dark and hostile world. It will help you find your way, solve puzzles and protect you from monsters. Grab your torch and venture into this horrific universe!

name: Little Trouble on Tribuda Island
summary: Escape Confinement, who cares about your past sins, You have a robot arm!. Nothings going to stop you.

name: Light Chaser: End of Dawn

name: Limitless Bit
summary: This game takes place in the capital Ishwald, in the Ishwald Kingdom. Here you are given the order to create a strong squad that will ensure the safety of the city. To do so, you will have to recruit and train people enough that they will win upcoming tournaments.

name: Life Is A Game
summary: Simulation game where you see the life of a person from birth until death. Your character is always running as time is always ticking. The life you live is dictated by the choices you make and the amount and type of coins you collect.

name: Lines and Hexa
summary:
Lines & Hexa is a great game for two players usually (although up to four can play), and is a very good game for children because the rules are quite easy. It has gone by many other names, including the dots and boxes, game of dots, boxes, squares, dot to dot grid, and pigs in a pen.
The game plays really well for children, and yet can be played quite seriously, if you want to exercise the brain cells. At the simple level, the winner appears to be a matter of chance; at the analytic level, the winner will probably be the first one who can analyze the end game correctly.
All you do (on your turn) is to join two next-door dots on the grid, drawing a line and trying to complete a hexagon. Each time you make a hexagon, you must take another turn. If you fail to make a hexagon, the other (or next) player then takes his turn to draw a line.

name: Little Awesome Dudes

name: Licht plus for Playdate

name: Little Big Robots
summary:
Fast-paced multiplayer battles with giant armed to the teeth robots! Fight in real-time battles with players all over the world! Operate a giant heavily armed robot and do whatever you want.
Crash entire cities, smash your rivals, step across rivers, set ambushes to catch you enemy by surprise and have a good time while gunning down your enemy. Play with friends or solo across a variety of game modes from 4v4 to Battle Royale.

name: Lime Odyssey: The Chronicles of Orta
Linklight

name: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII - Steelbook Edition
summary: As Lightning, it is your mission to save souls so they may be brought to a new world. However, with only thirteen days remaining, not everyone can be saved. Armed with all-new weapons, player customization and battle abilities, you are in a race against time to fully understand your destiny. It all ends here.

name: Lipsync Killers

Collect coins and diamonds to upgrade your attributes and get new skins with themed looks. Complete extra quests to get even more chances to acquire upgraded items and characters.

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun - Deluxe Edition
summary: Kong got himself dirty while enjoying a mango. His mom tries to force him to bathe but he's got other plans... That is to run away as far as possible. This Bundle includes the Light-Blue DLC.

name: Lilt Line
summary: lilt line will confound your senses and rock your soul.

name: Lights, Camera, Reaction!
summary: The ultimate VR party game is finally here! LCR features a single player reaction mode, a local multiplayer mode, and an online smartphone-based multiplayer mode. The perfect game to break out during a party! Grab some family and friends or simply play with yourself!

name: Liquid War
summary:
Gameplay takes place on a 2D battlefield, usually with some obstacles. Each player (2 to 6, computer or human) has an army of particles and a cursor. The objective of the game is to assimilate all enemy particles. The players can only move their cursors and cannot directly control the particles. Each particle follows the shortest path around the obstacles to its team's cursor. A player may have several thousands particles at a time, giving the collection of particles a look of a liquid blob. When a particle moves into a particle from a different team, it will fight and if the opponent particle fails to fight back (it is not moving in the opposite direction) it will eventually be assimilated by its attacker. As particles cannot die but only change teams, the total number of particles on the map remains constant. Since a particle can only fight in one direction at a time (towards its team's cursor), a player that surrounds its opponents will have a distinct advantage. The game ends when one player controls all of the particles or when the time runs out. When the time runs out, the player with the most particles wins.

There are multiple maps which affect the obstacles in the battlefield. These obstacles may affect the strategies of the game.

Liquid War is a multiplayer game and can be played by up to 6 people on one computer, or over the Internet or a LAN. A single player mode is available in which the opponents are controlled by the computer. The computer AI's "strategy" is to constantly choose a random point in the enemy and move its cursor to it.

name: LightEaters!
summary:
The LightEaters are coming… because darkness is never safe! Explore the perils and pitfalls of the night with the help of your trusty flashlight in this whimsically spooky platform adventure game.

The mysterious LightEaters aren’t the only dangers lurking in the murk! You’ll need wits, speed, and the power of your imagination to navigate through the dark, defeat traps and puzzles, and evade the enemies in your way!

name: Live Inc.
summary: Live Inc. is an online 2vs2 heist game where two opposing players play in a cat and mouse scenario and their team members play as overseers of the map. Teams can use unique mechanics to interact with the map and must work together to outsmart their opponent.

Monsters are born from Line friends, raised and battled!

name: Linking Logic

A child learns to identify different ways to approach a problem. plan actions to be taken. and evaluate the outcome of a solution. In LINKING LOGIC, your child places -tools- along a path to guide Ruddy or Betty down through five floors of a building. Along the way, your child helps the character collect the patterned tiles that are missing from the bottom floor.

Plant the seed of romance with her handsome neighbor Luke, and keep her rake of an ex-boyfriend Blaine off her turf. In order to win the affection of the student body and become popular enough to become Homecoming Queen, Lizzie will need to complete over 100 different speed challenges, plus compete in dance-offs with Kate to win the title. Players will build friendships to get past obstacles and gain popularity points on the way to the homecoming dance.

name: Light

summary: Lizard Slayer - an arena shooter with roguelike elements. You will take on the role of an ancient Slavs and participate in real historical battles against lizards.
