name: Liquorice
summary:
Hyperreal realtime 70bpm.

Connect programmable Node-Terminal machines and create a sonic singularity.

name: Living Books: The Cat in the Hat
summary: The Cat in the Hat is an educational game based on the Dr. Seuss book of the same name. It has the same plot of the original book. The Cat sees that Sally and her brother are bored on a rainy day. Eventually, they start having fun, but The Cat realizes he has made a big mess. The Cat uses a big vacuum to clean the whole mess up, and it ends happily ever after. The game lets you click on many things in the background, and has small mini-games during the story. The game also lets you go back to any page you want again.

name: Living Books: Green Eggs and Ham
summary: Green Eggs and Ham is the second Dr. Seuss Living Book Adaptation from Broderbund. The story features Sam-I-Am, who repeatedly asks the questions based on an object, e.g. “Would you Could you on a boat?”. This leads to his grumpy friend saying “I do not like Green Eggs an Ham”. The story gets more dramatic as it progresses. There are some activities featuring characters from the story like the Fox in a Box, and the Mouse in the House. The game features word recognition, vocabulary, reading comprehension and computer literacy. Every page is clickable for a few surprises. In Read to Me, the program automatically turns the pages leaving out the games as the story progresses.

name: Links E6: Course Pack 2
summary:
Links E6 is the best virtual golf experience ever created. Explore more world-class golf courses with this DLC Course Pack!

This Pack contains: Grand Country Club, The Club at Hokulia, Jeremy Ranch Golf & Country Club, Prairie Dunes Country Club, and Stone Canyon Club.

name: Littlest Pet Shop 3: Biggest Stars
summary: Get ready to go for the gold! It's time to hit the arena for the LITTLEST PET SHOP Biggest Stars competition—and this time your pets are in the spotlight! Ten fun and challenging mini games are your pets' tickets to the big time. Practice makes perfect as you help your pets become the best gymnasts, models, ice skaters, dancers, flyers, fashion designers, and more. Then pack up their cute team uniforms and the dozens of super-fun accessories you've customized because it's time to hit the road! The Biggest Stars competition is the event of year, when the pet-triplet judges look for teams that are a triple threat; cute, peppy and totally talented! Good thing that with your help, all your LITTLEST PET SHOP pet's Biggest Stars dreams really can come true!

name: Life Codex
summary: Life Codex is a journey of solitude within the pages of a book. Solve intricate puzzles to uncover the narrative. Step inside my temple, find opus on the table. To understand it all, I'll leave you just a label. Undress your bones - dance skeleton. And then you will know, what's the Point of it all.

name: Life is Strange: Double Exposure - Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Life is Strange: Double Exposure Ultimate Edition contains:

• Life is Strange: Double Exposure - complete game
• Spooky Outfit Pack
• Decades Outfit Pack
• Final Fantasy VII Outfit Pack
• Fan Favorite Outfit Pack
• Paw Prints Cat Outfit Pack
• Exclusive Cat Content

Max Caulfield, photographer-in-residence at the prestigious Caledon University, discovers her closest new friend, Safi, dead in the snow.

Murdered.

To save her, Max tries to Rewind time - a power she's not used in years… instead, Max opens the way to a parallel timeline where Safi is still alive, and still in danger!

Max realizes the killer will soon strike again - in both versions of reality.

With her new power to Shift between two timelines - can Max solve and prevent the same murder?

name: Linja vs. the Maneclowns

name: Liquidator: 3D Action Game
summary: Liquidator is an unlicensed Russian Action FPS game. This game made on the Build engine and looks like addon or mod for Duke Nukem 3D.

name: LizardSpock
summary: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock

name: Links: Championship Course - Banff Springs
summary:
An add on course for Links, Links 386 Pro and Microsoft Golf.

Banff Springs Golf Club is located in Alberta, Canada. Designed in 1928 by the late Stanley Thompson, one of the worlds most foremost golf architects, Banff features a course which rolls gently along the Bow river under the snow capped peaks of Sulphur Mountain, Mountain Rundle and Tunnel Mountain.

name: Links: Championship Course - Mauna Kea
summary: An addon course compatible with Links, Links 386 Pro, and Microsoft Golf. Mauna Kea is located on the island of Hawaii and is one of the islands top rated golf courses.

name: Links: Championship Course - Hyatt Dorado Beach Resort

name: Light, Dark or Hrak?

name: Lifestream - A Haunting Text Adventure

name: Linksider
summary: Linksider is puzzle platfomer where you can attach different "Side Effects" to the sides of your character. Utilize these effects creatively and you may discover surprising interactions between them to help you solve various puzzles.

name: Liminal
summary: Liminal is a first-person survival horror game that takes place within a seemingly boundless labyrinth of familiar, yet unsettling environments. Explore a virtually endless procedural environment and experience a world distant from our own.

name: Links LS 1999
summary:
Featuring St Andrews Links - Old Course, and many new features, Links LS 1999 is a gleaming addition to the Links franchise. Other courses include Bay Hill Club and Lodge, Latrobe Country, and Entrada at Snow Canyon. Multimedia tours of the courses are available for you to enjoy.

A new tournament environment brings crowd galleries to the course. The additions of real-time voice and spectator mode enhance online play. In this version, you can even create your own sound script if you want, adding your own comments to the soundscape.

name: Light Box
summary: Roll and shine endlessly in this game! Move left, move right, avoid obstacles, and collect Life-Shields for protection. Watch out for traps and other dangerous boxes. Keep rolling and shining!

name: Light Arrow is Missing
summary: Light Arrow is Missing (LAIM) are puzzle hacks where the Light Arrow has been hidden some where in the game and cryptic clues have been left behind that lead to it's location.

name: Liquisity
summary:
Liquisity is a problem-solving action game where players must get a ball past obstacles into a goal. Each level is set underwater. The player is given a cannon which can be used to fire a ball with varying force. Once a ball is launched, the player can control it to a limited degree with the left and right arrow keys. The player can launch another if a ball is destroyed or offscreen.

The levels contain obstacles and elements such as fans which block the way, sharp fans which destroy the ball, bubble jets which propel the ball in a specific direction, and others. Solving the level often involves carefully hitting switches to deactivate inconvenient obstacles. There are several different types of balls, in addition to the basic one: the metal ball is heavy and hard to control, but it can shatter glass barriers; the seltzer ball slowly dissolves in water and thus has a limited lifetime, but it can fit in tight spaces and avoid obstacles when shrunk, and it can be made to float upwards at any time. There is also a helicopter ball, which can move freely in any direction but cannot exit the level.

The game includes a built-in level editor and some unlockable bonus content.

name: Little Big City
summary: Be the Mayor! Design and build the prospering city of your dreams! Make it a wonderful place to live for your citizens using a vast number of creative resources. Unleash your imagination as you place functional buildings and cool decorations. Meet characters who can't wait to be your neighbors and help each other's cities grow. You can even take an entertaining break from being Mayor with special mini-games that will challenge you and offer various missions and collectibles.

name: Liquidation: Zombie Apocalypse
summary: Liquidation: Zombie Apocalypse is an intense survival-action game set in a world devastated by a zombie outbreak. As one of the last survivors, your mission is to "liquidate" hordes of the undead, reclaim lost territories, and restore order.

name: Little Blue Men
summary: This game is a joke. This game is a warning. This game is a satire. This game is inspired in equal parts by Vaclav Havel's "The Memorandum" and Hunter S. Thompson's "Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas". This game is a big, stupid shaggy dog story.

name: Lisa: Is Fearless
summary: It's a short parody fangame of Lisa: The Painful.

name: Liquid Space
summary: Fly and fight through the vibrant universe of Liquid Space Dimension in this retro-inspired action shooter! As Sid Seaburn, pilot of the Star Drifter, master a wide range mechanics like drifting, laser beams, and torpedoes to get the highest score possible and stop the evil general Ra-Baba!

name: Lionel City Builder 3D: Rise of the Rails
summary: Imagine it. Build it. Drive your train through it.

name: Lizzie McGuire 2: Lizzie Diaries
summary: In the interactive game, an animated Lizzie takes on a side-scrolling action-adventure filled with 12 captivating levels. Players travel to Lizzie's favorite places to hang, such as the beach and shopping mall -- but along the way must be sure to look out for cheerleaders and other rivals who are plotting to ruin the day.

name: Lifeline: Halfway to Infinity
summary:
Taylor's journey continues! Deep in the isolated vacuum of space, trapped in orbit around a strange black hole, our intrepid astronaut must once again reach out for a lifeline - YOU! Inside the spaceship Veridian, Taylor thought it was time for some hard-earned quiet solitude and a little R&R, but a very unexpected guest has other plans… 
 
The story unfolds in real-time, and every decision you make shapes the course of the story. Taylor's life, the fate of humanity, and time itself are in your hands. No pressure!

name: Liberty Fighters
summary: Liberty Fighters is a classic retro shoot’em up game with mixed rpg elements that adds an unique touch to this game. You explore a space station full of interactive characters and make impactful choices through the story. Fight action tense space combat missions with your upgradable spaceship.

name: Lil' Kingdom
summary: Expand your castle, by digging underground.

name: Lisa: The Wise

name: Little Shrimp: Legend Reborn

name: Lilac: Side Witch

name: Lich Queen's Curse
summary: An interactive fiction role-playing game. With a non-linear story line, your choices determine how the story plays out. Recruit allies to join your party, form relationships with party members, and even find romance. Will you choose a path of light? Or a path of darkness?

name: Lillysia
summary: Find herbs to cure your pet from illness.

name: Liars Race in Lost Ruins
summary: This is a FPS game in which players repeatedly play alliances and treacherous tactics to evade the traps of the huge labyrinth and reach the goal to get the treasure hidden in the depths of the labyrinth.

name: Life as a Lich
summary: Embrace lichdom: research powerful spells, recruit undead legions, manage your domains, rule the underworld, and become a demigod!

name: Little Monster Private Eye: The Smelly Mystery
summary: Game on the PC.

name: Link! Like! Love Live!

name: Little Witch Academia: Project Luna

summary: Do you have the willpower to free Will from prison?

name: Living with an Elf: A Cozy Forest Retreat
summary: One night, an elf traveler named Lucia knocks on your door seeking shelter. Now you must live with an elf in this cozy forest retreat. Gather herbs and synthesize potions by day. Deepen your bond with your new elf companion by night.

name: Life of a Polygon
summary: Follow the life of a lil' polygon, as he embarks on a journey to become a Circle

name: Liminal Phase
summary: Liminal Phase is a VR action horror game set in a parallel ‘90s. Fight malevolent monsters, solve peculiar puzzles, and explore the dark corners of a fractured mind consumed by video games.

name: Life is a Race
summary: Life is a Race is a simple game which metaphorically depicts the human life as a course to be run as fast as possible. The player must click the left mouse button rapidly to make the on-screen character rush forward while moving through all the life stages. The goal of the game is to get as low a time as possible.

name: Libra of the Vampire Princess: Lycoris & Aoi in The Promise Plus Iris in Homeworld
summary: These episodes take place before "Libra of the Vampire Princess", so they're a great introduction into Libra's vampire world. They're also perfect for fans who crave more of Libra's expanded universe. Both episodes were funded on Kickstarter thanks to our amazing Backers.

name: Light and Dance VR
summary:
Play your music from any source, start the game, jump in and dance! It's the first virtual reality Disco, offers you a lot of music reactive environments, lights, fog and a beautiful dance floor making you experience your loved music in a whole new way!
Try it out now and save it for future Updates!

name: Little Warriors Team
summary: The Little Warriors team includes gameplay such as character development, material collection, equipment synthesis, and challenging bosses. The game allowing players to form battle teams according to their preferences and freely switch between controlled characters during battles.

name: Life of D. Duck II
summary: A bizarre satirical adventure game created by Norwegian artist Bjørnar B.

name: Lipstick. ADV
summary: In Lipstick. ADV the player takes the role of Gorou, a young Japanese private detective. One day, a wealthy and powerful old man contacts him and asks him to find a box which - according to him - contained a family treasure. The young detective thinks that fortune has finally smiled to him, but when his pretty girlfriend Otomi disappears, he realizes that the mystery is bigger than he thought...

name: Limbo Revolution
summary: Limbo Revolution is a dystopian adventure game set in an alternate 1990s Eastern European country ravaged by dictatorship. In this immersive world, you must navigate the desolate streets, political landscape and unravel the truth behind the downfall of the nation. Watch out for others.

name: Line Change
summary: Line Change - A 2D pixel side-view game where you draw lines that become bridges from one point to another, allowing three creations to make their way to the finish.

name: Line-3
summary: Line-3 is a futuristic take on Picaria, a traditional board game of Native American cultures. The goal is to get three in a row, as in Tic-Tac-Toe, but Picaria offers more variety and tactical depth.

name: Liber
summary: We all dreamed of adventures full of mysteries and mysticism, dreamed of finding ourselves in unusual situations and emerging from them as a hero. Solve riddles, fight enemies, fight adversity and help the main character Alex unravel the hidden meanings of Liber.

name: LittleMouseHero
summary: This is an open-world action role-playing game. In this world, you will play a little mouse and explore mysterious or dangerous scenes such as grasslands, forests, swamps, caves, etc., and discover wonderful things. creatures......

name: Links E6: Course Pack 1
summary:
Links E6 is the best virtual golf experience ever created. Explore more world-class golf courses with this DLC Course Pack!

This Pack contains: Asiana, Barton Creek - Fazio Foothills, Cabo Del Sol, The Greenbrier (The Old White), and Wade Hampton.

name: Lizzie's Lucky Potion Shop
summary: Play it safe or press your luck to brew up the perfect potion

name: Little Bit War
summary: Occupy all cities! You just place the building on the map! Build barracks and factories! Then units will appear and advance to enemy countries. Build towers and fortresses! Then buildings will attack enemies who came. War funds increase over time. Occupy enemy cities and increase your income. If you occupy all cities, you will clear the stage and get special abilities! Bomb, Repair, Meteor, Missile, Spy, Doctor, Summon Monster, Strengthen Buildings, etc. Special Abilities are over 50! Let's play High-speed RTS!

name: Limey Lizard: Waste Wizard!
summary: In deep space, one waste-processing employee stands above the rest: Limey Lizard, an incredibly lazy but lovable bloke who always seems to find himself in trouble. In episode 72, this is no exception, and if he doesn't fix the waste disposers the ship'll be flooded with filth, so get out your spanner and your chemically-resistant overalls -- it's gonna be a mucky ride!

name: LittleCity
summary: a small city painter/sandbox game - currently in development.

name: Lilja and Natsuka: Painting Lies
summary: "What are the colors of your heart?" The heartwarming story of Lilja, a blind painter, and Natsuka, her energetic assistant, who unravel the mysteries behind their clients' requests. An all-new visual novel presented by Frontwing."

name: LifeSigns: Surgical Unit
summary: A medical-themed adventure game for the DS. It is the sequel to the Japan-only DS launch title Kenshuui Tendo Dokuta, which inspired the more gameplay-heavy Trauma Center series.

name: Little Hero Adventure
summary: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Little Hero Adventure, an exciting 2D platformer game. Explore diverse levels, battle enemies, overcome traps, and collect berries to help your village.

name: Lil Dungeon Wizard
summary: You are a little dungeon wizard.

name: Lims
summary: Manage your lims to fight through the ring and reach the king. A sci-fi robot management game. Position your lims around your lam to fight through groups of enemies. Research, craft, and manage to succeed.

name: Living Legends: Bound by Wishes
summary: Your husband Jack travelled back to the town of Wishville to fulfill a long-standing debt, and assured you he wouldn’t be gone for too long. But when he doesn’t come home after a few days, you follow in his footsteps to find out what happened. Upon arriving at the town though, you discover this place isn’t the dream come true that it once was. It’s now turned into an absolute nightmare!

name: Liminal Doom 2
summary: Liminal Doom 2: Crossing The Threshold is a set of seven MBF21 maps that are themed around the liminal space aesthetic. With a more elaborated and ambitious scope compared to its prequel, these maps hopefully will offer a different and unique experience. Each map has a different kind of atmosphere and purpose, and high attention was put into balancing the high energy gameplay moments with the quiet ones. Combat varies a lot in terms of encounters and enemy placement, and progression its mostly non linear with an emphasis on exploration and resource starvation if you are playing on UV.

name: Line Up: Dots!
summary:
Find out the best route and connect the dots in order until the end of the line, but don't forget to collect the stars at the right time!
Play freely hundred levels, beginning with the easiest to the most challenging. Each level has several ways to be solved, use your logical reasoning and try to collect all the stars of each world!

name: Little Mages
summary: Defend your castle from various hordes of enemies that seek to invade it! Little Mages is a casual pixel art game with roguelite elements where you accumulate knowledge and learn powerful spells of your choice to defeat all your enemies.

name: Little Big Guy
summary: Craft, Hunt and Survive

name: Like Blowing Out a Candle
summary: The end of the world is celebrating its birthday.

name: Lighthouse Simulator
summary: Stay at the lighthouse on this uninhabited island for ten days to win $100000, would you like to? You are alone, there is nothing to do, the only thing you have to do is to endure the isolation and loneliness, this may be a hell suffering, or a life of self-imposed exile

name: Lioden
summary: Lioden is a browser-based animal simulator where you get to build your own pride of lions and lionesses. On top of exploring different maps and participating in monthly events, players can interact with each other, breed lions for rare features such as mutations and complete daily quests for rewards.

name: Links Extreme
summary: A twisted version of Links LS. New Courses, New Game Modes (e.g. Poison, Deathmatch, Demolition Driving Range), exploding balls...fun for the whole family! Not your typical golf game, Links Extreme places emphasis on speed and timing instead of accuracy.

name: Lips: Deutsche Partyknaller
summary: Lips: Deutsche Partyknaller is a localized version of Lips: Number One Hits for German-speaking countries. It was released in Germany, Austria and Belgium. The game itself is identical to Number One Hits, but the track list consists largely of German songs. Downloadable content from other Lips games can be carried over and songs can be imported by swapping the discs. The disc comes with 40 songs:* 2raumwohnung - Besser Geht's Nicht

name: Light the Way
summary: Light The Way is a first-person horror adventure game. It takes place in a storage house after your character is kidnapped by a stranger.

name: Little Pony Town Adventures

name: Links: Championship Course - Firestone Country Club

name: Lines - Best Puzzle Game
summary:
Lines - a game for the brain!
A brilliant Mac version of the loved Windows game called Lines'98. Same rules, same score. Just connect five balls with the same color to get the score.
This board puzzle game will keep your focus and, yes it can be addicted.
The responsible consumption of Lines is required.
Thank you, and I hope you will like the game.
For any feedback, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Deutsch:
Linien - ein Spiel für das Gehirn!
Eine brillante Mac-Version des beliebten Windows-Spiels namens Lines'98. Gleiche Regeln, gleiche Punktzahl. Verbinde einfach fünf Bälle mit derselben Farbe, um den Punktestand zu erhalten.
Dieses Brett-Puzzle-Spiel wird Ihren Fokus behalten und, ja, es kann süchtig sein.
Der verantwortungsvolle Verbrauch von Lines ist erforderlich.
Danke, und ich hoffe, dass dir das Spiel gefallen wird.
Für jedes Feedback, zögern Sie bitte nicht, mich zu kontaktieren.

summary:
Lightspeed Bit Bit is a unique retro neon stylized arcade game. The simple one finger control makes it easy for anybody to pick up and play, but it's also challenging without being frustrating. This game has three awesome game modes.
◊Bit Bit Mode: This is the main mode of the game. There are three difficulties-Easy, Medium, and Insane. Your ship loses a little bit of health every second and also when you collect the wrong color bit. You must collect bits that match the color of your ship to add to your health and score.

summary: Little Shop of Treasures is a hidden object game for the PC and iPhone.

This is classic bubble shooter game. Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
Zimba is love to play with her bubbles. Help her to reach her goals.

Play good or evil, man or woman, as you bring peace to the kingdom or take over the world with your sorcery. Brew potions, raise the dead, summon mythical beasts, control men's minds, and blast away your enemies.

name: Little Computer People

This "House on a Disk" is based on the theory that every computer has an "occupant" (i.e. Little Computer People - LCP), which can be made visible by providing accommodation. Every computer should have a different LCP, who is usually accompanied by a dog as a pet.

name: Limbus Company: Season 1 - Orientation

Season 1: Orientation, is the first Season of Limbus Company, coinciding with the game's launch.

It consists of the game's Prologue and first three Story Chapters, the first Mirror Dungeon and Line 1 of Refraction Railway, as well as the release of 13 Identities based on story content and 13 E.G.O exclusive to the Season's Pass.

It also consists of the game's first Detour Tale, Hell's Chicken. This event adds an additional 2 Identities and 2 E.G.O to the season.

name: Lil' King
summary: Sometimes the littlest king has the biggest job

name: Liar! Scheming Socialites
summary: Liar! Scheming Socialites is the second spin-off otome game of Liar! Uncover the Truth by Voltage Inc.

name: Libtard: The Satire Game
summary: Complete 120 Hilarious and Unique Levels! (On Full Release - 8 Storylines) Follow the side-splitting stories of your favorite political faces and charge into battle against Libtards, Snowflakes and Fascists alike in Libtard: The Satire Game!

name: Lines
summary: Lines is an unlicensed Russian port of an IBM match-five game called Color Lines for the NES.

name: Library of Babel 3D
summary: A 3D simulation of the Library of Babel, as described in the short story by Jorge Luis Borges.

name: Lilith.pk3
summary:
The most avant-garde Doom will ever get. Obviously not a WAD for everyone, the core target for such a mod is mainly people who are in video game glitches, corruptions and to some extent, creepypastas (whether that love is ironic or not). Nothing works as it is supposed to. You can hardly understand most of the things that are happening to you. Some of the custom monsters (like the hitscanning corrupted pinky) will put you on edge and keep you paranoid about the ruleset of the game.

The aesthetic of lilith.pk3 is one of a kind, horribly mangling the rendering engine of old ZDoom beyond belief to disform sprites, textures, text and even sound effects. The end result makes close to no sense, your Doom marine sprite is heavily dislocated and looks more like one of those creatures from Alien than a human being and the list goes on and on. The confused looks obviously doesn't always make for clean or concise gameplay, especially in later levels which crank the confusion up to eleven and manipulate the level geometry to do things you thought weren't possible in the game. Even basic things like crushers, slime pits or a turnstile look horribly out of shape and makes the player uncomfortable.

This is essentially what lilith boils down to: an unfamilarity to something we thought we knew by heart, a rising sense of uncomfort as the level design makes less and less sense and offering the player a new perspective on what Doom is. Don't play lilith expecting top-notch Doom gameplay, but play it for the one of a kind experience it offers you. For the better and for the worse, there are no WADs like lilith anywhere and there will never be.

name: Lighthockey
summary:
Air-hockey with a twist
--- Power-loader to blow up your opponents
--- Online multiplayer
--- Local multiplayer using a 2nd mouse
--- Hero bots from ancient Greece
--- Tournaments, Championships and Ladder

name: Little Willy
summary:
Little Willy's mother & sister were kidnapped while on a family trip to Earth II. 
Help him save them in this EGA platformer while solving the puzzles, avoiding hazards, and blasting off enemies. 
 
Visually and gameplay-wise, Little Willy resembles the Crystal Caves & Secret Agent games that were published by Apogee Software.

name: Librarian
summary: The Librarian will take you on an epic adventure!

name: Lilith's Hunger
summary: Three witches go to the house of the newcomer in town. She serves them tea with a gentle smile bit as one of them takes a sip Bera hears a loud noise and sees one of her friends fall onto the ground.

name: Life is Snot
summary: Snots live for only one minute.

name: Little Disaster
summary: This cute little disaster is bursting with big fun and challenge

name: Living with a Scarecrow
summary: Living with a Scarecrow is a visual novel about a young man, Norbert living with a scarecrow.

name: Lights Out
summary: It's getting late. You should probably head to bed soon. But be careful though! it's hard to see anything not illuminated by your unstable, swinging, ceiling lights.

name: Lil' Monster
summary: The world is filled with energy crystals, which can be turned into monsters, using a special tin can. For centuries humans have trained the monsters to battle each other. However, a trainer named Cool Joe keeps breaking the rules of battle, and it's up to you to find out what he is up to. Collect crystals and turn them into monsters. Make your monster battle other monsters to gain experience and improve its abilities. You can also capture more crystals by winning battles. In addition to creating monsters, the crystals can be used by the monster to learn attacks and healing abilities. With over 60 monsters to collect, there is plenty to keep you busy. Try to find the truth regarding Cool Joe in LIL' MONSTER.

name: Litter ShiFu
summary: Little ShiFu is a first person horror puzzle game. A sudden night visit broke Zhang Qingyi originally quiet high school life. Think the little girl Xuanxuan looking for the lost little Mi as the source, the old community in a strange murder unexpectedly slowly surfaced...

name: Lighthouse
summary: How many Pigcops does it take to stop Duke from screwing in a light bulb? You probably know the answer. It is dawn. Duke is sent to repair a lighthouse overrun by aliens. A hard climb to the base of the tower, and Duke finds there are eight floors to the top , and the elevator is locked. Some pigcops have learned to toss morters, some turrets have been upgraded to RPG launchers, and Duke is thinking he will be putting in some overtime on this job.

name: Lightning Crashes
summary: After a bright flash of lightning, Mario finds himself in a strange place. He assumes Bowser caused this and is now going to try and find out where he is and how to get back to the Mushroom Kingdom. This hack has 51 exits.

name: Light Dark
summary: The screen is split horizontally in two halves: light and dark, and the dark side is upside down. You are constantly moving forward and every time you press a button you switch between the sides. You also jump by pressing a button and can fly some distance by holding a button. Collect the coins to score points and avoid hitting the spikes.

name: Life & Death II: The Brain

name: Light
summary: A 2D Lighting Speed Collision Based Fighting Game.

name: Lifeblood
summary: Action-Fantasy + Survival / Battle Royale centered around teamwork and team composition. Lifeblood provides fast-paced, skill oriented combat that thrives on intelligent plays, team cohesion and players ability to adapt to their combat environment.

name: Light the Backrooms
summary: You will be hounded by ghosts in the Backrooms of a ghost hunting company from midnight to 6 am. New kinds of crazy ghosts will be introduced daily, but you will also be notified how to deal with them. Take advantage of the two types of lights and survive five days of crazy business.

name: Lifetime
summary: Awakening in a land among the stars, play as a cat exploring The Cosmic Island of Recollection in this Third-person open world visual novel in order to regain memories of the life that came before. Search behind rocks, in the grass, and everywhere in-between to discover all 13 memories.

name: Liquid Entry
summary: A person who can transform into a slime, let's gather water droplets and cleanse the polluted world!

name: Line Bender
summary: Bend the world around you to complete various puzzles. Unlock block interactions, discover efficient solutions, and escape the dungeon.

name: Life Forge ORPG
summary:
Life forge is an ORPG designed to be what you make of it.

The story is simple, you are found unconscious along a shore line by an elderly man who leads you to his home for shelter. There, the player soon realizes they have no memories, of course and the world in Life Forge is all new to them. From here, the players life is whatever they make it. A Life Forge, if you will.

In the world of Life Forge there is lots to do and be a part of. Players can become great and powerful heroes or, if they wish, villains and take part in quests, explore dungeons and have PvP battles in arenas. If a player decides they don't want to run around and take part in adventurous deeds then they won't have to. In Life Forge crafting is available as well, so If a player wishes then they can harvest all sorts of goods to create a variety of items. All of which they can either use for themselves or sell to other players. Guild and Player housing are also planned features for the game, giving players another little slice of variety and choices which will make their game play unique.​

Features:

Mount System

Use mounts to travel faster! Different mounts will travel at different speeds and there will be several to choose from.

Character Creation

Choose your characters gender and their hair style. We plan to add new races as well.

Death and Revive system

When your character dies, you will have 60 seconds to either wait and be revived by another player or respawn back at your last check point.

*Note: You can press "V" to respawn anytime within that 60 seconds.

Crafting

Use materials to craft item by using recipes! Craft items will generally be better then what you would find at a shop.

Custom Graphics

You wont find any RPG Maker graphics here!

Stamina and Weight system

Items have weight and your character has stamina. The more weight you're carrying the less stamina you will have which will cause your character to move slower. Stamina can be raised through strength and endurance.

Boss Framework

Each boss is created to be unique for a more enjoyable boss battle. Custom programming for each boss is put into the game, so expect a challenge!

Threat System

Your character will gain threat when in battle! Be prepared, enemies will attack the fighter with the most threat first. And, there are taunt skills to increase your threat even more, for those who feel bold anyways.

Quests with Quest log and tracker

Keep track of your quest progress and pin the ones most important! By clicking on the quest while in to quest log, the quest(s) will pinned to the game screen for easy tracking!

Talent System

There are three different skill trees to apply talent points too, giving players the chance to make their character a unique and fun experience.

And of course we have all the basic needs of an ORPG...
Guilds
Dungeons
Projectile Weapons
Blinding Spells
Invisibility Spells
Spell Casting and Projectile Enemies
Paperdolled Items
Zelda-Like Puzzle Systems
Many other fun features!

~Life Forge dev team: SkywardRiver - Lead Developer and Programming, Zetasis - Lead Developer and Graphics, and Benjo - Programmer.

name: Lilly's Potion Shop
summary: A third-person shooter in a bright, colorful world, where dynamic battles are mixed with leisurely exploration of the world in search for ingredients, and a intricate plot. Feel like a wizard, thanks to the unusual mechanics of making potions.

name: Living With It
summary:
Welcome
Instructions for this training will be delivered via memo.

name: Lizards Must Die: Victor Character
summary: New character - battle master and mercyless fighter - VIKTOR.

name: Little Tomato: Age of Tomatoes
summary:
Test your reflexes and your ability to react in Little Tomato, a funny, frantic and addictive game in which friendly but annoying tomatoes have come to life and they are continuously jumping without stopping. To win you have to squash them quickly, but be vigilant as not all the characters are as innocent as they seem.

Follow Little Tomato through 12 different worlds with brilliant graphics that will challenge the most skilled players, reach the last level, get the highest score and put an end to this wild journey.

name: Little Green Frog
summary: Just a game about a little green frog.

name: Life-Winner Cong's Double Dragon Dream
summary: There is only Chinese summary about this game. For more information, please change the language to simplified Chinese. There are no words in the game, so the language of the game is all languages. Players all over the world can play the game freely without language restrictions.

name: Lizard Survivors: Battle for Hyperborea
summary: They have launched an active invasion on our lands in late September this year, so let us break free of the slavic hand that held us by our balls for many ages! Rally all of our reptile militia, we will end this all together!

name: Liberty VR
summary: Liberty VR is an action adventure game, taking place in alternative version of American Revolution. Main protagonist is the American soldier who is fighting against evil created by ancient alien race.

name: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - Collector's Edition
summary:
A new legend begins as you step into the steel toe boots of Goro Majima, a man who has lost his memory and reinvents himself as a pirate on the open sea.

Embark on an over-the-top, modern-day pirate adventure with an ex-yakuza, now pirate captain and his crew as they engage in exhilarating combat on land and sea in the hunt for lost memories and a legendary treasure.

name: Life Is Hard, and Then You Buy a Cactus
summary: It's all about that work/plant balance!

name: Live or Die
summary: Live or Die is a real-time strategy game about a war battle between good and evil that takes place in the future. Mankind frantically expands into outer space and fights for the scarce energy source (uranium) on which they depend for survival. You, Dr. Whiet, leads a team of miners to land on the desolate planet of Mimas, ready to carry out a mining plan, but they are surprised to find human footprints in a valley. You are not alone. The story begins here.

name: Little Doll Queen
summary: Gensokyo suddenly plunged into a huge miasma of toxic fog, and the lands are now gloomy and lifeless. The source of these strange phenomena is the Nameless Hill, a forgotten land of sin. It's a danmaku experience full of poisons and suffocation. That means, this is a shooting game.

name: Lips
summary: "Lips" is a Karaoke game similar to the SingStar franchise. "Lips" comes bundled with two motion-sensing, LED-lit microphones for $69.99 US. In addition to the 40 songs that come on the disc, players can plug in their MP3 player and sing along to their own music.

name: Limousine Parking Simulator
summary: Your mission as a limousine driver is to learn how to drive almost perfect a limousine.

name: Lightracer: Ignition
summary: This is a game where you determine the fate of entire civilizations, whether they rise or fall.

name: Light: Fellowship of Loux
summary: Light: Fellowship of Loux is a role-playing game for Android and iOS, developed by Polygon Games and published by Com2Us.

name: Lil Doll House
summary: In this twisted horror escape game, play as Cynthia, the doll of a vengeful little girl who wants nothing more than to subject you to horrific traps designed to kill. Use strategic thinking to effectively solve action-oriented puzzles and escape with your life. But be quick, the clock is ticking!

name: Lights Out
summary: Lights Out is a 4v1 multiplayer horror game, where one player takes the role of The Monster, trying to kill the other players of whom are Scientists, trying to escape the facility they're trapped in.

name: Library Fantasy
summary: You are a powerful sorcerer working in a vast library of magic known as Fantasia. You need to unravel its secrets and restore order. Fantasia was known for its unparalleled collections of magical books, artifacts and knowledge, but in recent days, something has gone wrong.

name: Life Museum
summary: A side-scrolling puzzle game in line style. You take on the role of an office worker who, after working day after day, decides to explore the city. Play with keyboard or Xbox controller.

name: Linkrealms
summary: Linkrealms is a Sandbox MMORPG that harks back to the roots of classic online role-playing games, where community was the center of the user experience, one's choices mattered, and reputation was earned on the battlefield rather than leaderboards.

name: Lingering Legacy
summary: The Dark God has ravaged the lands against his brother, letting his demons wage war through the once peaceful world. As the Guardian, you travel the land, purging the foul stain of the demons while in pursuit of the Fallen Guardian to restore balance once again.

name: Lincolnshire Roads
summary:
Inspired by the pothole filled roads of Lincolnshire in the UK, this game challenges even the best of drivers to make it as far along the road as possible without having a blowout.
Hit a small pot hole and your tyre pressure drops. Hit a big one and it's game over!

name: Lights Out Luigi
summary: The objective is to shine your flashlight on the boos by moving the mouse up and down and then click them with the left mouse button to make them disappear.

name: Life Simulator 2017
summary:
LS2k17 is a historical game in which you are propelled into the France of a very distant era, in 2017.

Thanks to its super-powerful game engine and breathtaking graphics, you'll enjoy a unique, breathtaking experience.

In this ultra-realistic simulator, you'll be free to do absolutely anything you want. You can relax, work or even save the world! LS2k17 is your new life.

(Warning: the game is played entirely in the Windows console and may require Internet Explorer or something similar)

name: Lisa: The Joyful - Arkantos
summary: A fan DLC/expansion to Joyful, it takes place in a new continent called Arkantos with its own story and characters. Features 100's of new battles and enemies and six new warlords to defeat.

name: Living Books: Arthur's Birthday
summary:
Arthur is having a big birthday party on Saturday, and all his friends are invited. What will he do when he finds out that Muffy is having a party at the same time?

In the Great Gift Mystery DW has pulled all the tags off of Arthur's gifts, and it's up to you to use the clues to match up Arthur's gifts to their givers.

As kids gather clues in the Great Gift Mystery, they are stored in a notebook. When you've gathered enough clues, click on the gift to return to Arthur's party and solve the mystery!

Kids will also entertain themselves as they tap their shoes and play along with the Musical Pin the Tail on the Donkey activity. Can you pin the tail on the donkey?

name: Lightbreak
summary: LightBreak is a unique rhythm cozy game where you make melodies and ASMR sounds, and unravel a mysterious story.

name: Little Savior
summary: Little Savior is a real-time battle action game in which many units fight with each other. The player operates directly as one of the units to fight.

name: Little Deviants
summary: Join the Little Deviants in a series of madcap adventures that allow you to have fun discovering and experimenting with the new PS Vita System functions - including rear touch, front touch, six-axis motion senors, front and rear cameras and microphone.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia + Brawl Chess
summary: Explore the natural world while learning through play, then compete with your family in greatest game of all time - chess! A great game for little ones, Little Mouse's Encyclopedia comes bundled with Brawl Chess!

name: Little Cheese Works
summary: This is a cooperative action game where you have to carry cheese to the goal without being found by cats. You can have a conversation with voice chat, but the slightest noise will wake up the cat. Let's carry the cheese quietly by breathing quietly so that the cat won't find it!

name: Lilith Wants to Buy Your Soul
summary: Take a personality test with a definitely-not-clingy demon girl.

name: Life's 2 Short: Unhooked
summary: A mysterious message in a bottle calls a little ghost to reunite a pirate captain with his 4 wayward wives...

name: Little Ghost
summary: 2D Metroidvania focused on platforming rather than combat. Explore a surreal paper world using a unique horizontal float mechanic. Chill-yet-Challenging, Little Ghost has tons of music, a sizeable interconnected map to unlock, & lots of hidden items.

name: Linea
summary: Linea is a storyline puzzle game in which you can help the characters by drawing the line to the end of the path of light.

name: Little Children's Educational Swanky Alphabet Puzzle Game
summary:
We present a fun application “Swanky Alphabet” enabling to learn English alphabet and also upgrading pre-schooler’s visual memory, logic, attentiveness and assiduity.
   The first level is an interactive ABC-book: 10 educating cards contain the hole-letter puzzles and associating pictures. Voice pronouncing of a letter and associating word appear after right dragging a letter on a fitting puzzle. So the child could learn a writing and pronouncing of letters in alphabet and also the associating words. The multicolored balloons arise in case of successful card’s completeness witch are so attractive to pop!
    The second level is 26 educating cards for the number of English alphabet’s letters. By piecing together 3-5 puzzles we can get a letter with voice pronouncing of the letter and the associating word, but as opposed to the level one, each card contain a writing of associating word which prepares a child to the mastery of reading skills, not only alphabet learning.
   The child will be fascinated by the bright colorful pictures with large-sized elements. The pleasant melodies accompany the game process with an option to switch them off.
There will be new cards in the next application’s version.

name: Life of Food
summary: Play through a campaign with multiple levels, or fight against or with your friends in the arena. Play as four different types of characters, plus a secret character unlocked by finishing the campaign. Each character has a unique set of skills and animations.

name: Little Astronaut
summary: A little astronaut in a huge danger. You are Sky, an engineer of the SBTC Science Bio Technology Corporation. You have one mission: explore what happened at the Mars Bioresearch Facility where all the communication was lost. You are only a little astronaut, but what you will find, is a huge danger.

name: Life is Pain
summary: Life is Pain is a 2D platformer with elements of hardcore, dynamic gameplay and abstract graphics in which you need to pass a variety of levels, playing as an alien.

name: Liminus: The Silent Guard
summary: Souls on their perilous journey through the afterlife are left defenseless against the hungry darkness without the protective guidance of the Shepherds. Locate your flock, protect them from wolves, and guide them safely back home with your array of abilities and powers in Liminus: The Silent Guard.

name: Limelight
summary: Cast various lights on your enemies to destroy them, conquer a hundred randomly generated dungeons and defeat bosses. Always in the Limelight!

name: Lightfire Defense
summary: You are the last Lightfire Keeper. Use the power of the elements to protect your beacon from incoming waves of enemies. Explore mysterious worlds to find a way to prevail over the inevitable.

name: Liminal Memory
summary: Walking simulator, where you finish levels to recover your memories. Firstly started as 1 month visual project, ended up being complete game. Features PSX graphics and liminal aesthetic as main style.

name: Lilac & Her Light
summary: a story about a girl who lost her colour.

name: Little Wu Chang
summary: "Little Wuchang" is a soul-like APRG game. You'll play as Wuchang, the netherworld's envoy, and start on adventures in a world based on Chinese mythology. You must defeat enemies of various types on multiple different maps. You gonna love and enjoy every time you died.

name: Lilim Wants to Lv Up
summary: One night a beautiful girl suddenly appeared in my room, not only dressed in cool and sexy clothes, but also with horns and a tail.The self-proclaimed succubus Lilim came to the human world to become stronger, and my hoarded sexual desire was the perfect target for her.

name: Libros de Chilam Balam
summary: A 1992 turn-based PC-98 game created by Right Stuff Corp.

name: Line GoGo! TwinBee
summary: LINE GoGo! TwinBee was a free-to-play infinite vertical scrolling shoot 'em up game developed by Dracolle Studio for iPhone OS and Android smartphones. It was released on May 20, 2013, exclusively in Japan, and it was online only. It is the sixteenth overall TwinBee game and the first shoot 'em up in the series released in 18 years.

name: Line of Sight: Starters Pack
summary: Starters Pack provide several permanent items, and many exclusive items such as weapon skins.

name: LiveOnIdol
summary: LiveOnIdol VR is a casual adventure game using VR controllers. We're going to show Jenny, the main character of a beautiful girl, to a VR controller camera in various places in her particular costume. It is a game that completes the photo book called LiveOnIdol by taking pictures.

name: LittleBigPlanet: Sack-Eating Plant Costume
summary: The best thing about Sackboy is that you can make him look and act exactly how you want. Download this additional costume to really stand out from the crowd!

name: Live Action-Bit Theater "Route Yonroku"
summary: Suzunone Miu and Rinto will perform a live show in "Live Action-BIT THEATER"! Topping off the live show with energetic voices and sounds assigned to the buttons will make the live show even more fun!

name: Livets Hopp
summary: Playdate game about escaping the inevitable.

name: Linda & Joan
summary: Linda & Joan is a narrative game about a British family. You play as Russell, Linda, and Joan — son, mother, and grandmother — switching between them to help the family cope with a series of traumatic events. Based on a true story.

name: Life & Crimes
summary:
In 1979, robbers ransacked a bank vault in Kensington, London. The heist was unusually clean - no one was traced and in total 13.8 million pounds of gold and jewels have never been recovered. It now comes to you, our virtuos detective, to analyse and identify the culprits and unearth the shadowy conspiracy at its heart.

In this game you are tasked with matching criminals to their names and aliases. You can do this by searching a database, reading articles and listening to tapes.

name: Lisa: The Wishless
summary: A Lisa: The Painful fan game where you play as a soldier of the Rando Army who misses his past, and is ready to perform any task, no matter how tough or dirty.

name: Links Quartz
summary: A turn-based RPG with mysterious graphics in which dot-picture characters move through 3D space. Use the “Shift” command to change the character's standing position to gain an advantage in the battle.

name: Light and Shadow: Schatten über Empyria
summary: Meet new companions, regain your memory after a stranding, join a story guild, save the world from the shadow, or plunge it into ruin.

name: Linzexu Banned the Opium
summary:
The Opium Wars of 1839 to 1842 and 1856 to 1860 marked a new stage in China’s relations with the West. China’s military defeats in these wars forced its rulers to sign treaties opening many ports to foreign trade. As opium flooded the country despite imperial prohibitions, the court debated its response. On one side, officials concerned about the economic costs of the silver drain and the social costs of addiction argued for stricter prohibitions, aimed not only at Chinese consumers and dealers but also at the foreign importers. On the other side, a mercantile interest including southern coastal officials allied with local traders promoted legalization and taxation of the drug.

As opium flooded the country despite imperial prohibitions, the court debated its response. On one side, officials concerned about the economic costs of the silver drain and the social costs of addiction argued for stricter prohibitions, aimed not only at Chinese consumers and dealers but also at the foreign importers. On the other side, a mercantile interest including southern coastal officials allied with local traders promoted legalization and taxation of the drug. Debate raged within court circles in the early 1800s as factions lined up patrons and pushed their favorite policies.

Ultimately, the Daoguang emperor decided to support hardliners who called for complete prohibition, sending the influential official Lin Zexu to Canton in 1839.

name: Lily in DreamWorld
summary: An action RPG where the departed miniature dachshund Lily strives to reunite with her owner!!

name: Little Magic
summary: Little Magic is a Strategy game, developed and published by Data East, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Line of Fire
summary: Just as you stole the enemy's secret weapon and started back, the enemy spotted you! Now you must fight your way back to safety. But be careful! You're in the line of fire.

name: Little Nemo the Clown
summary: Little Nemo The Clown is a 2D Open World game inspired by good Metroidvania titles. Talk, Run, Fly, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Fantasy World full of Magic and Color. Little Nemo is a modern Maze Runner Adventure. Can you find the Clown before your Time runs out?

name: License to Breed
summary: Money, power, fame! The Amane family has it all... Well, except heirs to continue on the family name. Thus the Amane Patriarch has one final command: "Any fertile man in the Amane family must go out and breed at once! It shall be allowed any place, any where in the city. No exceptions."

name: Limscape
summary: A first-person exploration game where you walk through eerie and realistic spaces, searching for an exit. Powered by Unreal Engine's Lumen, it's perfect for those who enjoy quiet walks or simple games. Use the sandbox feature to create your own space! Requires a DirectX12-compatible GPU.

name: Little Piggy Defense
summary:
Terrifying monsters are threatening our peaceful forest.
Please help us protect the last pig standing from the billions of monsters swarming in.
You never know what you'll get!! But we can guarantee you'll grow stronger.
Create your own strategy to fend off the foes.

name: L.I.A.C.F.F Tale of the Cursed Chain
Liberation Maiden: SIN
summary:
A sequel to Liberation Maiden, although it sheds the three-dimensional shooting gameplay in favor of a visual novel approach.

Liberation Maiden SIN follows the exploits of Kiyoto Kaido, childhood friend of and newly-appointed chief aide to President Shoko Ozora, during the events of the Second Liberation War. Kaido has the ability to read other people's minds. Several new female characters also appear as cabinet members in the New Japan government. Both the Liberator Kamui and the Guardian Spirits also feature.

name: Little Bear Rainy Day Activities
summary: Little Bear Rainy Day Activities is a CD-ROM game published by Creative Wonders and The Learning Company in 1999, based on the Little Bear books and television series. Little Bear finds lots of fun indoor activities to play on a rainy day. The activities in the game are all intended for ages 3 and up.

name: Lilywhite Lilith
summary:
Tangled vines wind through crumbling limestone, serving as still markers under a misty sky. The stark tranquility belies something fell and horrible... for how long have you clutched the cold grip of your rifle? Lead forward by your own bloodlust and fervor; that lilywhite lilith.

Lilywhite Lilith is a 10-map episode for limit-removing ports made by members of Doomer Boards. The set features 9 regular maps, and 1 monsterless progression-stopper. @Jaxxoon R is the overlord to bow to :)

name: Lithium: Inmate 39 - Relapsed Edition
summary: A survival horror game where you solve many puzzles, lure enemies into deadly and bloody traps and try to escape running away from twisted monsters chasing you in the dark.

name: Little Marisa's Disaster Journey
summary: Marisa wants to borrow some books from Patchouli's library as usual. But this time she has triggered a special magic circle trap. It shrank her body and clothes. In order to return the normal size, Marisa must survive in the huge Scarlet Devil Mansion!

name: LiEat: The Lie-Eating Dragon & the Vermilion Vampire
summary: The first part of the LiEat trilogy.

name: Live or Die
summary: You have been selected as a new contestant to play in a twisted puzzle game designed by an up and coming serial killer known as the Game Master. Using your intuition and survival skills, can you stay one step ahead of the Game Master or end up as another one of his many victims?

name: Life Without You
summary: Life Without You is a simulation of sitting at the computer, immersing you in the harsh atmosphere of Patience.

name: Life Blood
summary: You awaken on the Altar inside the Life Cathedral. Venture down into the mountainous kingdom in this first-person, souls-like experience with focus on exploration. loot villages on the cliffside, navigate the spiraling stone dungeons, and unseal the secrets hidden within the heart of the mountain.

name: Line Crossing
summary: Mysterious train exploration adventure

name: Living Legends: Voice of the Sea
summary: The dark seas are calling...

name: Lightning Wings II
summary: "Lightning Wings II" is a game using Brogent's somatosensory system. Log-in to the mobile app, players can choose their robot. Log-in to the simulators with the QR code generated, players can enjoy the most exciting battle game in Brogent's E-sport base in Kaohsiung.

name: Liminal Lands
summary: Liminal Lands is a poetic journey through a hybrid reality where sun, salt, wind, water algae and bacteria collide. Based on fieldwork from the salt marshes of southern France, the artwork explores otherwise unseen macro- and microscopic ecosystems of the wetlands.

name: Little Oceania
summary: Little Oceania is a minimal strategy building game. Create a delightful medieval kingdom in the middle of the ocean by placing cute miniature structures. Plan your space well, earn money, discover new buildings and biomes, and continually expand your picturesque island kingdom.

name: Little Red Lie
summary: A contemporary adventure game about debt, family, and the truth about honesty.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Bigfoot Costume
summary:
Follow the monster-sized footprints.
Campers beware, deep in the forest lurks a very big hairy beast indeed − luckily it’s really Toggle dressed up as Bigfoot, as the cheeky scamp.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Turkey Head Costume
summary: The best thing about Sackboy is that you can make him look and act exactly how you want. Download this additional costume to really stand out from the crowd!

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Mass Effect - Andromeda Poc Costume
summary:
Wondering what your enemies are up to?
Are you annoyed that they’re hiding behind big walls, probably plotting your downfall?
Don’t worry, just kit your winged wonder-bird Swoop out in this drone costume from Mass Effect: Andromeda, and watch him soar to gather all the intel you need.

name: LightGone
summary: Step into the darkness with Ashley, a college dropout lost in a mysterious world devoid of light. Traverse eerie liminal locales and evade lurking monsters to unravel the mysteries of this chilling 2D game with horror elements. Can you lead Ashley to safety, or will the shadows consume her?

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Plants vs. Zombies Zombie Costume
summary: Oh no - Sackboy has turned into a zombie! Don’t worry it’s just a costume. Dress him up and shuffle through a garden warfare adventure.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Cyberman Costume
summary:
Sackboy has undergone a cyber-conversion with this metallic costume based on one of the Doctor’s most feared enemies – the Cybermen.

Ever since the First Doctor originally encountered them in Antarctica, this silver nemesis has used all kinds of cyber-creatures to thwart his time-travelling adventures including Cybermats and Cybermites, but never a CyberSack – until now…

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Little Nightmares Creator-Pack
summary: Build scary adventures in an oversized fantasy world with this fun-packed Level Creator Kit.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Tekken 7 Yoshimitsu Costume
summary: Break all the rules with this wacky space ninja costume featuring the leader of the Manji Clan – Yoshimitsu from Tekken 7.

name: LittleBigPlanet: 3 Dia de Muertos Big Toggle Costume
summary: October 31st marks the start of the Mexican national holiday celebrating those who have passed. Dress Big Toggle up in this mariachi costume and join in with this tradition filled three day fiesta and welcome the souls of the departed.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Autumn Seasonal Creator Kit
summary: Get your Autumn Seasonal creator kit today!

name: Lights
summary: Lights is an endless runner in which you need to dodge various obstacles and earn points.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Winter Seasonal Creator Kit
summary: Add new decorations and stickers to your LittleBigPlanet 3 experience with the Winter Seasonal Creator Kit. Download it today. Available for a limited time only.

name: Liar: Legend of the Sword 2
summary: Korean Action RPG for the PC-DOS, second title in the Liar's franchise.

name: Lisparuga
summary: 2D Ikaruga-inspired shmup made for the Spring 2016 Lisp Game Jam

name: Lightspire: Fortunes Web
summary: A Fantasy Action Adventure RPG being developed by Lukewarm Media, using the CryENGINE 2.

name: Light Ignite
summary: Light defines beauty: relax and immerse yourself with this gorgeous, hypnotizing phenomenon in a stunning optical physics light game. Experience the unique physics of light rays in an amazing laser puzzle which is as challenging as it is joyful. Play with laser physics and control the beam's reflection, refraction, dispersion and curvature. Discover and become a virtuoso of dozens of exciting tools including lasers in all colors, lenses, mirrors and prisms - and even portals and black holes. And all of this with astonishing, real-time physics and visuals which will blow you away. Bring the light of creativity back into your life and build your own light games and levels - and enjoy countless puzzles by your friends, and the Light Ignite players community.

name: Lies Beneath
summary: LIES BENEATH is a single-player survival horror game with a heavy dose of action! Something's gone horribly wrong in the sleepy town of Slumber, Alaska. Now, returning college student Mae must fight to save her father (and her sanity) from the terrifying townsfolk and creepy creatures infecting her hometown. Experience a living comic book full of frightful scenarios as you uncover the secrets of Slumber… and Mae's past.

name: Life is Magic
summary: Life is Magic is a free-to-play, GPS location based, fantasy MMORPG.

name: Lillyann
summary: One day, I was hit by a carriage and... I died. But why did I wake up in another world and take over the life of this girl named Ann? She was a terrible person, who bullied her classmate. "I think he hates me and I can't blame him, but I'm not going to regret it because I didn't do the bad things. After a while, he will realize that I am no longer a threat to him and will ignore me." Or that's what I thought at the time. But I was completely wrong.

name: LittleBigPlanet 2: Move Pack
summary:
The LittleBigPlanet 2 Move Pack combines the PlayStation Move controller with the world of LittleBigPlanet, and with five giant story levels and seven side levels, this is LittleBigPlanet’s biggest Downloadable Content (DLC) pack to date!

The LittleBigPlanet2: Move Pack features a new story mode – The Rise of the Cakeling – in which a rogue cake threatens doom and destruction, and you Sackfolk must once again attempt to restore peace to Craftworld. This time though you’ll have a brand new toy to make things easier, The Brain Crane; a new powerup that allows you to control objects with the power of your mind, freaky!

A new suite of new creative tools give you the power to create your own Move games, record fluid motions, and paint your own stickers, whilst a boatload of new stickers, materials, decorations, costumes, music, sound and sequencer objects will vastly broaden your creative palette, and make your Popit heave at the seams.

name: Little Red Riding Rogue
summary:
Dear Little Red,
Stay on the path and be wary, for the woods are not filled with friends.
Orcs, and wolves are some of the dangers ahead.
The forest is endless and you will get no help.
Be careful, because when slaying monsters you become one yourself.
Yours truly,
Grandma Red

name: Light 'em Up
summary: Light the path from the source tile to the destination tiles.

name: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII - Collector's Edition
summary: This Collector's Edition is a Square Enix Online Store exclusive that contains the following: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII, DLC code, premium packaging, 80 page hardcover artbook and a silver embossed pocket watch.

name: Little Green Girl
summary: One day the protagonist meets an alien girl and the story turns...

name: Liekki
summary: Liekki is a fast-paced puzzle platformer where you play as a little fire spirit and try to burn as much as possible – or as little as possible. Solve levels using different fire related powers and change levels while burning them down.

name: Little One
summary: "Can you take him in for a while?" - One fateful night an old friend drops by with an orphan boy and asks me to take him in. And not just any boy - there seem to be some hidden secrets bubbling just beneath the surface of that innocent face.

name: Lightphobe
summary: Beware of the darkness... Lightphobe is an asymmetrical team-based PVP game that blends stealth action with fast-paced shooter gameplay. Pick a side and work together as a team to emerge victorious!

name: Little Red Memories
summary: Bonnie, a young woman struggling with traumatic memories of her past, begins to find herself in a strange, dangerous world that's set out to kill her no matter what. Will she be able to permanently escape this unfamiliar world and the horrors from her memories along the way? Or will she succumb to the darkness of The Parallel and meet her end?

name: Lionheart: Dark Moon
summary:
Adventure across an epic Fantasy World, collect Heroes and battle in dungeons and PvP tournaments. Over 170 heroes to summon and master! Upgrade them with pets and gear. Customize heroes with Talents!
The Dark Moon is rising. Defend your Kingdom from the eternal army of the Mirror. Wage war against the forces of evil.
Prove your might! Play as the last of the Vaultkeepers, collecting new Heroes to restore the glory of your order. Don’t be idle! The world is yours to save.
Every hero has their story. Collect them all and unleash their power!

name: Lie of Caelum
summary: Giant robots. Technology abusing magic. Conflict between countries. Join a group of fated individuals and liberate the planet of Caelum from the shackles of its people. Discover the mysteries behind their powers, and dwell in their lives in this Sci-fi JRPG.

name: Lily of the Valley
summary: Following his mother's death, a young man meets a strange young girl in the Welsh countryside.

name: LittleWarGame
summary: Littlewargame is an HTML5 Real-Time-Strategy game with multiplayer mode and a map editor. It runs completely in your browser without any download, plugin or registration required. Just click 'play' and the game will start right away.

name: Lifeboat
summary: Lifeboat is a multi-screen Game & Watch video game released in 1983. Nintendo produced an estimated 500,000 units worldwide. The model number for the game was TC-58. In the game, you'll have to maneuver two lifeboats and catch people who are jumping out of a ship on fire. The game was held similarly to how you would hold a book.

name: Littlest Pet Shop: Jungle
summary: Set in a new jungle-themed universe, gameplay is spread across four unique pet-sized worlds. Within these, players can collect, name and care for 20 pets.

name: Lighthouse of Madness
summary: Embark on this Lovecraft-inspired tale and discover the mysteries that await you in this island. Explore the enigmatic lighthouse, solve challenging puzzles and most importantly: try not to lose your sanity when facing the darkness of your mind.

name: Little Odyssey
summary: Relax while traveling around fantasy desert on your giant turtle-giraffe. Deliver packages and explore the world in your Little Odyssey!

name: Lillybug
summary: Save the tree!

name: Link: The Unleashed Nexus - Restructured Heaven
summary:
Aim for the sky.
It doesn't matter if you don't have any wings.

name: Little Monster
summary: Little Monster is a — fast paced and fun — beat 'em up game. You play as little monster whose goal is to prevent nightmare spirits from entering our minds while sleeping.

name: Lilian Fourhand: Nuclear Soeur the Fighters
summary: Lilian Fourhand is a side scrolling action game that uses characters and locations from Maria-sama ga Miteru. Players move from left to right shooting down all enemies that come along, ranging from the likes of birds and bugs to schoolgirls.

name: Lit
summary:
WayForward’s classic horror-puzzle game LIT is back, completely reimagined!

Take control of mopey teenager Jake as he delves into a living nightmare in search of his girlfriend Rachael. Use the available light sources to carve a path through the darkness – but watch your step! One wrong move could mean disaster!

Can you survive the horror and see the light of day?!

name: Lightspeed Dating: Deluxe
summary: The Deluxe version of Lightspeed Dating adds two new game modes, two additional characters, a new room type as well as three question packs. You also get priority queueing rights, which means there will always be a server space available for you.

name: Lit
summary: Venture into the dark hallways of a haunted high school and help guide emo teenager Jake as he searches for his lost girlfriend Rachael. Solve light-themed puzzles using a variety of gameplay mechanics including slingshots, light bulbs, windows, matches, lamps, and TV sets. Think your way around deadly creatures from the darkness in an effort to reach each room's exit door without being swallowed up by the shadows. Are you brave enough to puzzle through the darkness...?

name: Liveza: Death of the Earth
summary: A global catastrophe has literally torn our planet apart, breaking Earth into many pieces. You are the survivor that explores the remains of our planet and investigates the anomalies that have settled upon it. You start out with only a single item: a broken weapon that also functions as a flashlight.

name: Linxicon
summary:
There are enough word games out there to teach you how to spell. Linxicon is a game teaches you what words mean!

Your goal is to connect two random words by creating a chain of new words that bridge the gap in their meanings. For example, the words “link” and “lexicon” don't have much in common, but you can create a bridge between them.

There is only one pair of words to connect per day, but you can practice as much as you'd like. A new game will start at 20:00 EST every day.

name: Lizard Tower: The Abyss
summary: Throw flares at the beacons. You know how it is.

name: LifeGenesis
summary: The object of the game is to remove all the red cells from the grid. The computer will try to remove all the blue squares. You and the computer take turns adding and deleting cells.

name: Lion and the King 2
summary: Another movie/mini-game combo from Dingo Pictures, Phoenix Games, and The Code Monkeys.

name: Limits of Intelligence
summary: Create your own machine. Engineer it!

name: Little Adventurer Treasure Hunt
summary: A game focused on object-finding. The story revolves around helping alien friends who have been forced to land on Earth due to an "accident". Assist them in searching for scattered items, parts, and their lost crew members across various locations.

name: LittleBigSoko
summary: Little Big Soko - This is a puzzle game on the tank. Your task is that you must move the boxes to certain points on the tank to move to a new level. At higher levels, you will face really complex puzzles, which will take really time to complete.

name: limentional
summary: Trapped in a surreal and liminal environment and in your mind, you'll be pressed to use all your skills to find a way of escape.

name: Limber
summary: A zombie's detached body parts struggle to return home.

name: Little Bartmares
summary: On a dark night in Springfield, Bart Simpson sleeps quietly in his bedroom. However inside his mind, he's experiencing a little nightmare...

name: Lineage II Classic
summary: Enter the classic world of Lineage II and rediscover the magic of how it all began.

name: LingerieS
summary: The main character, Aoi Miyamae, is asked by his twin sister, Riko, to dress up as a woman and work as a clerk at 'LingerieS', a high-end women's lingerie specialty store, in her place. Aoi discovers the depth of women's lingerie and develops a bond with the women who visit the store...

name: Little Horrors!
summary: Little Horrors! is a horror themed pet sim. Raise your new friend right, or it could end up causing complete mayhem!

name: Light: Black Cat & Amnesia Girl
summary: "Light" is a 3D adventure puzzle game, in which you play as a cat. You will help a little girl who has lost her memory escape by leading her through four-level mazes with different style.

name: Listen, Think, Meow!
summary: Listen, Think, Meow! is an audiobook with missing words. If you can't find the word then its time to start meowing for the hint. Oh and if you are struggling you might need a "meow".

name: Lifespan 5seconds
summary:
Lifespan 5seconds is a stage clear action puzzle game made by PixelGameMakerMV. 
While generating a block with a lifespan of 5 seconds 
Try on all 50 stages!

name: Lifting Unlimited
summary: Lifting Unlimited is a fun, fast-paced, strategic lifting game. Train in the Bench Press, Squat, and Deadlift to increase your total through difficult progression. Compete in state, national, and international competitions to set Earth-shattering Records! Start your weightlifting journey today!

name: Links Puzzle
summary: Rotate, move or slide the links in the correct position to link all pieces and complete the board! Easy to learn and with increasing difficulty a great puzzle experience! Different mechanics like rotating, moving or sliding keep you on your toes to find the right connections. Over 150 Puzzles will keep your mind busy and experience a relaxing puzzle experience.

name: Light of Atlantis
summary: In this 2D-Puzzle-Metroidvania you dive into the ruins of Atlantis. As a small robot you control the water level in various rooms to solve puzzles and discover the mysteries of an ancient society.

name: Lily’s Labyrinth of Lust
summary: You’re desperate to see what she looks like under you – but she has other plans. Immerse yourself in Lily’s Labyrinth of Lust and indulge in hypersexual, adrenaline-pumping chases while battling for your place on top. Will victory taste as sweet as her?

name: Lillian Night: Exclusive Contract of Succubus
summary: Succubus-themed 3D animated visual novel with VR support

name: Lights Off!
summary: Play through a common childhood fear about turning the lights off and going to bed.

name: Light Bearers 2
summary: Light Bearers 2 is a fast paced hide and seek, asymmetrical multiplayer horror game. A Shadow is trying to corrupt all Light Bears. The Light Bears must use their movement and cunning. To keep each other from becoming corrupted by darkness.

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Airplanes
summary: Challening 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring line drawings of iconic airplanes by LineArtBabe, on a smooth background.

name: Literally Every FNF Mod Ever
summary:
Uh Oh, the man Bob is angry and you made them angry and they are so angry man, what did you do to make them angry? Honestly don’t know I’m just a game description.
Some parts of the Bob mod close the game unexpectedly and trigger a link to open that might trigger any anti-virus software to detect it as malware, please be aware that this is a fnf mod and not a trojan virus. If Bob asks for your personal information, please give it to them as it might be important.

for legal reasons this is a joke

name: Lightning Swords
summary: Lightning swords, known as Ken-Go in Japan, is an arcade 2D side-scrolling beat-em up - the game is set in a time when Ninjas and Samurai were active. The player is a samurai, armed with a sharp katana. He needs to go to the right, through locations in traditional Japan, and cut all the enemies that appear on his way. Holding down the attack button gives a special blow. At the end of each level a boss awaits - usually big, strong and durable.

name: Like a Dragon Series Starter Pack
summary: The Like a Dragon Series Starter Pack includes two games from the Like a Dragon series: Yakuza: Like a Dragon and Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth.

name: Little Idle Monsters
summary: In this idle game, you will incarnate a Dark Lord of fear, trying to take over these lands, by controlling every single monster within. Look at how your monsters fight those humans and generate fear to gain more and more power.

name: Lilium
summary: Lilium is an action role-playing game taking place in a very small, but dense open world. It has a short, interesting main story, several side quests, dungeons and exciting secrets waiting to be discovered. Find your fun by interacting with your surroundings, develop your character, loot everything.

name: Light Path
summary: This is a casual racing game. You drove a big truck to a coastal city and had a car race in the city.

name: Like Dreamer
summary: A pop and cute bullet-hell shooting game from Cosmo Dreamer "Outside". Both beginners and experts can enjoy speedy and active playing.

name: Lisa and the Grimoire
summary: Hoping to hit a big payday and pull herself from a life of poverty, Lisa heads to a town with a rumored demonic artifact. But upon arriving, she quickly realizes she has gotten herself into a dangerous situation.

name: Livers Ikusei Card Game
summary: This game is a "Deck-Building Liver Development Card Game."You will nurture aspiring livestreamers (Livers) and help them become outstanding Livers.The goal is to earn as many LP (Liver Points) as possible.To achieve this, you'll need to build an optimized deck.

name: Lighthoof
summary: Leap, slash, dash, and ricochet your way through a ruined land in this hand-drawn 2D action-exploration game. Wield your light arrow against vicious foes and unlock new abilities to further explore the mountain of Essa. Along the way, you'll uncover the truth and choose the destiny of Lighthoof Noa.

name: Little World of Creatures
summary: In Little World Of Creatures you Dash, You Smash and you Bash your way into other enemy creatures to collect there precious creature essence

name: Livly Garden
summary: A pet simulation based on the browser communication game Livly Island from So-net Entertainment.

name: LiveMeat
summary: This is a first person single player horror adventure game. You need to sneak or run in the scene to avoid monsters, search for resources to survive, and find a way to leave.

name: Lightclusters
summary: Step into the world of Lightclusters - a 3D, ARPG set amongst the stars. Start off as Citrine, a young Star, suddenly forced to battle against her own kind when internal conflicts erupt. Take on unique and challenging bosses in your journey to defeat Tenebris, the leader of the Corrupted Stars.

name: Lindsi Luna Blast
summary: Homebrew game about a secret agent. Lindsi is a "homage to old school games". Pure action, with a little research side. You must go through differents levels to find how to escape.

name: Little Master: Niji-iro no Maseki
summary: Turn-based strategy RPG developed by Tokuma Shoten in 1995. It is the third and final game in the Little Master trilogy.

name: Lilith Rising: Season 2
summary: Lilith Rising - Season 2 is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. Return as the prince that was exiled from by a demon warshiping cult, with your companions journay to become stronger to save your kingdom.
